表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of general information about financial statements [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of general information about financial statements [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表に関する全般的情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for general information about financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Name of reporting entity or other means of identification
標準ラベル（英）: Name of reporting entity or other means of identification
標準ラベル（日）: 報告企業の名称又は他の識別手段
定義: The name of the reporting entity or other means of identification.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of change in name of reporting entity or other means of identification from end of preceding reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of change in name of reporting entity or other means of identification from end of preceding reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: 報告企業の名称又は他の識別手段の直前報告期間の末日からの変更の説明
定義: The explanation of the change in either the name of the reporting entity or any other means of identification from the end of the preceding reporting period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of financial statements
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of financial statements
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表の性質の記述
定義: The description of the nature of financial statements (for example, whether the financial statements are of an individual entity or a group of entities).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Date of end of reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Date of end of reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: 報告期間の期末日
定義: The date of the end of the reporting period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Period covered by financial statements
標準ラベル（英）: Period covered by financial statements
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表の対象期間
定義: The description of the period covered by the set of financial statements or notes.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of presentation currency
標準ラベル（英）: Description of presentation currency
標準ラベル（日）: 表示通貨の記述
定義: The description of the currency in which the financial statements are presented.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level of rounding used in financial statements
標準ラベル（英）: Level of rounding used in financial statements
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表に使用している金額表示単位
定義: Information about the level of rounding used in the presentation of amounts in the financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement of financial position [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Statement of financial position [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 財政状態計算書 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資産 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 非流動資産 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Property, plant and equipment
標準ラベル（英）: Property, plant and equipment
標準ラベル（日）: 有形固定資産
定義: The amount of tangible assets that: (a) are held for use in the production or supply of goods or services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes; and (b) are expected to be used during more than one period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investment property
標準ラベル（英）: Investment property
標準ラベル（日）: 投資不動産
定義: Expiry date 2019-01-01: The amount of property (land or a building - or part of a building - or both) held (by the owner or by the lessee under a finance lease) to earn rentals or for capital appreciation or both, rather than for: (a) use in the production or supply of goods or services or for administrative purposes; or (b) sale in the ordinary course of business. Effective 2019-01-01: The amount of property (land or a building - or part of a building - or both) held (by the owner or by the lessee as a right-of-use asset) to earn rentals or for capital appreciation or both, rather than for: (a) use in the production or supply of goods or services or for administrative purposes; or (b) sale in the ordinary course of business.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Goodwill
標準ラベル（英）: Goodwill
標準ラベル（日）: のれん
定義: The amount of assets representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognised. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Intangible assets other than goodwill
標準ラベル（英）: Intangible assets other than goodwill
標準ラベル（日）: のれん以外の無形資産
定義: The amount of identifiable non-monetary assets without physical substance. This amount does not include goodwill. [Refer: Goodwill]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Investments accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している投資
定義: The amount of investments accounted for using the equity method. The equity method is a method of accounting whereby the investment is initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter for the post-acquisition change in the investor's share of net assets of the investee. The investor's profit or loss includes its share of the profit or loss of the investee. The investor's other comprehensive income includes its share of the other comprehensive income of the investee. [Refer: At cost [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates
標準ラベル（英）: Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社、共同支配企業及び関連会社に対する投資
定義: The amount of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Associates [member]; Joint ventures [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current biological assets
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current biological assets
標準ラベル（日）: 生物資産（非流動）
定義: The amount of non-current biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Trade and other non-current receivables
標準ラベル（英）: Trade and other non-current receivables
標準ラベル（日）: 売掛金及びその他の長期債権
定義: The amount of non-current trade receivables and non-current other receivables. [Refer: Non-current trade receivables; Other non-current receivables]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current inventories
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current inventories
標準ラベル（日）: 棚卸資産（非流動）
定義: The amount of non-current inventories. [Refer: Inventories]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax assets
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax assets
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金資産
定義: The amounts of income taxes recoverable in future periods in respect of: (a) deductible temporary differences; (b) the carryforward of unused tax losses; and (c) the carryforward of unused tax credits. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax credits [member]; Unused tax losses [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current tax assets, non-current
標準ラベル（英）: Current tax assets, non-current
標準ラベル（日）: 当期税金資産：非流動
定義: The non-current amount of current tax assets. [Refer: Current tax assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other non-current financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Other non-current financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: その他の金融資産（非流動）
定義: The amount of non-current financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other non-current non-financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Other non-current non-financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: その他の非金融資産（非流動）
定義: The amount of non-current non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current non-cash assets pledged as collateral for which transferee has right by contract or custom to sell or repledge collateral
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current non-cash assets pledged as collateral for which transferee has right by contract or custom to sell or repledge collateral
標準ラベル（日）: 担保に供されている非現金資産（非流動）のうち、譲受人が契約又は慣習により担保を売却又は再担保差入れできる権利を有しているもの
定義: The amount of non-current non-cash collateral assets (such as debt or equity instruments) provided to a transferee, for which the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge the collateral.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total non-current assets
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current assets
標準ラベル（日）: 非流動資産
定義: The amount of assets that do not meet the definition of current assets. [Refer: Current assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Current assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 流動資産 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current inventories
標準ラベル（英）: Current inventories
標準ラベル（日）: 棚卸資産（流動）
定義: The amount of current inventories. [Refer: Inventories]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Trade and other current receivables
標準ラベル（英）: Trade and other current receivables
標準ラベル（日）: 売掛金及びその他の短期債権
定義: The amount of current trade receivables and current other receivables. [Refer: Current trade receivables; Other current receivables]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current tax assets, current
標準ラベル（英）: Current tax assets, current
標準ラベル（日）: 当期税金資産：流動
定義: The current amount of current tax assets. [Refer: Current tax assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current biological assets
標準ラベル（英）: Current biological assets
標準ラベル（日）: 生物資産（流動）
定義: The amount of current biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other current financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Other current financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: その他の金融資産（流動）
定義: The amount of current financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial assets; Current financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other current non-financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Other current non-financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: その他の非金融資産（流動）
定義: The amount of current non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物
定義: The amount of cash on hand and demand deposits, along with short-term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and that are subject to an insignificant risk of changes in value. [Refer: Cash; Cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current non-cash assets pledged as collateral for which transferee has right by contract or custom to sell or repledge collateral
標準ラベル（英）: Current non-cash assets pledged as collateral for which transferee has right by contract or custom to sell or repledge collateral
標準ラベル（日）: 担保に供されている非現金資産（流動）のうち、譲受人が契約又は慣習により担保を売却又は再担保差入れできる権利を有しているもの
定義: The amount of current non-cash collateral assets (such as debt or equity instruments) provided to a transferee, for which the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge the collateral.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total current assets other than non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners
標準ラベル（英）: Current assets other than non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners
標準ラベル（日）: 流動資産（売却目的保有又は所有者分配目的保有に分類された非流動資産又は処分グループを除く）
定義: The amount of current assets other than non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners. [Refer: Current assets; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for distribution to owners]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有又は所有者分配目的保有に分類された非流動資産又は処分グループ
定義: The amount of non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for distribution to owners; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total current assets
標準ラベル（英）: Current assets
標準ラベル（日）: 流動資産
定義: The amount of assets that the entity (a) expects to realise or intends to sell or consume in its normal operating cycle; (b) holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) expects to realise within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) classifies as cash or cash equivalents (as defined in IAS 7) unless the asset is restricted from being exchanged or used to settle a liability for at least twelve months after the reporting period. [Refer: Assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total assets
標準ラベル（英）: Assets
標準ラベル（日）: 資産
定義: The amount of resources: (a) controlled by the entity as a result of past events; and (b) from which future economic benefits are expected to flow to the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity and liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity and liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本及び負債 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Issued capital
標準ラベル（英）: Issued capital
標準ラベル（日）: 発行済資本金
定義: The nominal value of capital issued.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Retained earnings
標準ラベル（英）: Retained earnings
標準ラベル（日）: 利益剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the entity's cumulative undistributed earnings or deficit.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share premium
標準ラベル（英）: Share premium
標準ラベル（日）: 資本剰余金
定義: The amount received or receivable from the issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Treasury shares
標準ラベル（英）: Treasury shares
標準ラベル（日）: 自己株式
定義: An entity’s own equity instruments, held by the entity or other members of the consolidated group.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other equity interest
標準ラベル（英）: Other equity interest
標準ラベル（日）: その他の資本持分
定義: The amount of equity interest of an entity without share capital that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other reserves
標準ラベル（英）: Other reserves
標準ラベル（日）: その他の剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing reserves within equity, not including retained earnings. [Refer: Retained earnings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total equity attributable to owners of parent
標準ラベル（英）: Equity attributable to owners of parent
標準ラベル（日）: 親会社の所有者に帰属する資本
定義: The amount of equity attributable to the owners of the parent. This specifically excludes non-controlling interest.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（英）: Non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（日）: 非支配持分
定義: The amount of equity in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to a parent. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total equity
標準ラベル（英）: Equity
標準ラベル（日）: 資本
定義: The amount of residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債 [タイトル項目]

標準ラベル（日）: 非流動負債 [タイトル項目]

標準ラベル（英）: Non-current provisions [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 引当金（非流動） [タイトル項目]

標準ラベル（英）: Non-current provisions for employee benefits
標準ラベル（日）: 従業員給付に係る引当金（非流動）
定義: The amount of non-current provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions for employee benefits]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other non-current provisions
標準ラベル（英）: Other non-current provisions
標準ラベル（日）: その他の引当金（非流動）
定義: The amount of non-current provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Non-current provisions]

標準ラベル（英）: Non-current provisions
標準ラベル（日）: 引当金（非流動）
定義: The amount of non-current provisions. [Refer: Provisions]

定義: The amount of non-current trade payables and non-current other payables. [Refer: Other non-current payables; Non-current trade payables]

標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金負債

定義: The non-current amount of current tax liabilities. [Refer: Current tax liabilities]

標準ラベル（英）: Other non-current financial liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の金融負債（非流動）
定義: The amount of non-current financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other non-current non-financial liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Other non-current non-financial liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の非金融負債（非流動）
定義: The amount of non-current non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total non-current liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 非流動負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that do not meet the definition of current liabilities. [Refer: Current liabilities]

標準ラベル（日）: 流動負債 [タイトル項目]

標準ラベル（日）: 引当金（流動） [タイトル項目]

定義: The amount of current provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions for employee benefits]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 負債
定義: The amount of present obligations of the entity arising from past events, the settlement of which is expected to result in an outflow from the entity of resources embodying economic benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total equity and liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Equity and liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 資本及び負債
定義: The amount of the entity's equity and liabilities. [Refer: Equity; Liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement of financial position [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Statement of financial position [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 財政状態計算書 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資産 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Property, plant and equipment
標準ラベル（英）: Property, plant and equipment
標準ラベル（日）: 有形固定資産
定義: The amount of tangible assets that: (a) are held for use in the production or supply of goods or services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes; and (b) are expected to be used during more than one period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investment property
標準ラベル（英）: Investment property
標準ラベル（日）: 投資不動産
定義: Expiry date 2019-01-01: The amount of property (land or a building - or part of a building - or both) held (by the owner or by the lessee under a finance lease) to earn rentals or for capital appreciation or both, rather than for: (a) use in the production or supply of goods or services or for administrative purposes; or (b) sale in the ordinary course of business. Effective 2019-01-01: The amount of property (land or a building - or part of a building - or both) held (by the owner or by the lessee as a right-of-use asset) to earn rentals or for capital appreciation or both, rather than for: (a) use in the production or supply of goods or services or for administrative purposes; or (b) sale in the ordinary course of business.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Goodwill
標準ラベル（英）: Goodwill
標準ラベル（日）: のれん
定義: The amount of assets representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognised. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Intangible assets other than goodwill
標準ラベル（英）: Intangible assets other than goodwill
標準ラベル（日）: のれん以外の無形資産
定義: The amount of identifiable non-monetary assets without physical substance. This amount does not include goodwill. [Refer: Goodwill]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Other financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: その他の金融資産
定義: The amount of financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other non-financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Other non-financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: その他の非金融資産
定義: The amount of non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Investments accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している投資
定義: The amount of investments accounted for using the equity method. The equity method is a method of accounting whereby the investment is initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter for the post-acquisition change in the investor's share of net assets of the investee. The investor's profit or loss includes its share of the profit or loss of the investee. The investor's other comprehensive income includes its share of the other comprehensive income of the investee. [Refer: At cost [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates
標準ラベル（英）: Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社、共同支配企業及び関連会社に対する投資
定義: The amount of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Associates [member]; Joint ventures [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Biological assets
標準ラベル（英）: Biological assets
標準ラベル（日）: 生物資産
定義: The amount of living animals or plants recognised as assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有又は所有者分配目的保有に分類された非流動資産又は処分グループ
定義: The amount of non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for distribution to owners; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Inventories
標準ラベル（英）: Inventories
標準ラベル（日）: 棚卸資産
定義: The amount of assets: (a) held for sale in the ordinary course of business; (b) in the process of production for such sale; or (c) in the form of materials or supplies to be consumed in the production process or in the rendering of services. Inventories encompass goods purchased and held for resale including, for example, merchandise purchased by a retailer and held for resale, or land and other property held for resale. Inventories also encompass finished goods produced, or work in progress being produced, by the entity and include materials and supplies awaiting use in the production process. [Refer: Current finished goods; Current merchandise; Current work in progress; Land]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current tax assets
標準ラベル（英）: Current tax assets
標準ラベル（日）: 当期税金資産
定義: The excess of amount paid for current tax in respect of current and prior periods over the amount due for those periods. Current tax is the amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax assets
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax assets
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金資産
定義: The amounts of income taxes recoverable in future periods in respect of: (a) deductible temporary differences; (b) the carryforward of unused tax losses; and (c) the carryforward of unused tax credits. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax credits [member]; Unused tax losses [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Trade and other receivables
標準ラベル（英）: Trade and other receivables
標準ラベル（日）: 売掛金及びその他の債権
定義: The amount of trade receivables and other receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables; Other receivables]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物
定義: The amount of cash on hand and demand deposits, along with short-term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and that are subject to an insignificant risk of changes in value. [Refer: Cash; Cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-cash assets pledged as collateral for which transferee has right by contract or custom to sell or repledge collateral
標準ラベル（英）: Non-cash assets pledged as collateral for which transferee has right by contract or custom to sell or repledge collateral
標準ラベル（日）: 担保に供されている非現金資産のうち、譲受人が契約又は慣習により担保を売却又は再担保差入れできる権利を有しているもの
定義: The amount of non-cash collateral assets (such as debt or equity instruments) provided to a transferee, for which the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge the collateral.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total assets
標準ラベル（英）: Assets
標準ラベル（日）: 資産
定義: The amount of resources: (a) controlled by the entity as a result of past events; and (b) from which future economic benefits are expected to flow to the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity and liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity and liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本及び負債 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Issued capital
標準ラベル（英）: Issued capital
標準ラベル（日）: 発行済資本金
定義: The nominal value of capital issued.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Retained earnings
標準ラベル（英）: Retained earnings
標準ラベル（日）: 利益剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the entity's cumulative undistributed earnings or deficit.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share premium
標準ラベル（英）: Share premium
標準ラベル（日）: 資本剰余金
定義: The amount received or receivable from the issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Treasury shares
標準ラベル（英）: Treasury shares
標準ラベル（日）: 自己株式
定義: An entity’s own equity instruments, held by the entity or other members of the consolidated group.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other equity interest
標準ラベル（英）: Other equity interest
標準ラベル（日）: その他の資本持分
定義: The amount of equity interest of an entity without share capital that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other reserves
標準ラベル（英）: Other reserves
標準ラベル（日）: その他の剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing reserves within equity, not including retained earnings. [Refer: Retained earnings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total equity attributable to owners of parent
標準ラベル（英）: Equity attributable to owners of parent
標準ラベル（日）: 親会社の所有者に帰属する資本
定義: The amount of equity attributable to the owners of the parent. This specifically excludes non-controlling interest.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（英）: Non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（日）: 非支配持分
定義: The amount of equity in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to a parent. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total equity
標準ラベル（英）: Equity
標準ラベル（日）: 資本
定義: The amount of residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Trade and other payables
標準ラベル（英）: Trade and other payables
標準ラベル（日）: 買掛金及びその他の債務
定義: The amount of trade payables and other payables. [Refer: Trade payables; Other payables]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Provisions [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Provisions [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 引当金 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Provisions for employee benefits
標準ラベル（英）: Provisions for employee benefits
標準ラベル（日）: 従業員給付に係る引当金
定義: The amount of provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Employee benefits expense; Provisions]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other provisions
標準ラベル（英）: Other provisions
標準ラベル（日）: その他の引当金
定義: The amount of provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total provisions
標準ラベル（英）: Provisions
標準ラベル（日）: 引当金
定義: The amount of liabilities of uncertain timing or the amount recognised when: (a) the entity has a present obligation (legal or constructive) as a result of a past event; (b) it is probable (ie more likely than not) that an outflow of resources embodying economic benefits will be required to settle the obligation; and (c) a reliable estimate can be made of the amount of the obligation.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other financial liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Other financial liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の金融負債
定義: The amount of financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other non-financial liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Other non-financial liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の非金融負債
定義: The amount of non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current tax liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Current tax liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 当期税金負債
定義: The amount of current tax for current and prior periods to the extent unpaid. Current tax is the amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金負債
定義: The amounts of income taxes payable in future periods in respect of taxable temporary differences. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有に分類された処分グループに含まれる負債
定義: The amount of liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale. [Refer: Liabilities; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 負債
定義: The amount of present obligations of the entity arising from past events, the settlement of which is expected to result in an outflow from the entity of resources embodying economic benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total equity and liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Equity and liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 資本及び負債
定義: The amount of the entity's equity and liabilities. [Refer: Equity; Liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 純利益（純損失） [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revenue
標準ラベル（英）: Revenue
標準ラベル（日）: 収益
定義: The income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities. Income is increases in economic benefits during the accounting period in the form of inflows or enhancements of assets or decreases of liabilities that result in an increase in equity, other than those relating to contributions from equity participants.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest revenue calculated using effective interest method
標準ラベル（英）: Interest revenue calculated using effective interest method
標準ラベル（日）: 実効金利法を用いて計算した金利収益
定義: The amount of interest revenue calculated using the effective interest method. Effective interest method is the method that is used in the calculation of the amortised cost of a financial asset or a financial liability and in the allocation and recognition of the interest revenue or interest expense in profit or loss over the relevant period. [Refer: Revenue]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cost of sales
標準ラベル（英）: Cost of sales
標準ラベル（日）: 売上原価
定義: The amount of costs relating to expenses directly or indirectly attributed to the goods or services sold, which may include, but are not limited to, costs previously included in the measurement of inventory that has now been sold, unallocated production overheads and abnormal amounts of production costs of inventories.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gross profit
標準ラベル（英）: Gross profit
標準ラベル（日）: 売上総利益
定義: The amount of revenue less cost of sales. [Refer: Cost of sales; Revenue]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other income
標準ラベル（英）: Other income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の収益
定義: The amount of operating income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Distribution costs
標準ラベル（英）: Distribution costs
標準ラベル（日）: 物流費
定義: The amount of costs relating to the distribution of goods and services.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Administrative expenses
標準ラベル（英）: Administrative expenses
標準ラベル（日）: 管理費
定義: The amount of expenses that the entity classifies as being administrative.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other expense
標準ラベル（英）: Other expense, by function
標準ラベル（日）: その他の費用（機能別）
定義: The amount of expenses that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note when the entity uses the 'function of expense' form for its analysis of expenses.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other gains (losses)
標準ラベル（英）: Other gains (losses)
標準ラベル（日）: その他の利得（損失）
定義: The gains (losses) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) from operating activities
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) from operating activities
標準ラベル（日）: 営業活動からの純利益（純損失）
定義: The profit (loss) from operating activities of the entity. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Difference between carrying amount of dividends payable and carrying amount of non-cash assets distributed
標準ラベル（英）: Difference between carrying amount of dividends payable and carrying amount of non-cash assets distributed
標準ラベル（日）: 未払配当金の帳簿価額と分配した非現金資産の帳簿価額との差額
定義: The amount of difference between the carrying amount of dividends payable and the carrying amount of non-cash assets distributed when settling the dividends payable. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) on net monetary position
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) on net monetary position
標準ラベル（日）: 正味貨幣持高に係る利得（損失）
定義: The gains (losses) representing the difference resulting from the restatement of non-monetary assets, owners' equity and items in the statement of comprehensive income and the adjustment of index linked assets and liabilities in hyperinflationary reporting.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gain (loss) arising from derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) arising from derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost
標準ラベル（日）: 償却原価で測定する金融資産の認識の中止から生じた利得（損失）
定義: The gain (loss) arising from the derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Finance income
標準ラベル（英）: Finance income
標準ラベル（日）: 金融収益
定義: The amount of income associated with interest and other financing activities of the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Finance costs
標準ラベル（英）: Finance costs
標準ラベル（日）: 金融費用
定義: The amount of costs associated with financing activities of the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Impairment gain and reversal of impairment loss (impairment loss) determined in accordance with IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Impairment loss (impairment gain and reversal of impairment loss) determined in accordance with IFRS 9
標準ラベル（日）: IFRS第9号に従って算定した減損損失（減損利得及び減損損失の戻入れを含む）
定義: The amount of impairment loss, impairment gain or reversal of impairment loss that is recognised in profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 5.5.8 of IFRS 9 and that arises from applying the impairment requirements in Section 5.5 of IFRS 9.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Share of profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している関連会社及び共同支配企業の純利益（純損失）に対する持分
定義: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other income (expense) from subsidiaries, jointly controlled entities and associates
標準ラベル（英）: Other income (expense) from subsidiaries, jointly controlled entities and associates
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社、共同支配企業及び関連会社からのその他の収益（費用）
定義: The amount of income or expense from subsidiaries, jointly controlled entities and associates that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Associates [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) arising from difference between previous amortised cost and fair value of financial assets reclassified out of amortised cost into fair value through profit or loss measurement category
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) arising from difference between previous amortised cost and fair value of financial assets reclassified out of amortised cost into fair value through profit or loss measurement category
標準ラベル（日）: 償却原価から純損益を通じた公正価値の区分に分類変更した金融資産の従前の償却原価と公正価値との差額から生じた利得（損失）
定義: The gains (losses) arising from the difference between the previous amortised cost and the fair value of financial assets reclassified out of the amortised cost into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets at amortised cost]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from reclassification of financial assets out of fair value through other comprehensive income into fair value through profit or loss measurement category
標準ラベル（英）: Cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from reclassification of financial assets out of fair value through other comprehensive income into fair value through profit or loss measurement category
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じた公正価値の区分から純損益を通じた公正価値の区分への金融資産の分類変更により生じた過去にその他の包括利益に認識した利得（損失）の累計額
定義: The cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from the reclassification of financial assets out of the fair value through other comprehensive income into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedging gains (losses) for hedge of group of items with offsetting risk positions
標準ラベル（英）: Hedging gains (losses) for hedge of group of items with offsetting risk positions
標準ラベル（日）: リスク・ポジションが相殺し合う項目グループのヘッジに係るヘッジ利得（損失）
定義: The hedging gains (losses) for hedge of group of items with offsetting risk positions.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) before tax
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) before tax
標準ラベル（日）: 税引前利益（損失）
定義: The profit (loss) from continuing operations before tax expense or income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax income (expense)
標準ラベル（英）: Tax expense (income), continuing operations

標準ラベル（英）: Ordinary shares [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 普通株式 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for equity instruments that are subordinate to all other classes of equity instruments. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of ordinary shares' axis if no other member is used.

標準ラベル（英）: Earnings per share [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: １株当たり利益 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

定義: Basic earnings (loss) per share from continuing operations. [Refer: Basic earnings (loss) per share; Continuing operations [member]]

定義: Basic earnings (loss) per share from discontinued operations. [Refer: Basic earnings (loss) per share; Discontinued operations [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Basic earnings (loss) per share
標準ラベル（日）: 基本的1株当たり利益（損失）
定義: The amount of profit (loss) attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity (the numerator) divided by the weighted average number of ordinary shares outstanding during the period (the denominator).

定義: Diluted earnings (loss) per share from continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Diluted earnings (loss) per share]

標準ラベル（英）: Diluted earnings (loss) per share from discontinued operations
標準ラベル（日）: 非継続事業からの希薄化後１株当たり利益（損失）
定義: Diluted earnings (loss) per share from discontinued operations. [Refer: Diluted earnings (loss) per share; Discontinued operations [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Diluted earnings (loss) per share
標準ラベル（日）: 希薄化後１株当たり利益（損失）
定義: The amount of profit (loss) attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity (the numerator), divided by the weighted average number of ordinary shares outstanding during the period (the denominator), both adjusted for the effects of all dilutive potential ordinary shares. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]; Weighted average [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Profit or loss [abstract]

標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 純利益（純損失） [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revenue
標準ラベル（英）: Revenue
標準ラベル（日）: 収益
定義: The income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities. Income is increases in economic benefits during the accounting period in the form of inflows or enhancements of assets or decreases of liabilities that result in an increase in equity, other than those relating to contributions from equity participants.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest revenue calculated using effective interest method
標準ラベル（英）: Interest revenue calculated using effective interest method
標準ラベル（日）: 実効金利法を用いて計算した金利収益
定義: The amount of interest revenue calculated using the effective interest method. Effective interest method is the method that is used in the calculation of the amortised cost of a financial asset or a financial liability and in the allocation and recognition of the interest revenue or interest expense in profit or loss over the relevant period. [Refer: Revenue]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other income
標準ラベル（英）: Other income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の収益
定義: The amount of operating income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in inventories of finished goods and work in progress
標準ラベル（英）: Decrease (increase) in inventories of finished goods and work in progress
標準ラベル（日）: 製品及び仕掛品棚卸減少（増加）高
定義: The decrease (increase) in inventories of finished goods and work in progress. [Refer: Inventories; Current finished goods; Current work in progress]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other work performed by entity and capitalised
標準ラベル（英）: Other work performed by entity and capitalised
標準ラベル（日）: 自社製造資産への振替高
定義: The amount of the entity's own work capitalised from items originally classified as costs that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Raw materials and consumables used
標準ラベル（英）: Raw materials and consumables used
標準ラベル（日）: 原材料及び消耗品消費高
定義: The amount of raw materials and consumables used in the production process or in the rendering of services. [Refer: Current raw materials]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Employee benefits expense
標準ラベル（英）: Employee benefits expense
標準ラベル（日）: 従業員給付費用
定義: The expense of all forms of consideration given by an entity in exchange for a service rendered by employees or for the termination of employment.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Depreciation and amortisation expense
標準ラベル（英）: Depreciation and amortisation expense
標準ラベル（日）: 減価償却費及び償却費
定義: The amount of depreciation and amortisation expense. Depreciation and amortisation are the systematic allocations of depreciable amounts of assets over their useful lives.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reversal of impairment loss (impairment loss) recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識した減損損失（減損損失の戻入れ）
定義: The amount of impairment loss or reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other expenses
標準ラベル（英）: Other expenses, by nature
標準ラベル（日）: その他の費用（性質別）
定義: The amount of expenses that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note when the entity uses the 'nature of expense' form for its analysis of expenses. [Refer: Expenses, by nature]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other gains (losses)
標準ラベル（英）: Other gains (losses)
標準ラベル（日）: その他の利得（損失）
定義: The gains (losses) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) from operating activities
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) from operating activities
標準ラベル（日）: 営業活動からの純利益（純損失）
定義: The profit (loss) from operating activities of the entity. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Difference between carrying amount of dividends payable and carrying amount of non-cash assets distributed
標準ラベル（英）: Difference between carrying amount of dividends payable and carrying amount of non-cash assets distributed
標準ラベル（日）: 未払配当金の帳簿価額と分配した非現金資産の帳簿価額との差額
定義: The amount of difference between the carrying amount of dividends payable and the carrying amount of non-cash assets distributed when settling the dividends payable. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) on net monetary position
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) on net monetary position
標準ラベル（日）: 正味貨幣持高に係る利得（損失）
定義: The gains (losses) representing the difference resulting from the restatement of non-monetary assets, owners' equity and items in the statement of comprehensive income and the adjustment of index linked assets and liabilities in hyperinflationary reporting.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gain (loss) arising from derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) arising from derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost
標準ラベル（日）: 償却原価で測定する金融資産の認識の中止から生じた利得（損失）
定義: The gain (loss) arising from the derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Finance income
標準ラベル（英）: Finance income
標準ラベル（日）: 金融収益
定義: The amount of income associated with interest and other financing activities of the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Finance costs
標準ラベル（英）: Finance costs
標準ラベル（日）: 金融費用
定義: The amount of costs associated with financing activities of the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Impairment gain and reversal of impairment loss (impairment loss) determined in accordance with IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Impairment loss (impairment gain and reversal of impairment loss) determined in accordance with IFRS 9
標準ラベル（日）: IFRS第9号に従って算定した減損損失（減損利得及び減損損失の戻入れを含む）
定義: The amount of impairment loss, impairment gain or reversal of impairment loss that is recognised in profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 5.5.8 of IFRS 9 and that arises from applying the impairment requirements in Section 5.5 of IFRS 9.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Share of profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している関連会社及び共同支配企業の純利益（純損失）に対する持分
定義: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other income (expense) from subsidiaries, jointly controlled entities and associates
標準ラベル（英）: Other income (expense) from subsidiaries, jointly controlled entities and associates
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社、共同支配企業及び関連会社からのその他の収益（費用）
定義: The amount of income or expense from subsidiaries, jointly controlled entities and associates that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Associates [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) arising from difference between previous amortised cost and fair value of financial assets reclassified out of amortised cost into fair value through profit or loss measurement category
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) arising from difference between previous amortised cost and fair value of financial assets reclassified out of amortised cost into fair value through profit or loss measurement category
標準ラベル（日）: 償却原価から純損益を通じた公正価値の区分に分類変更した金融資産の従前の償却原価と公正価値との差額から生じた利得（損失）
定義: The gains (losses) arising from the difference between the previous amortised cost and the fair value of financial assets reclassified out of the amortised cost into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets at amortised cost]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from reclassification of financial assets out of fair value through other comprehensive income into fair value through profit or loss measurement category
標準ラベル（英）: Cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from reclassification of financial assets out of fair value through other comprehensive income into fair value through profit or loss measurement category
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じた公正価値の区分から純損益を通じた公正価値の区分への金融資産の分類変更により生じた過去にその他の包括利益に認識した利得（損失）の累計額
定義: The cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from the reclassification of financial assets out of the fair value through other comprehensive income into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedging gains (losses) for hedge of group of items with offsetting risk positions

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income tax relating to hedges of investments in equity instruments of other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Income tax relating to hedges of investments in equity instruments of other comprehensive income

標準ラベル（英）: Income tax relating to components of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に振り替えられることのないその他の包括利益の内訳項目に係る法人所得税

標準ラベル（英）: Income tax relating to share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income tax relating to components of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Income tax relating to components of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss [abstract]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income tax relating to financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income

標準ラベル（英）: Income tax relating to components of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に振り替えられるその他の包括利益の内訳項目に係る法人所得税

標準ラベル（英）: Income tax relating to share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss
