表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash flows from (used in) investing activities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flows from (used in) investing activities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資活動による（に使用された）キャッシュ・フロー [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash flows from losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flows from losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社又はその他の事業に対する支配の喪失により生じたキャッシュ・フロー（投資活動に分類）
定義: The aggregate cash flows arising from losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash flows used in obtaining control of subsidiaries or other businesses
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flows used in obtaining control of subsidiaries or other businesses, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社又はその他の事業に対する支配の獲得に使用されたキャッシュ・フロー（投資活動に分類）
定義: The aggregate cash flows used in obtaining control of subsidiaries or other businesses, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other cash receipts from sales of equity or debt instruments of other entities
標準ラベル（英）: Other cash receipts from sales of equity or debt instruments of other entities, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 他の企業の資本性金融商品又は負債性金融商品の売却によるその他の収入（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash inflow from sales of equity or debt instruments of other entities (other than receipts for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents and those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other cash payments to acquire equity or debt instruments of other entities
標準ラベル（英）: Other cash payments to acquire equity or debt instruments of other entities, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 他の企業の資本性金融商品又は負債性金融商品の取得のためのその他の支出（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow to acquire equity or debt instruments of other entities (other than payments for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents or those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other cash receipts from sales of interests in joint ventures
標準ラベル（英）: Other cash receipts from sales of interests in joint ventures, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業に対する持分の売却によるその他の収入（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash inflow from sales of interests in joint ventures (other than receipts for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents and those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other cash payments to acquire interests in joint ventures
標準ラベル（英）: Other cash payments to acquire interests in joint ventures, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業に対する持分を取得するためのその他の支出（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow to acquire interests in joint ventures (other than payments for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents or those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proceeds from sales of property, plant and equipment
標準ラベル（英）: Proceeds from sales of property, plant and equipment, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 有形固定資産の売却による収入（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash inflow from sales of property, plant and equipment, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Purchase of property, plant and equipment
標準ラベル（英）: Purchase of property, plant and equipment, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 有形固定資産の購入（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow for the purchases of property, plant and equipment, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proceeds from sales of intangible assets
標準ラベル（英）: Proceeds from sales of intangible assets, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 無形資産の売却による収入（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash inflow from sales of intangible assets, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Purchase of intangible assets
標準ラベル（英）: Purchase of intangible assets, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 無形資産の購入（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow for the purchases of intangible assets, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proceeds from sales of other long-term assets
標準ラベル（英）: Proceeds from sales of other long-term assets, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の長期資産の売却による収入（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash inflow from sales of long-term assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Purchase of other long-term assets
標準ラベル（英）: Purchase of other long-term assets, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の長期資産の購入（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow for the purchases of long-term assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proceeds from government grants
標準ラベル（英）: Proceeds from government grants, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 政府補助金による収入：投資活動に分類
定義: The cash inflow from government grants, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Government [member]; Government grants]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash advances and loans made to other parties
標準ラベル（英）: Cash advances and loans made to other parties, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 他者に対する現金貸出し（投資活動に分類）
定義: The amount of cash advances and loans made to other parties (other than advances and loans made by a financial institution), classified as investing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash receipts from repayment of advances and loans made to other parties
標準ラベル（英）: Cash receipts from repayment of advances and loans made to other parties, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 他者に対する貸付の返済による収入（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash inflow from the repayment of advances and loans made to other parties (other than advances and loans of a financial institution), classified as investing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash payments for futures contracts, forward contracts, option contracts and swap contracts
標準ラベル（英）: Cash payments for futures contracts, forward contracts, option contracts and swap contracts, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 先物契約、先渡契約、オプション契約及びスワップ契約に係る現金支払：投資活動に分類
定義: The cash outflow for futures contracts, forward contracts, option contracts and swap contracts except when the contracts are held for dealing or trading purposes or the payments are classified as financing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash receipts from futures contracts, forward contracts, option contracts and swap contracts
標準ラベル（英）: Cash receipts from futures contracts, forward contracts, option contracts and swap contracts, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 先物契約、先渡契約、オプション契約及びスワップ契約に係る現金収入：投資活動に分類
定義: The cash inflow from futures contracts, forward contracts, option contracts and swap contracts except when the contracts are held for dealing or trading purposes or the receipts are classified as financing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends received
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends received, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 配当金受取額（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash inflow from dividends received, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Dividends received]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest paid
標準ラベル（英）: Interest paid, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 利息支払額（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow for interest paid, classified as investing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest received
標準ラベル（英）: Interest received, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 利息受取額（投資活動に分類）
定義: The cash inflow from interest received, classified as investing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income taxes refund (paid)
標準ラベル（英）: Income taxes paid (refund), classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 法人所得税支払額（還付額）：投資活動に分類
定義: The cash flows from income taxes paid or refunded, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Income taxes paid (refund)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other inflows (outflows) of cash
標準ラベル（英）: Other inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の収入（支出）：投資活動に分類
定義: Inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as investing activities, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net cash flows from (used in) investing activities
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flows from (used in) investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 投資活動による（に使用された）キャッシュ・フロー
定義: The cash flows from (used in) investing activities, which are the acquisition and disposal of long-term assets and other investments not included in cash equivalents.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash flows from (used in) financing activities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flows from (used in) financing activities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動による（に使用された）キャッシュ・フロー [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proceeds from changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control
標準ラベル（英）: Proceeds from changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社に対する支配の喪失を生じない所有持分の変動から生じた収入
定義: The cash inflow from changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in a loss of control. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Payments from changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control
標準ラベル（英）: Payments from changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社に対する支配の喪失を生じない所有持分の変動から生じた支出
定義: The cash outflow for changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in a loss of control. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proceeds from issuing shares
標準ラベル（英）: Proceeds from issuing shares
標準ラベル（日）: 株式の発行による収入
定義: The cash inflow from issuing shares.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proceeds from issuing other equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Proceeds from issuing other equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: その他の資本性金融商品の発行による収入
定義: The cash inflow from issuing equity instruments that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Payments to acquire or redeem entity's shares
標準ラベル（英）: Payments to acquire or redeem entity's shares
標準ラベル（日）: 企業自身の株式の買戻し又は償還のための支払
定義: The cash outflow to acquire or redeem entity's shares.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Payments of other equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Payments of other equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: その他の資本性金融商品の支払
定義: The cash outflow for payments for equity instruments that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proceeds from borrowings
標準ラベル（英）: Proceeds from borrowings, classified as financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 借入れによる収入（財務活動に分類）
定義: The cash inflow from borrowings obtained. [Refer: Borrowings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Repayments of borrowings
標準ラベル（英）: Repayments of borrowings, classified as financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 借入金の返済（財務活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow to settle borrowings, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Borrowings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Payments of finance lease liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Payments of finance lease liabilities, classified as financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: ファイナンス・リース負債の支払（財務活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow for payment of finance lease liabilities, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Finance lease liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Payments of lease liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Payments of lease liabilities, classified as financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: リース負債の支払（財務活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow for payment of lease liabilities, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proceeds from government grants
標準ラベル（英）: Proceeds from government grants, classified as financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 政府補助金による収入：財務活動に分類
定義: The cash inflow from government grants, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Government [member]; Government grants]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends paid
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends paid, classified as financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 配当金支払額（財務活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow for dividends paid by the entity, classified as financing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest paid
標準ラベル（英）: Interest paid, classified as financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 利息支払額（財務活動に分類）
定義: The cash outflow for interest paid, classified as financing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income taxes refund (paid)
標準ラベル（英）: Income taxes paid (refund), classified as financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 法人所得税支払額（還付額）：財務活動に分類
定義: The cash flows from income taxes paid or refunded, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Income taxes paid (refund)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other inflows (outflows) of cash
標準ラベル（英）: Other inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の収入（支出）：財務活動に分類
定義: Inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as financing activities, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net cash flows from (used in) financing activities
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flows from (used in) financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動による（に使用された）キャッシュ・フロー
定義: The cash flows from (used in) financing activities, which are activities that result in changes in the size and composition of the contributed equity and borrowings of the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents before effect of exchange rate changes
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents before effect of exchange rate changes
標準ラベル（日）: 為替レート変動の影響を調整する前の現金及び現金同等物の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents before the effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents held in foreign currencies. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents; Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物に対する為替レートの変動の影響 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（英）: Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物に対する為替レートの変動の影響
定義: The effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents held or due in a foreign currency. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash and cash equivalents at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物
定義: The amount of cash on hand and demand deposits, along with short-term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and that are subject to an insignificant risk of changes in value. [Refer: Cash; Cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash and cash equivalents at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物
定義: The amount of cash on hand and demand deposits, along with short-term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and that are subject to an insignificant risk of changes in value. [Refer: Cash; Cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement of changes in equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Statement of changes in equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 持分変動計算書 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement of changes in equity [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Statement of changes in equity [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 持分変動計算書 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to changes in equity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Components of equity [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Components of equity [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本の内訳項目 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities. It also represents the standard value for the 'Components of equity' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity attributable to owners of parent [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity attributable to owners of parent [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 親会社の所有者に帰属する資本 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for equity attributable to the owners of the parent.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Issued capital [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Issued capital [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 発行済資本金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing issued capital.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share premium [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Share premium [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the amount received or receivable from issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Treasury shares [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Treasury shares [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 自己株式 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the entity’s own equity instruments, held by the entity or other members of the consolidated group.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other equity interest [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Other equity interest [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の資本持分 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for equity interest of an entity without share capital that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other reserves [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Other reserves [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing reserves within equity, not including retained earnings. It also represents the standard value for the 'Reserves within equity' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Retained earnings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revaluation surplus [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Revaluation surplus [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 再評価剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing accumulated revaluation surplus on the revaluation of assets recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of exchange differences on translation [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of exchange differences on translation [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 為替換算差額に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing accumulated exchange differences on the translation of financial statements of foreign operations recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of cash flow hedges [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of cash flow hedges [member]
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジに係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated portion of gain (loss) on a hedging instrument that is determined to be an effective hedge for cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本性金融商品に対する投資をヘッジするヘッジ手段に係る利得及び損益に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of time value of options [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of time value of options [member]
標準ラベル（日）: オプションの時間的価値の価値変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the time value of options when separating the intrinsic value and time value of an option contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the intrinsic value.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 先渡契約の先渡要素の価値変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the forward elements of forward contracts when separating the forward element and spot element of a forward contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the spot element.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 外貨ベーシス・スプレッドの価値変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of foreign currency basis spreads of financial instruments when excluding them from the designation of these financial instruments as hedging instruments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産に係る利得及び損失に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却可能金融資産の再測定による利得及び損失に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of share-based payments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of share-based payments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from share-based payments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of remeasurements of defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of remeasurements of defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度の再測定に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from remeasurements of defined benefit plans. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有に分類された非流動資産又は処分グループに関してその他の包括利益に認識され資本に累積された金額 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from amounts that are recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity that relate to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses from investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses from investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本性金融商品に対する投資からの利得及び損失に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses from investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の信用リスクの変動に起因する金融負債の公正価値の変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in fair value of financial liabilities attributable to change in the credit risk of the liabilities. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve for catastrophe [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve for catastrophe [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 異常危険準備金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing resources to provide for infrequent but severe catastrophic losses caused by events such as damage to nuclear installations or satellites or earthquake damage.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve for equalisation [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve for equalisation [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 平衡準備金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing resources to cover random fluctuations of claim expenses around the expected value of claims for some types of insurance contract (for example, hail, credit, guarantee and fidelity insurance) using a formula based on experience over a number of years.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of discretionary participation features [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of discretionary participation features [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 裁量権のある有配当性の準備金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from discretionary participation features. Discretionary participation features are contractual rights to receive, as a supplement to guaranteed benefits, additional benefits: (a) that are likely to be a significant portion of the total contractual benefits; (b) whose amount or timing is contractually at the discretion of the issuer; and (c) that are contractually based on: (i) the performance of a specified pool of contracts or a specified type of contract; (ii) realised and/or unrealised investment returns on a specified pool of assets held by the issuer; or (iii) the profit or loss of the company, fund or other entity that issues the contract.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Retained earnings [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Retained earnings [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 利益剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing an entity's cumulative undistributed earnings or deficit.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-controlling interests [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Non-controlling interests [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 非支配持分 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for equity in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Retrospective application and retrospective restatement [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Retrospective application and retrospective restatement [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 遡及適用及び遡及的修正再表示 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Currently stated [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Currently stated [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 現在の表示 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the information currently stated in the financial statements. It also represents the standard value for the 'Retrospective application and retrospective restatement' and 'Departure from requirement of IFRS' axes if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Previously stated [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Previously stated [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 過去の表示 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the information previously stated in the financial statements (ie before retrospective application or retrospective restatement).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) due to changes in accounting policy and corrections of prior period errors [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) due to changes in accounting policy and corrections of prior period errors [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計方針の変更及び過年度の誤謬の修正による増加（減少） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the financial effect of changes in accounting policy and corrections of prior period errors.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) due to changes in accounting policy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) due to changes in accounting policy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計方針の変更による増加（減少） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the financial effect of changes in accounting policy.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) due to changes in accounting policy required by IFRSs [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) due to changes in accounting policy required by IFRSs [member]
標準ラベル（日）: IFRSが要求する会計方針の変更による増加（減少） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the financial effect of changes in accounting policy required by IFRSs. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) due to voluntary changes in accounting policy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) due to voluntary changes in accounting policy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計方針の任意の変更による増加（減少） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the financial effect of voluntary changes in accounting policy.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) due to corrections of prior period errors [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) due to corrections of prior period errors [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 過年度の誤謬の修正による増加（減少） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the financial effect of corrections of prior period errors.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement of changes in equity [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Statement of changes in equity [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 持分変動計算書 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Equity
標準ラベル（日）: 資本
定義: The amount of residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Changes in equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Changes in equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本の増減 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Comprehensive income [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Comprehensive income [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 包括利益 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss)
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss)
標準ラベル（日）: 純利益（純損失）
定義: The total of income less expenses, excluding the components of other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益
定義: The amount of income and expense (including reclassification adjustments) that is not recognised in profit or loss as required or permitted by IFRSs. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: 包括利益
定義: The amount of change in equity resulting from transactions and other events, other than those changes resulting from transactions with owners in their capacity as owners.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Issue of equity
標準ラベル（英）: Issue of equity
標準ラベル（日）: 株式の発行
定義: The increase in equity through the issue of equity instruments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends recognised as distributions to owners
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends recognised as distributions to owners
標準ラベル（日）: 所有者への分配として認識した配当
定義: The amount of dividends recognised as distributions to owners.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase through other contributions by owners, equity
標準ラベル（英）: Increase through other contributions by owners, equity
標準ラベル（日）: 所有者によるその他の拠出による増加：資本
定義: The increase in equity through other contributions by owners that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Decrease through other distributions to owners, equity
標準ラベル（英）: Decrease through other distributions to owners, equity
標準ラベル（日）: 所有者へのその他の分配による減少：資本
定義: The decrease in equity through distributions to owners that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through other changes, equity
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through other changes, equity
標準ラベル（日）: その他の変動による増加（減少）：資本
定義: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Equity]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through treasury share transactions, equity
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through treasury share transactions, equity
標準ラベル（日）: 自己株式取引による増加（減少）：資本
定義: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from treasury share transactions. [Refer: Equity; Treasury shares]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control, equity
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control, equity
標準ラベル（日）: 支配の喪失には至らない子会社に対する所有持分の変動による増加（減少）：資本
定義: The increase (decrease) in equity through changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through share-based payment transactions, equity
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through share-based payment transactions, equity
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬取引による増加（減少）：資本
定義: The increase (decrease) in equity resulting from share-based payment transactions. [Refer: Equity]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amount removed from reserve of cash flow hedges and included in initial cost or other carrying amount of non-financial asset (liability) or firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied
標準ラベル（英）: Amount removed from reserve of cash flow hedges and included in initial cost or other carrying amount of non-financial asset (liability) or firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジ剰余金から除去して、公正価値ヘッジ会計が適用される非金融資産（負債）又は確定約定の当初の原価又は他の帳簿価額に算入した金額
定義: The amount removed from reserve of cash flow hedges and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) or a firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied. [Refer: Reserve of cash flow hedges]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amount removed from reserve of change in value of time value of options and included in initial cost or other carrying amount of non-financial asset (liability) or firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied
標準ラベル（英）: Amount removed from reserve of change in value of time value of options and included in initial cost or other carrying amount of non-financial asset (liability) or firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied
標準ラベル（日）: オプションの時間価値の価値変動に係る剰余金から除去して、公正価値ヘッジ会計が適用される非金融資産（負債）又は確定約定の当初の原価又は他の帳簿価額に算入した金額
定義: The amount removed from reserve of change in value of time value of options and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) or a firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied. [Refer: Reserve of change in value of time value of options]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amount removed from reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts and included in initial cost or other carrying amount of non-financial asset (liability) or firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied
標準ラベル（英）: Amount removed from reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts and included in initial cost or other carrying amount of non-financial asset (liability) or firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied
標準ラベル（日）: 先渡契約の先渡要素の価値変動に係る剰余金から除去して、公正価値ヘッジ会計が適用される非金融資産（負債）又は確定約定の当初の原価又は他の帳簿価額に算入した金額
定義: The amount removed from reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) or a firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied. [Refer: Reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amount removed from reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads and included in initial cost or other carrying amount of non-financial asset (liability) or firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied
標準ラベル（英）: Amount removed from reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads and included in initial cost or other carrying amount of non-financial asset (liability) or firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied
標準ラベル（日）: 外貨ベーシス・スプレッド価値変動に係る剰余金から除去して、公正価値ヘッジ会計が適用される非金融資産（負債）又は確定約定の当初の原価又は他の帳簿価額に算入した金額
定義: The amount removed from reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) or a firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied. [Refer: Reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total increase (decrease) in equity
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in equity
標準ラベル（日）: 資本の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in equity. [Refer: Equity]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Equity
標準ラベル（日）: 資本
定義: The amount of residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement of changes in net assets available for benefits [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Statement of changes in net assets available for benefits [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 給付のために利用可能な純資産の変動計算書 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets of benefit plan
標準ラベル（英）: Assets of benefit plan
標準ラベル（日）: 給付制度の資産
定義: The amount of assets held by retirement benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of basis of valuation of assets available for benefits
標準ラベル（英）: Description of basis of valuation of assets available for benefits
標準ラベル（日）: 給付のために利用可能な資産の評価基準の記述
定義: The description of the basis of valuation of assets available for benefits in retirement benefit plans.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of details of investment exceeding either five per cent of net assets available for benefits or five per cent of any class or type of security
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of details of investment exceeding either five per cent of net assets available for benefits or five per cent of any class or type of security
標準ラベル（日）: 給付のために利用可能な純資産の5％又は各種類別の有価証券の5％を超える投資の内訳の説明
定義: The explanation of the details of a single investment exceeding either 5% of the assets of a retirement benefit plan less its liabilities other than the actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits, or 5% of any class or type of security.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of details of any investment in employer
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of details of any investment in employer
標準ラベル（日）: 事業主に対する投資の内訳の説明
定義: The explanation of the details of any investment in the employer that a retirement benefit plan has.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities other than actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities other than actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits
標準ラベル（日）: 約束された退職給付の保険数理による現在価値以外の負債
定義: The amount of liabilities other than the actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits in retirement benefit plans. [Refer: Actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reconciliation of changes in net assets available for benefits [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Reconciliation of changes in net assets available for benefits [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 給付のために利用可能な純資産の増減の調整表 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net assets available for benefits at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Assets (liabilities) of benefit plan
標準ラベル（日）: 給付制度の資産（負債）
定義: The amount of assets of a retirement benefit plan less liabilities other than the actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Changes in net assets available for benefits [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Changes in net assets available for benefits [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 給付のために利用可能な純資産の増減 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Employer contributions
標準ラベル（英）: Employer contributions
標準ラベル（日）: 事業主掛金
定義: The amount of employer contributions to retirement benefit plans.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Employee contributions
標準ラベル（英）: Employee contributions
標準ラベル（日）: 従業員掛金
定義: The amount of employee contributions to retirement benefit plans.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investment income
標準ラベル（英）: Investment income
標準ラベル（日）: 投資収益
定義: The amount of investment income, such as interest and dividends.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other income
標準ラベル（英）: Other income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の収益
定義: The amount of operating income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Benefits paid or payable
標準ラベル（英）: Benefits paid or payable
標準ラベル（日）: 支払済給付又は未払給付
定義: The amount of benefits paid or payable for retirement benefit plans.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Administrative expenses
標準ラベル（英）: Administrative expenses
標準ラベル（日）: 管理費
定義: The amount of expenses that the entity classifies as being administrative.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other expense
標準ラベル（英）: Other expense, by function
標準ラベル（日）: その他の費用（機能別）
定義: The amount of expenses that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note when the entity uses the 'function of expense' form for its analysis of expenses.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax income (expense)
標準ラベル（英）: Tax expense (income), continuing operations
標準ラベル（日）: 税金費用（収益）：継続事業
定義: The aggregate amount included in the determination of profit (loss) for the period in respect of current tax and deferred tax that relate to continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Current tax expense (income); Deferred tax expense (income)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) on disposal of investments and changes in value of investments
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) on disposal of investments and changes in value of investments
標準ラベル（日）: 投資の処分益（損）及び投資の価値の変動
定義: The profit (loss) on disposal of investments and changes in the value of investments. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers from (to) other retirement benefit plans
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers from (to) other retirement benefit plans
標準ラベル（日）: 他の退職給付制度から（へ）の移転
定義: The increase (decrease) in net assets available for benefits resulting from transfers from (to) other retirement benefit plans. [Refer: Assets (liabilities) of benefit plan]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total increase (decrease) in net assets available for benefits
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in net assets available for benefits
標準ラベル（日）: 給付のために利用可能な純資産の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in net assets available for benefits. Net assets available for benefits are assets of a retirement benefit plan less liabilities other than the actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net assets available for benefits at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Assets (liabilities) of benefit plan
標準ラベル（日）: 給付制度の資産（負債）
定義: The amount of assets of a retirement benefit plan less liabilities other than the actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of funding policy
標準ラベル（英）: Description of funding policy
標準ラベル（日）: 積立方針の記述
定義: The description of the policy for the transfer of assets to an entity (the fund) separate from the employer’s entity to meet future obligations for the payment of retirement benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits
標準ラベル（日）: 約束された退職給付の保険数理による現在価値
定義: The present value of the expected payments by a retirement benefit plan to existing and past employees, attributable to the service already rendered.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of significant actuarial assumptions made and method used to calculate actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits
標準ラベル（英）: Description of significant actuarial assumptions made and method used to calculate actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits
標準ラベル（日）: 約束された退職給付の保険数理による現在価値を計算するために用いた重要な保険数理上の仮定及び方法の記述
定義: The description of significant actuarial assumptions made and the method used to calculate the actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits in retirement benefit plans. [Refer: Actuarial assumptions [member]; Actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of retirement benefit plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of retirement benefit plan
標準ラベル（日）: 退職給付制度の記述
定義: The description of a retirement benefit plan, either as part of the financial statements or in a separate report.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Names of employers and employee groups covered
標準ラベル（英）: Names of employers and employee groups covered
標準ラベル（日）: 対象となる事業主及び従業員グループの名称
定義: The names of employers and employee groups covered in retirement benefit plans.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of participants of retirement benefit plan receiving benefits
標準ラベル（英）: Number of participants of retirement benefit plan receiving benefits
標準ラベル（日）: 給付を受けている退職給付制度の加入者の人数
定義: The number of participants in a retirement benefit plan receiving benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of other participants of retirement benefit plan
標準ラベル（英）: Number of other participants of retirement benefit plan
標準ラベル（日）: 退職給付制度のその他の加入者の人数
定義: The number of other participants in a retirement benefit plan.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of type of retirement benefit plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of type of retirement benefit plan
標準ラベル（日）: 退職給付制度の種類の記述
定義: The description of the type of retirement benefit plans, ie defined contribution or defined benefit. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of whether participants contribute to retirement benefit plan
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of whether participants contribute to retirement benefit plan
標準ラベル（日）: 加入者が退職給付制度に拠出するかどうかの説明
定義: The explanation of whether participants contribute to retirement benefit plans.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of retirement benefits promised to participants
標準ラベル（英）: Description of retirement benefits promised to participants
標準ラベル（日）: 加入者に約束された退職給付の記述
定義: The description of the retirement benefits promised to participants in retirement benefit plans.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of any retirement benefit plan termination terms
標準ラベル（英）: Description of any retirement benefit plan termination terms
標準ラベル（日）: 退職給付制度の打切りの条件の記述
定義: The description of the termination terms of a retirement benefit plan.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of changes in description of retirement benefit plan
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of changes in description of retirement benefit plan
標準ラベル（日）: 退職給付制度の記述の変更の説明
定義: The explanation of the changes in the description of the retirement benefit plan during the period covered by the report.

標準ラベル（英）: Land

標準ラベル（英）: Buildings
標準ラベル（日）: 建物

標準ラベル（英）: Motor vehicles
標準ラベル（日）: 車両
定義: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing self-propelled ground vehicles used in the entity's operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total vehicles
標準ラベル（英）: Vehicles
標準ラベル（日）: 運搬具
定義: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing vehicles used in the entity's operations, specifically to include aircraft, motor vehicles and ships. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fixtures and fittings
標準ラベル（英）: Fixtures and fittings
標準ラベル（日）: 器具及び備品

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Office equipment
標準ラベル（英）: Office equipment
標準ラベル（日）: 事務機器
定義: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing equipment used to support office functions, not specifically used in the production process. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Bearer plants
標準ラベル（英）: Bearer plants
標準ラベル（日）: 果実生成型植物
定義: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing bearer plants. Bearer plant is a living plant that (a) is used in the production or supply of agricultural produce; (b) is expected to bear produce for more than one period; and (c) has a remote likelihood of being sold as agricultural produce, except for incidental scrap sales. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

標準ラベル（英）: Tangible exploration and evaluation assets

Effective 2019-01-01: The amount of property (land or a building - or part of a building - or both) held (by the owner or by the lessee as a right-of-use asset) to earn rentals or for capital appreciation or both, rather than for: (a) use in the production or supply of goods or services or for administrative purposes; or (b) sale in the ordinary course of business.

定義: The amount of current investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income]

標準ラベル（英）: Current financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産（流動）
定義: The amount of current financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income]

標準ラベル（英）: Current financial assets at amortised cost
標準ラベル（日）: 償却原価で測定する金融資産（流動）
定義: The amount of current financial assets measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total current financial assets

標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産（流動）
定義: The amount of current financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Categories of financial assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Categories of financial assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産の区分 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産：当初認識時又はその後に指定
定義: The amount of financial assets at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, classified as held for trading
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, classified as held for trading
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産：売買目的保有に分類
定義: The amount of financial assets at fair value through profit or loss classified as held for trading. A financial asset is classified as held for trading if: (a) it is acquired principally for the purpose of selling it in the near term; (b) on initial recognition it is part of a portfolio of identified financial instruments that are managed together and for which there is evidence of a recent actual pattern of short-term profit-taking; or (c) it is a derivative (except for a derivative that is a financial guarantee contract or a designated and effective hedging instrument). [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, mandatorily measured at fair value
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, mandatorily measured at fair value
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産：強制的に公正価値で測定
定義: The amount of financial assets mandatorily measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total financial assets at fair value through profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産
定義: The amount of financial assets that are measured at fair value and for which gains (losses) are recognised in profit or loss. A financial asset shall be measured at fair value through profit or loss unless it is measured at amortised cost or at fair value through other comprehensive income. A gain (loss) on a financial asset measured at fair value shall be recognised in profit or loss unless it is part of a hedging relationship, it is an investment in an equity instrument for which the entity has elected to present gains and losses in other comprehensive income or it is a financial asset measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets available-for-sale
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets available-for-sale
標準ラベル（日）: 売却可能金融資産
定義: The amount of non-derivative financial assets that are designated as available for sale or are not classified as (a) loans and receivables; (b) held-to-maturity investments; or (c) financial assets at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Derivative financial assets; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss; Held-to-maturity investments]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Held-to-maturity investments
標準ラベル（英）: Held-to-maturity investments
標準ラベル（日）: 満期保有投資
定義: The amount of non-derivative financial assets with fixed or determinable payments and fixed maturity that an entity has the positive intention and ability to hold to maturity other than: (a) those that the entity upon initial recognition designates as at fair value through profit or loss; (b) those that the entity designates as available for sale; and (c) those that meet the definition of loans and receivables. An entity shall not classify any financial assets as held to maturity if the entity has, during the current financial year or during the two preceding financial years, sold or reclassified more than an insignificant amount of held-to-maturity investments before maturity (more than insignificant in relation to the total amount of held-to-maturity investments) other than sales or reclassifications that: (i) are so close to maturity or the financial asset’s call date (for example, less than three months before maturity) that changes in the market rate of interest would not have a significant effect on the financial asset’s fair value; (ii) occur after the entity has collected substantially all of the financial asset’s original principal through scheduled payments or prepayments; or (iii) are attributable to an isolated event that is beyond the entity’s control, is non-recurring and could not have been reasonably anticipated by the entity. [Refer: Derivative financial assets; Held-to-maturity investments; Prepayments]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loans and receivables
標準ラベル（英）: Loans and receivables
標準ラベル（日）: 貸付金及び債権
定義: The amount of non-derivative financial assets with fixed or determinable payments that are not quoted in an active market, other than: (a) those that the entity intends to sell immediately or in the near term, which shall be classified as held for trading, and those that the entity, upon initial recognition, designates as at fair value through profit or loss; (b) those that the entity, upon initial recognition, designates as available for sale; or (c) those for which the holder may not recover substantially all of its initial investment, other than because of credit deterioration, which shall be classified as available for sale. An interest acquired in a pool of assets that are not loans or receivables (for example, an interest in a mutual fund or a similar fund) is not a loan or receivable. [Refer: Derivative financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定される金融資産
定義: The amount of financial assets that are measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. A financial asset shall be measured at fair value through other comprehensive income if both of the following conditions are met: (a) the financial asset is held within a business model whose objective is achieved by both collecting contractual cash flows and selling financial assets and (b) the contractual terms of the financial asset give rise on specified dates to cash flows that are solely payments of principal and interest on the principal amount outstanding. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資
定義: The amount of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産
定義: The amount of financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets at amortised cost
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at amortised cost
標準ラベル（日）: 償却原価で測定する金融資産
定義: The amount of financial assets at amortised cost. The amortised cost is the amount at which financial assets are measured at initial recognition minus principal repayments, plus or minus the cumulative amortisation using the effective interest method of any difference between that initial amount and the maturity amount, and adjusted for any impairment. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産
定義: The amount of assets that are: (a) cash; (b) an equity instrument of another entity; (c) a contractual right: (i) to receive cash or another financial asset from another entity; or (ii) to exchange financial assets or financial liabilities with another entity under conditions that are potentially favourable to the entity; or (d) a contract that will, or may be, settled in the entity’s own equity instruments and is: (i) a non-derivative for which the entity is, or may be, obliged to receive a variable number of the entity’s own equity instruments; or (ii) a derivative that will, or may be, settled other than by the exchange of a fixed amount of cash or another financial asset for a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments. For this purpose the entity’s own equity instruments do not include puttable financial instruments classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16A-16B of IAS 32, instruments that impose on the entity an obligation to deliver to another party a pro rata share of the net assets of the entity only on liquidation and are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32, or instruments that are contracts for the future receipt or delivery of the entity’s own equity instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融負債 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet definition of held for trading
標準ラベル（英）: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet definition of held for trading
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融負債：売買目的保有の定義に該当
定義: The amount of financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet the definition of held for trading. A financial liability is classified as held for trading if: (a) it is acquired or incurred principally for the purpose of selling or repurchasing it in the near term; (b) on initial recognition it is part of a portfolio of identified financial instruments that are managed together and for which there is evidence of a recent actual pattern of short-term profit-taking; or (c) it is a derivative (except for a derivative that is a financial guarantee contract or a designated and effective hedging instrument). [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently
標準ラベル（英）: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融負債：当初認識時又はその後に指定
定義: The amount of financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融負債
定義: The amount of financial liabilities that meet either of the following conditions: (a) they meet the definition of held for trading; or (b) upon initial recognition they are designated by the entity as at fair value through profit or loss. An entity may use this designation only when permitted by paragraph 4.3.5 of IFRS 9 (embedded derivatives) or when doing so results in more relevant information, because either: (a) it eliminates or significantly reduces a measurement or recognition inconsistency (sometimes referred to as ‘an accounting mismatch’) that would otherwise arise from measuring assets or liabilities or recognising the gains and losses on them on different bases; or (b) a group of financial liabilities or financial assets and financial liabilities is managed and its performance is evaluated on a fair value basis, in accordance with a documented risk management or investment strategy, and information about the group is provided internally on that basis to the entity’s key management personnel (as defined in IAS 24). [Refer: At fair value [member]; Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]; Derivatives [member]; Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial liabilities at amortised cost
標準ラベル（英）: Financial liabilities at amortised cost
標準ラベル（日）: 償却原価で測定する金融負債
定義: The amount of financial liabilities at amortised cost. The amortised cost is the amount at which financial liabilities are measured at initial recognition minus principal repayments, plus or minus the cumulative amortisation using the effective interest method of any difference between that initial amount and the maturity amount. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total financial liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Financial liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 金融負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that are: (a) a contractual obligation: (i) to deliver cash or another financial asset to another entity; or (ii) to exchange financial assets or financial liabilities with another entity under conditions that are potentially unfavourable to the entity; or (b) a contract that will, or may be, settled in the entity’s own equity instruments and is: (i) a non-derivative for which the entity is, or may be, obliged to deliver a variable number of the entity’s own equity instruments; or (ii) a derivative that will, or may be, settled other than by the exchange of a fixed amount of cash or another financial asset for a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments. For this purpose, rights, options or warrants to acquire a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments for a fixed amount of any currency are equity instruments if the entity offers the rights, options or warrants pro rata to all of its existing owners of the same class of its own non-derivative equity instruments. Also, for those purposes the entity’s own equity instruments do not include puttable financial instruments that are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16A-16B of IAS 32, instruments that impose on the entity an obligation to deliver to another party a pro rata share of the net assets of the entity only on liquidation and are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32, or instruments that are contracts for the future receipt or delivery of the entity’s own equity instruments. As an exception, an instrument that meets the definition of a financial liability is classified as an equity instrument if it has all the features and meets the conditions in paragraphs 16A-16B or paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]; Financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

標準ラベル（日）: 買戻し契約及び証券貸借に対する現金担保
定義: The amount of instruments sold with the intent to reacquire in repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities lent.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investment contracts liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Investment contracts liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 投資契約負債
定義: The amount of liabilities relating to investment contracts that fall within the scope of IAS 39 or IFRS 9.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Items in course of transmission to other banks
標準ラベル（英）: Items in course of transmission to other banks
標準ラベル（日）: 他の銀行への送金の過程にある項目
定義: The amount of items that have been transmitted to but not yet received and processed by other banks.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Other liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Miscellaneous equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Miscellaneous equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本の諸項目 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Capital reserve
標準ラベル（英）: Capital reserve
標準ラベル（日）: 資本準備金
定義: A component of equity representing the capital reserves.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Additional paid-in capital
標準ラベル（英）: Additional paid-in capital
標準ラベル（日）: 払込剰余金
定義: The amount received or receivable from the issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accumulated other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Accumulated other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益累計額
定義: The amount of accumulated items of income and expense (including reclassification adjustments) that are not recognised in profit or loss as required or permitted by other IFRSs. [Refer: IFRSs [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other reserves [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Other reserves [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の剰余金 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revaluation surplus
標準ラベル（英）: Revaluation surplus
標準ラベル（日）: 再評価剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the accumulated revaluation surplus on the revaluation of assets recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of exchange differences on translation
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of exchange differences on translation
標準ラベル（日）: 為替換算差額に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing exchange differences on translation of financial statements of foreign operations recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of cash flow hedges
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of cash flow hedges
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジに係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the accumulated portion of gain (loss) on a hedging instrument that is determined to be an effective hedge for cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 資本性金融商品に対する投資をヘッジするヘッジ手段に係る利得及び損益に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the accumulated gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of time value of options
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of time value of options
標準ラベル（日）: オプションの時間的価値の価値変動に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the time value of options when separating the intrinsic value and time value of an option contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the intrinsic value.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts
標準ラベル（日）: 先渡契約の先渡要素の価値変動に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the forward elements of forward contracts when separating the forward element and spot element of a forward contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the spot element.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads
標準ラベル（日）: 外貨ベーシス・スプレッドの価値変動に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of foreign currency basis spreads of financial instruments when excluding them from the designation of these financial instruments as hedging instruments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産に係る利得及び損失に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 売却可能金融資産の再測定による利得及び損失に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of share-based payments
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of share-based payments
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity resulting from share-based payments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of remeasurements of defined benefit plans
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of remeasurements of defined benefit plans
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度の再測定に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the accumulated remeasurements of defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale
標準ラベル（英）: Amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有に分類された非流動資産又は処分グループに関してその他の包括利益に認識され資本に累積された金額
定義: The amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity, relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale; Other reserves; Other comprehensive income; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses from investments in equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses from investments in equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 資本性金融商品に対する投資からの利得及び損失に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses from investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の信用リスクの変動に起因する金融負債の公正価値の変動に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in fair value of financial liabilities attributable to change in the credit risk of the liabilities. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve for catastrophe
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve for catastrophe
標準ラベル（日）: 異常危険準備金
定義: A component of equity representing resources to provide for infrequent but severe catastrophic losses caused by events such as damage to nuclear installations or satellites, or earthquake damage.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve for equalisation
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve for equalisation
標準ラベル（日）: 平衡準備金
定義: A component of equity representing resources to cover random fluctuations of claim expenses around the expected value of claims for some types of insurance contract.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of discretionary participation features
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of discretionary participation features
標準ラベル（日）: 裁量権のある有配当性の準備金
定義: A component of equity resulting from discretionary participation features. Discretionary participation features are contractual rights to receive, as a supplement to guaranteed benefits, additional benefits: (a) that are likely to be a significant portion of the total contractual benefits; (b) whose amount or timing is contractually at the discretion of the issuer; and (c) that are contractually based on: (i) the performance of a specified pool of contracts or a specified type of contract; (ii) realised and/or unrealised investment returns on a specified pool of assets held by the issuer; or (iii) the profit or loss of the company, fund or other entity that issues the contract.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of equity component of convertible instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of equity component of convertible instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 転換可能金融商品の資本部分に係る剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing components of convertible instruments classified as equity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Capital redemption reserve
標準ラベル（英）: Capital redemption reserve
標準ラベル（日）: 資本買戻し準備金
定義: A component of equity representing the reserve for the redemption of the entity's own shares.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Merger reserve
標準ラベル（英）: Merger reserve
標準ラベル（日）: 合併剰余金
定義: A component of equity that may result in relation to a business combination outside the scope of IFRS 3.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statutory reserve
標準ラベル（英）: Statutory reserve
標準ラベル（日）: 法定準備金
定義: A component of equity representing reserves created based on legal requirements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total other reserves
標準ラベル（英）: Other reserves
標準ラベル（日）: その他の剰余金
定義: A component of equity representing reserves within equity, not including retained earnings. [Refer: Retained earnings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net assets (liabilities) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Net assets (liabilities) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 純資産（負債） [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets
標準ラベル（英）: Assets
標準ラベル（日）: 資産
定義: The amount of resources: (a) controlled by the entity as a result of past events; and (b) from which future economic benefits are expected to flow to the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 負債
定義: The amount of present obligations of the entity arising from past events, the settlement of which is expected to result in an outflow from the entity of resources embodying economic benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net assets (liabilities)
標準ラベル（英）: Assets (liabilities)
標準ラベル（日）: 資産（負債）
定義: The amount of assets less the amount of liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net current assets (liabilities) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Net current assets (liabilities) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 正味流動資産（負債） [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current assets
標準ラベル（英）: Current assets
標準ラベル（日）: 流動資産
定義: The amount of assets that the entity (a) expects to realise or intends to sell or consume in its normal operating cycle; (b) holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) expects to realise within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) classifies as cash or cash equivalents (as defined in IAS 7) unless the asset is restricted from being exchanged or used to settle a liability for at least twelve months after the reporting period. [Refer: Assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Current liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 流動負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have an unconditional right to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net current assets (liabilities)
標準ラベル（英）: Current assets (liabilities)
標準ラベル（日）: 流動資産（負債）
定義: The amount of current assets less the amount of current liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets less current liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Assets less current liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資産から流動負債を控除 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets
標準ラベル（英）: Assets
標準ラベル（日）: 資産
定義: The amount of resources: (a) controlled by the entity as a result of past events; and (b) from which future economic benefits are expected to flow to the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Current liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 流動負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have an unconditional right to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets less current liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Assets less current liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 資産から流動負債を控除
定義: The amount of assets less the amount of current liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net debt
標準ラベル（英）: Net debt
標準ラベル（日）: 純債務
定義: The amount of net debt of the entity.

標準ラベル（英）: Analysis of income and expense [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 収益及び費用の分析 [タイトル項目]

標準ラベル（英）: Expense of restructuring activities
標準ラベル（日）: リストラクチャリング活動の費用
定義: The amount of expense relating to restructuring. Restructuring is a programme that is planned and controlled by management and materially changes either the scope of a business undertaken by an entity or the manner in which that business is conducted. Such programmes include: (a) the sale or termination of a line of business; (b) closure of business locations in a country or region or the relocation of activities from one country or region to another; (c) changes in management structure; and (d) fundamental reorganisations that have a material effect on the nature and focus of the entity's operations.

標準ラベル（英）: Domicile of entity

標準ラベル（英）: Legal form of entity

標準ラベル（英）: Name of ultimate parent of group

定義: The name of the ultimate controlling party of the group.

標準ラベル（英）: Length of life of limited life entity
標準ラベル（日）: 存続期間が有限の企業の存続期間
