表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement of IFRS compliance [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Statement of IFRS compliance [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: IFRS準拠の旨の記述 [テキストブロック]
定義: An explicit and unreserved statement of compliance with all the requirements of IFRSs.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Management conclusion on fair presentation as consequence of departure
標準ラベル（英）: Management conclusion on fair presentation as consequence of departure
標準ラベル（日）: 離脱の結果としての適正な表示に関する経営者の結論
定義: The conclusion by management that the financial statements present fairly the entity's financial position, financial performance and cash flows, when the entity has departed from a requirement of an IFRS.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of departure from IFRS
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of departure from IFRS
標準ラベル（日）: IFRSからの離脱の説明
定義: The explanation of the entity's departure from an IFRS, disclosing that it has complied with applicable IFRSs except that it has departed from a particular requirement to achieve a fair presentation. This includes the disclosure of the title of the IFRS from which the entity has departed, the nature of the departure (including the treatment that the IFRS would require), the reason why that treatment would be so misleading in the circumstances that it would conflict with the objective of financial statements set out in the Conceptual Framework, and the treatment adopted. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of financial effect of departure from IFRS
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of financial effect of departure from IFRS
標準ラベル（日）: IFRSからの離脱が及ぼす財務上の影響の説明
定義: The explanation of the financial effect of the departure from IFRS on items in the financial statements that would have been reported when complying with the requirement.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of nature of requirement in IFRS and conclusion why requirement is in conflict with objective of financial statements set out in Framework
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of nature of requirement in IFRS and conclusion why requirement is in conflict with objective of financial statements set out in Framework
標準ラベル（日）: IFRSの要求事項の内容及び要求事項が「フレームワーク」に示されている財務諸表の目的に反すると判断した理由の説明
定義: The explanation of the title of the IFRS in question, the nature of the requirement and the reason why management has concluded that complying with the requirement is so misleading in the circumstances that it conflicts with the objective of financial statements set out in the Conceptual Framework.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of adjustments that would be necessary to achieve fair presentation
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of adjustments that would be necessary to achieve fair presentation
標準ラベル（日）: 適正な表示を達成するために必要な調整の説明
定義: The explanation of the adjustments to items in the financial statements that management has concluded would be necessary to achieve a fair presentation in circumstances in which management concludes that compliance with a requirement in an IFRS would be so misleading that it would conflict with the objective of financial statements set out in the Conceptual Framework, but the relevant regulatory framework prohibits departure from the requirement.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of uncertainties of entity's ability to continue as going concern [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of uncertainties of entity's ability to continue as going concern [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が継続企業として存続する能力の不確実性の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of material uncertainties related to events or conditions that may cast significant doubt upon the entity's ability to continue as a going concern.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of fact and basis for preparation of financial statements when not going concern basis
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of fact and basis for preparation of financial statements when not going concern basis
標準ラベル（日）: 継続企業の前提によらない財務諸表を作成している旨及び作成基礎の説明
定義: The explanation of the fact that the entity has not prepared financial statements on a going concern basis and an explanation of the basis on which financial statements were prepared.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of why entity not regarded as going concern
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of why entity not regarded as going concern
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が継続企業とは認められない理由の説明
定義: The explanation of the reason why the entity is not regarded as a going concern.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason for using longer or shorter reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason for using longer or shorter reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: １年よりも長いか又は短い報告期間が使用されている理由の記述
定義: The description of the reason for using a longer or shorter reporting period when the entity changes the end of its reporting period and presents financial statements for a period longer or shorter than one year.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of fact that amounts presented in financial statements are not entirely comparable
標準ラベル（英）: Description of fact that amounts presented in financial statements are not entirely comparable
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表に表示されている金額が完全には比較可能でない旨の記述
定義: The description of the fact that amounts presented in the financial statements are not entirely comparable when an entity changes the end of its reporting period and presents financial statements for a period longer or shorter than one year.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reclassifications or changes in presentation [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reclassifications or changes in presentation [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 組替え又は表示の変更の開示 [テキストブロック]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reclassifications or changes in presentation [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 組替え又は表示の変更の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reclassifications or changes in presentation [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reclassifications or changes in presentation [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 組替え又は表示の変更の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to reclassifications or changes in presentation.

標準ラベル（日）: 組み替えた項目 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reclassified items [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reclassified items [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 組み替えた項目 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for items that have been reclassified when the entity changes their presentation or classification in its financial statements. It also represents the standard value for the 'Reclassified items' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reclassifications or changes in presentation [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reclassifications or changes in presentation [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 組替え又は表示の変更の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of reclassifications or changes in presentation
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of reclassifications or changes in presentation
標準ラベル（日）: 組替え又は表示の変更の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of reclassifications or changes in presentation.

標準ラベル（日）: 組替え又は表示の変更の金額
定義: The amount that is reclassified when the entity changes classification or presentation in its financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason for reclassifications or changes in presentation
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason for reclassifications or changes in presentation
標準ラベル（日）: 組替え又は表示の変更の理由の記述
定義: The description of the reason for the reclassifications or changes in presentation.

標準ラベル（日）: 比較金額の組替えが実務上不可能である理由の記述
定義: The description of the reason why the reclassification of comparative amounts is impracticable.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of necessary adjustments to provide comparative information
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of necessary adjustments to provide comparative information
標準ラベル（日）: 比較情報を提供するために必要な修正の内容の記述
定義: The description, when it is impracticable to reclassify comparative amounts, of the nature of the adjustments that would have been made if the amounts had been reclassified.

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of amounts to be recovered or settled after twelve months for classes of assets and liabilities that contain amounts to be recovered or settled both no more and more than twelve months after reporting date [text block]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of amounts to be recovered or settled after twelve months for classes of assets and liabilities that contain amounts to be recovered or settled both no more and more than twelve months after reporting date [abstract]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of amounts to be recovered or settled after twelve months for classes of assets and liabilities that contain amounts to be recovered or settled both no more and more than twelve months after reporting date [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of amounts to be recovered or settled after twelve months for classes of assets and liabilities that contain amounts to be recovered or settled both no more and more than twelve months after reporting date [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 12か月より後に回収又は決済が見込まれる金額の開示（回収又は決済の見込みが報告日後12か月以内と12か月より後の両方を含んだ資産及び負債のクラスに関して） [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to amounts to be recovered or settled after twelve months for classes of assets and liabilities that contain amounts to be recovered or settled both no more, and more than, twelve months after reporting date.

標準ラベル（英）: Maturity [axis]

定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表の作成に用いた測定基礎の説明 [テキストブロック]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of other accounting policies relevant to understanding of financial statements [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Description of other accounting policies relevant to understanding of financial statements [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表の理解に関連性のあるその他の会計方針の記述 [テキストブロック]
定義: The description of accounting policies relevant to an understanding of financial statements, which the entity does not separately disclose.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of management judgements in applying entity's accounting policies with significant effect on recognised amounts
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of management judgements in applying entity's accounting policies with significant effect on recognised amounts

標準ラベル（英）: New IFRSs [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 新しいIFRS [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for IFRSs that have been issued but are not yet effective. It also represents the standard value for the 'New IFRSs' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of expected impact of initial application of new standards or interpretations [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of expected impact of initial application of new standards or interpretations [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 新しい基準又は解釈指針の適用開始の予想される影響の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Title of new IFRS
標準ラベル（英）: Title of new IFRS
標準ラベル（日）: 新しいIFRSの名称
定義: The title of a new IFRS that has been issued but is not yet effective.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of impending change in accounting policy
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of impending change in accounting policy
標準ラベル（日）: 目前に迫っている会計方針の変更の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the impending change or changes in accounting policy due to a new IFRS that has been issued but is not yet effective.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Date by which application of new IFRS is required
標準ラベル（英）: Date by which application of new IFRS is required
標準ラベル（日）: 新しいIFRSの適用が要求される日付
定義: The date by which the entity is required to apply a new IFRS that has been issued but is not yet effective.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Date as at which entity plans to apply new IFRS initially
標準ラベル（英）: Date as at which entity plans to apply new IFRS initially
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が新しいIFRSの適用開始を予定している日付
定義: The date on which the entity plans to apply a new IFRS that has been issued but is not yet effective.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Discussion of impact that initial application of new IFRS is expected to have on financial statements
標準ラベル（英）: Discussion of impact that initial application of new IFRS is expected to have on financial statements
標準ラベル（日）: 新しいIFRSの適用開始が財務諸表に与えると予想される影響の検討
定義: The discussion of the impact that the initial application of a new IFRS is expected to have on financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of fact that impact of initial application of new IFRS is not known or reasonably estimable
標準ラベル（英）: Description of fact that impact of initial application of new IFRS is not known or reasonably estimable
標準ラベル（日）: 新しいIFRSの適用開始の影響が不明であるか又は合理的に見積れない旨の記述
定義: The description of the fact that the impact of the initial application of a new IFRS is not known or reasonably estimable. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of reason why it is impracticable to determine amounts of adjustments related to change in accounting policy
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of reason why it is impracticable to determine amounts of adjustments related to change in accounting policy
標準ラベル（日）: 会計方針の変更に係る修正の金額の算定が実務上不可能である理由の説明
定義: The explanation of the reason why it is impracticable to determine amounts of adjustments related to changes in accounting policy.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of changes in accounting estimates [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of changes in accounting estimates [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の見積りの変更の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of changes in accounting estimates.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of changes in accounting estimates [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of changes in accounting estimates [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の見積りの変更の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of changes in accounting estimates [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of changes in accounting estimates [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の見積りの変更の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the changes in accounting estimates.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accounting estimates [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Accounting estimates [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の見積り [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accounting estimates [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Accounting estimates [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の見積り [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for an asset, a liability or a periodic consumption of an asset, subject to adjustments that result from the assessment of the present status of, and expected future benefits and obligations associated with, assets and liabilities. It also represents the standard value for the 'Accounting estimates' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of changes in accounting estimates [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of changes in accounting estimates [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の見積りの変更の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of change in accounting estimate [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of change in accounting estimate [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の見積りの変更の内容の記述 [テキストブロック]
定義: The description of the nature of changes in accounting estimates that have effects in the current period or are expected to have effects in future periods.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in accounting estimate
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in accounting estimate
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の見積りの増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in an accounting estimate that has an effect in the current period or is expected to have an effect in future periods.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of fact that amount of change in accounting estimate is impracticable [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Description of fact that amount of change in accounting estimate is impracticable [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の見積りの変更の金額の算定が実務上不可能である旨の記述 [テキストブロック]
定義: The description of the fact that the amount of the effect in future periods due to changes in accounting estimates is not disclosed because estimating it is impracticable.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of accounting errors in prior periods [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of accounting errors in prior periods [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 過年度の会計上の誤謬の内容の記述 [テキストブロック]
定義: The description of the nature of accounting errors in prior periods.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of reason why it is impracticable to determine amounts for correction related to prior period errors
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of reason why it is impracticable to determine amounts for correction related to prior period errors
標準ラベル（日）: 過年度の誤謬に係る訂正の金額の算定が実務上不可能である理由の説明
定義: The explanation of the reason why it is impracticable to determine amounts for corrections related to prior period errors.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of interim financial reporting [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of interim financial reporting [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 期中財務報告の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for interim financial reporting.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of significant events and transactions
標準ラベル（英）: Description of significant events and transactions
標準ラベル（日）: 重要な事象及び取引の記述
定義: The description, in the entity's interim financial report, of events and transactions that are significant to an understanding of the changes in the financial position and performance of the entity since the end of the last annual reporting period. Information disclosed in relation to those events and transactions shall update the relevant information presented in the most recent annual financial report.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of cross-reference to disclosures presented outside interim financial statements
標準ラベル（英）: Description of cross-reference to disclosures presented outside interim financial statements
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表外に表示した開示への参照の記述
定義: The description of cross-reference to disclosures presented outside interim financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of accounting policies and methods of computation followed in interim financial statements [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Description of accounting policies and methods of computation followed in interim financial statements [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 期中財務諸表で採用している会計方針及び計算方法の記述 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of a statement that the same accounting policies and methods of computation are followed in the interim financial statements as compared with the most recent annual financial statements or, if those policies or methods have been changed, a description of the nature and effect of the changes.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of seasonality or cyclicality of interim operations
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of seasonality or cyclicality of interim operations
標準ラベル（日）: 期中営業活動の季節性又は循環性の説明
定義: The explanatory comments about the seasonality or cyclicality of interim operations.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of nature and amount of items affecting assets, liabilities, equity, net income or cash flows that are unusual because of their nature size or incidence
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of nature and amount of items affecting assets, liabilities, equity, net income or cash flows that are unusual because of their nature size or incidence
標準ラベル（日）: 資産、負債、資本、純利益又はキャッシュ・フローに影響を与える項目の内容及び金額の説明（性質、規模又は頻度からみて異例なもの）
定義: The explanation of the nature and amount of items affecting assets, liabilities, equity, net income or cash flows that are unusual because of their nature, size or incidence.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of nature and amount of changes in estimates of amounts reported in prior interim periods or prior financial years
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of nature and amount of changes in estimates of amounts reported in prior interim periods or prior financial years
標準ラベル（日）: 過去の期中報告期間又は過去の事業年度に報告された金額の見積りの変更の内容及び金額の説明
定義: The explanation of the nature and amount of changes in estimates of amounts reported in prior interim periods of the current financial year or changes in estimates of amounts reported in prior financial years, disclosed in the entity's interim financial report.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of issues, repurchases and repayments of debt and equity securities
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of issues, repurchases and repayments of debt and equity securities
標準ラベル（日）: 負債証券及び持分証券の発行、買戻し及び償還の説明
定義: The explanation of the issues, repurchases and repayments of debt and equity securities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends paid, ordinary shares
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends paid, ordinary shares
標準ラベル（日）: 配当金支払額：普通株式
定義: The amount of dividends paid by the entity on ordinary shares. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends paid, other shares
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends paid, other shares
標準ラベル（日）: 配当金支払額：その他の株式
定義: The amount of dividends paid by the entity on shares other than ordinary shares. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends paid, ordinary shares per share
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends paid, ordinary shares per share
標準ラベル（日）: 配当金支払額：普通株式１株当たり
定義: The amount of dividends paid per ordinary share.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends paid, other shares per share
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends paid, other shares per share
標準ラベル（日）: 配当金支払額：その他の株式1株当たり
定義: The amount of dividends paid per other share.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of events after interim period that have not been reflected
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of events after interim period that have not been reflected
標準ラベル（日）: 反映していない期中報告期間後の事象の説明
定義: The explanation of events after the interim period that have not been reflected in the financial statements for the interim period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of effect of changes in composition of entity during interim period
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of effect of changes in composition of entity during interim period
標準ラベル（日）: 期中報告期間における企業の構成の変化の影響の説明
定義: The explanation of the effect of changes in the composition of the entity during the interim period, including business combinations, obtaining or losing control of subsidiaries and long-term investments, restructurings and discontinued operations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Discontinued operations [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of compliance with IFRSs if applied for interim financial report
標準ラベル（英）: Description of compliance with IFRSs if applied for interim financial report
標準ラベル（日）: 期中財務報告書に適用している場合のIFRSへの準拠の記述
定義: The description of the compliance of the entity's interim financial report with IFRSs. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature and amount of change in estimate during final interim period
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature and amount of change in estimate during final interim period
標準ラベル（日）: 最終期中報告期間における見積りの変更の内容及び金額の記述
定義: The description of the nature and amount of change in an estimate of an amount reported in an interim period that is changed significantly during the final interim period of the financial year.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of events after reporting period [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of events after reporting period [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 後発事象の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for events after the reporting period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of body of authorisation
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of body of authorisation
標準ラベル（日）: 承認した機関の説明
定義: The explanation of who authorised the financial statements for issue.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Date of authorisation for issue of financial statements
標準ラベル（英）: Date of authorisation for issue of financial statements
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表の発行の承認日
定義: The date on which financial statements are authorised for issue.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of fact that entity's owners or others have power to amend financial statements after issue

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of non-adjusting events after reporting period [text block]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of non-adjusting events after reporting period [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 修正を要しない後発事象の開示 [タイトル項目]

標準ラベル（日）: 修正を要しない後発事象の開示 [表]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-adjusting events after reporting period [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Non-adjusting events after reporting period [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 修正を要しない後発事象 [軸]

定義: This member stands for events that occur between the end of the reporting period and the date when the financial statements are authorised for issue and are indicative of conditions that arose after the reporting period. It also represents the standard value for the 'Non-adjusting events after reporting period' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Major business combination [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Major business combination [member]

定義: This member stands for major business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

定義: This member stands for the disposal of a major subsidiary. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Abnormally large changes in asset prices or foreign exchange rates [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資産価格又は外国為替レートの異常に大きな変動 [メンバー]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Changes in tax rates or tax laws enacted or announced [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Changes in tax rates or tax laws enacted or announced [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 制定又は発表された税率又は税法の変更 [メンバー]

標準ラベル（英）: Entering into significant commitments or contingent liabilities [member]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of non-adjusting event after reporting period

定義: The amount of dividends proposed or declared after the reporting period but before financial statements are authorised for issue. Such dividends are not recognised as a liability at the end of the reporting period because no obligation exists at that time.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of hyperinflationary reporting [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of hyperinflationary reporting [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 超インフレ報告の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for financial reporting in hyperinflationary economies.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of fact that financial statements and corresponding figures for previous periods have been restated for changes in general purchasing power of functional currency
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of fact that financial statements and corresponding figures for previous periods have been restated for changes in general purchasing power of functional currency
標準ラベル（日）: 過去の期間に係る財務諸表及び対応する数値が機能通貨の一般購買力の変動について修正再表示されている旨の説明
定義: The explanation of the fact that financial statements and the corresponding figures for previous periods have been restated for changes in the general purchasing power of the functional currency and, as a result, are stated in terms of the measuring unit current at the end of the reporting period in hyperinflationary reporting.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of bases of financial statements that have been restated for changes in general purchasing power of functional currency
標準ラベル（英）: Description of bases of financial statements that have been restated for changes in general purchasing power of functional currency
標準ラベル（日）: 機能通貨の一般購買力の変動について修正再表示されている財務諸表の基礎の記述
定義: The description of whether the financial statements that have been restated for changes in the general purchasing power of the functional currency are based on a historical cost approach or a current cost approach in hyperinflationary reporting. [Refer: Cost approach [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of identity of price index
標準ラベル（英）: Description of identity of price index
標準ラベル（日）: 物価指数の個別特定の記述
定義: The description of the identity of the general price index used to restate financial statement information of an entity whose functional currency is the currency of a hyperinflationary economy.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level of price index
標準ラベル（英）: Level of price index
標準ラベル（日）: 物価指数の水準
定義: The value of the level of the general price index used to restate financial statement information of an entity whose functional currency is the currency of a hyperinflationary economy.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Price index movements
標準ラベル（英）: Price index movements
標準ラベル（日）: 物価指数の変動
定義: The movements in the general price index used to restate financial statement information of an entity whose functional currency is the currency of a hyperinflationary economy.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) on net monetary position
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) on net monetary position
標準ラベル（日）: 正味貨幣持高に係る利得（損失）
定義: The gains (losses) representing the difference resulting from the restatement of non-monetary assets, owners' equity and items in the statement of comprehensive income and the adjustment of index linked assets and liabilities in hyperinflationary reporting.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of business combinations [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of business combinations [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for business combinations.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature and financial effect of business combinations during period
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature and financial effect of business combinations during period
標準ラベル（日）: 期中の企業結合の内容及び財務上の影響の記述
定義: The description of the nature and financial effect of business combinations during the current reporting period. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature and financial effect of business combinations after reporting period before statements authorised for issue
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature and financial effect of business combinations after reporting period before statements authorised for issue
標準ラベル（日）: 報告期間後で財務諸表発行承認前の企業結合の内容及び財務上の影響の記述
定義: The description of the nature and financial effect of business combinations after the end of the reporting period but before the financial statements are authorised for issue. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of financial effect of adjustments related to business combinations
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of financial effect of adjustments related to business combinations
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合に関連した修正の財務上の影響の説明
定義: The explanation of the financial effects of the adjustments recognised in the current reporting period that relate to business combinations that occurred in the period or previous reporting periods. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Additional information about nature and financial effect of business combination
標準ラベル（英）: Additional information about nature and financial effect of business combination
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合の内容及び財務上の影響に関する追加的情報
定義: Additional information about the nature and financial effects of business combinations necessary to meet the objectives of IFRS 3. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of detailed information about business combinations [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of detailed information about business combinations [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合に関する詳細情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of detailed information about business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of detailed information about business combination [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of detailed information about business combination [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合に関する詳細情報の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of detailed information about business combination [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of detailed information about business combination [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合に関する詳細情報の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to details of business combinations.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Business combinations [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Business combinations [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Entity's total for business combinations [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Entity's total for business combinations [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合についての企業全体の合計 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the standard value for the 'Business combinations' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Business combinations [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Business combinations [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for transactions or other events in which an acquirer obtains control of one or more businesses. Transactions sometimes referred to as 'true mergers' or 'mergers of equals' are also business combinations as that term is used in IFRS 3.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Aggregated individually immaterial business combinations [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Aggregated individually immaterial business combinations [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 個々には重要性のない企業結合の合算 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the aggregation of business combinations that are individually immaterial. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of detailed information about business combination [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of detailed information about business combination [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合に関する詳細情報の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

標準ラベル（英）: Name of acquiree
標準ラベル（日）: 被取得企業の名称

標準ラベル（英）: Description of acquiree

定義: The description of the business or businesses that the acquirer obtains control of in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Date of acquisition
標準ラベル（英）: Date of acquisition
標準ラベル（日）: 取得日
定義: The date on which the acquirer obtains control of the acquiree in a business combination.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Percentage of voting equity interests acquired
標準ラベル（英）: Percentage of voting equity interests acquired
標準ラベル（日）: 取得した議決権付資本持分の割合
定義: The percentage of voting equity interests acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Description of primary reasons for business combination
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合の主な理由の記述

標準ラベル（日）: 移転された現金

[Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill; Business combinations [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities incurred
標準ラベル（日）: 引き受けた負債
定義: The fair value, at acquisition date, of liabilities incurred (for example, a liability for contingent consideration) as consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

定義: The number of instruments or interests issued or issuable at acquisition date for equity interests of the acquirer transferred as consideration in a business combination.

定義: The fair value, at acquisition date, of the consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

定義: The description of the fact and reasons why the range of outcomes from contingent consideration arrangements and indemnification assets cannot be estimated.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of fact that maximum amount of payment for contingent consideration arrangements and indemnification assets is unlimited
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of fact that maximum amount of payment for contingent consideration arrangements and indemnification assets is unlimited
標準ラベル（日）: 条件付対価契約及び補償資産に関する支払金額の上限が設けられていない旨の説明

標準ラベル（日）: 取得日時点で認識した偶発負債

定義: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for net identifiable assets acquired or liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

標準ラベル（日）: 取得日時点で認識した流動資産

標準ラベル（日）: 取得日時点で認識した非流動負債

標準ラベル（日）: 取得日時点で認識した流動負債

標準ラベル（日）: 取得日時点で認識した買掛金及びその他の債務

標準ラベル（日）: 取得日時点で認識した繰延税金負債
定義: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for deferred tax liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Deferred tax liabilities; Business combinations [member]]

標準ラベル（日）: 取得日時点で認識した借入金

標準ラベル（日）: 取得日時点で認識した繰延収益

標準ラベル（日）: 割安購入取引で認識した利得
定義: The amount of any gain recognised in a business combination in which the net of the identifiable assets acquired and the liabilities assumed exceeds the aggregate of the consideration transferred, non-controlling interest in the acquiree and fair value of the acquirer's previously held equity interest in the acquiree. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line item in statement of comprehensive income in which gain in bargain purchase transaction is recognised
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line item in statement of comprehensive income in which gain in bargain purchase transaction is recognised

定義: The description of the line item in the statement of comprehensive income in which a gain in a bargain purchase transaction is recognised. [Refer: Gain recognised in bargain purchase transaction]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons why bargain purchase transaction resulted in gain
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons why bargain purchase transaction resulted in gain
標準ラベル（日）: 割安購入取引で利得が生じた理由の記述
定義: The description of the reasons why a bargain purchase transaction resulted in a gain. [Refer: Gain recognised in bargain purchase transaction]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-controlling interest in acquiree recognised at acquisition date
標準ラベル（英）: Non-controlling interest in acquiree recognised at acquisition date

定義: The amount of non-controlling interest in the acquiree recognised at the acquisition date for business combinations in which the acquirer holds less than 100 per cent of the equity interests in the acquiree at the acquisition date. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of measurement basis for non-controlling interest in acquiree recognised at acquisition date
標準ラベル（英）: Description of measurement basis for non-controlling interest in acquiree recognised at acquisition date
標準ラベル（日）: 取得日時点で認識した被取得企業の非支配持分の測定基礎の記述
定義: The description of the measurement basis for a non-controlling interest in an acquiree recognised at the acquisition date for business combinations in which the acquirer holds less than 100 per cent of the equity interests in the acquiree at the acquisition date. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Non-controlling interest in acquiree recognised at acquisition date]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of valuation techniques and significant inputs used to measure non-controlling interest in acquiree measured at fair value
標準ラベル（英）: Description of valuation techniques and significant inputs used to measure non-controlling interest in acquiree measured at fair value
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値で測定した非支配持分の測定に用いた評価技法及び重要なインプットの記述
定義: The description of the valuation techniques and significant inputs used to measure non-controlling interest in an acquiree measured at fair value for business combinations in which the acquirer holds less than 100 per cent of the equity interests in the acquiree at the acquisition date. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Business combinations [member]; Valuation techniques [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Acquisition-date fair value of equity interest in acquiree held by acquirer immediately before acquisition date
標準ラベル（英）: Acquisition-date fair value of equity interest in acquiree held by acquirer immediately before acquisition date
標準ラベル（日）: 取得企業が取得日直前に保有していた被取得企業の資本持分の取得日公正価値
定義: The acquisition-date fair value of equity interest in the acquiree held by the acquirer immediately before the acquisition date in a business combination achieved in stages. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gain (loss) recognised as result of remeasuring to fair value equity interest in acquiree held by acquirer before business combination
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) recognised as result of remeasuring to fair value equity interest in acquiree held by acquirer before business combination
標準ラベル（日）: 取得企業が企業結合前に保有していた被取得企業への資本持分を公正価値に再測定した結果として認識した利得（損失）
定義: The gain (loss) recognised as result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree held by the acquirer before the business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line item of statement of comprehensive income in which gain or loss as result of remeasuring to fair value equity interest is recognised
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line item of statement of comprehensive income in which gain or loss as result of remeasuring to fair value equity interest is recognised
標準ラベル（日）: 資本持分を公正価値に再測定した結果生じた利得又は損失が認識されている包括利益計算書の表示科目の記述
定義: The description of the line item of the statement of comprehensive income in which the gain or loss is recognised as a result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree held by the acquirer before the business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

定義: The amount of revenue of the acquiree since the acquisition date included in the consolidated statement of comprehensive income. [Refer: Revenue]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) of acquiree since acquisition date
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) of acquiree since acquisition date
標準ラベル（日）: 取得日以降の被取得企業の純利益（純損失）
定義: The profit (loss) of the acquiree, since the acquisition date, included in the consolidated statement of comprehensive income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revenue of combined entity as if combination occurred at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Revenue of combined entity as if combination occurred at beginning of period
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合が期首に発生していたと仮定した場合の結合後企業の収益
定義: The revenue of the combined entity as though the acquisition date for all business combinations that occurred during the year had been as of the beginning of the annual reporting period. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Revenue]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) of combined entity as if combination occurred at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) of combined entity as if combination occurred at beginning of period
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合が期首に発生していたと仮定した場合の結合後企業の純利益（純損失）
定義: The profit (loss) of the combined entity as though the acquisition date for all business combinations that occurred during the year had been as of the beginning of the annual reporting period. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of fact and explanation of why disclosure of information on revenues and profit or loss is impracticable
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of fact and explanation of why disclosure of information on revenues and profit or loss is impracticable
標準ラベル（日）: 収益及び純損益に関する情報の開示が実務上不可能である旨及びその理由の説明
定義: The explanation of the fact and the reason why the disclosure of information on revenues and profit (loss) of the acquiree since the acquisition date and the combined entity as though the acquisition date for all business combinations that occurred had been as of the beginning of the reporting period is impracticable. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Revenue]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons why initial accounting for business combination is incomplete
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons why initial accounting for business combination is incomplete
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合の当初の会計処理が完了していない理由の記述
定義: The description of the reasons why initial accounting for business combination is incomplete. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of assets, liabilities, equity interests or items of consideration for which initial accounting is incomplete
標準ラベル（英）: Description of assets, liabilities, equity interests or items of consideration for which initial accounting is incomplete
標準ラベル（日）: 当初の会計処理が完了していない資産、負債、資本持分又は対価の項目の記述
定義: The description of the assets, liabilities, equity interests or items of consideration for which the initial accounting for a business combination is incomplete. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of any measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of any measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration

定義: The description of the nature of the measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration for which initial accounting for a business combination is incomplete. [Refer: Non-controlling interests; Measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration; Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration
標準ラベル（英）: Measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration
標準ラベル（日）: 特定の資産、負債、非支配持分又は対価の項目について認識した測定期間中の修正
定義: The amount of measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration if the initial accounting for a business combination is incomplete. The measurement period is the period after the acquisition date during which the acquirer may adjust the provisional amounts recognised for a business combination. [Refer: Non-controlling interests; Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in contingent consideration asset (liability)
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in contingent consideration asset (liability)

定義: The increase (decrease) in a contingent consideration asset (liability) relating to a business combination.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of any changes in recognised amounts of contingent consideration
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of any changes in recognised amounts of contingent consideration
標準ラベル（日）: 条件付対価について認識した金額の変動の説明
定義: The explanation of any changes in recognised amounts of contingent consideration assets or liabilities in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of any changes in range of undiscounted outcomes and reasons for those changes for contingent consideration

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of valuation techniques and key model inputs used to measure contingent consideration
標準ラベル（英）: Description of valuation techniques and key model inputs used to measure contingent consideration

定義: The description of valuation techniques and key model inputs used to measure contingent consideration assets or liabilities. [Refer: Valuation techniques [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gain (loss) that relates to identifiable assets acquired or liabilities assumed in business combination and is of such size, nature or incidence that disclosure is relevant to understanding combined entity's financial statements
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) that relates to identifiable assets acquired or liabilities assumed in business combination and is of such size, nature or incidence that disclosure is relevant to understanding combined entity's financial statements
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合で取得した識別可能な資産又は引き受けた負債に関連し、開示することが結合後企業の財務諸表の理解に関連性があるような規模、性質又は頻度である利得（損失）
定義: The gain (loss) that both: (a) relates to identifiable assets acquired or liabilities assumed in a business combination; and (b) is of such size, nature or incidence that disclosure is relevant to understanding the combined entity's financial statements. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of gain or loss that relates to identifiable assets acquired or liabilities assumed in business combination and is of such size, nature or incidence that disclosure is relevant to understanding combined entity's financial statements
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of gain or loss that relates to identifiable assets acquired or liabilities assumed in business combination and is of such size, nature or incidence that disclosure is relevant to understanding combined entity's financial statements
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合で取得した識別可能な資産又は引き受けた負債に関連し、開示することが結合後企業の財務諸表の理解に関連性があるような規模、性質又は頻度である利得又は損失の説明
定義: The explanation of the gain or loss that both relates to identifiable assets acquired or liabilities assumed in a business combination and is of such size, nature or incidence that disclosure is relevant to understanding the combined entity's financial statements. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Contingent liabilities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Contingent liabilities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 偶発負債 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for possible obligations that arise from past events and whose existence will be confirmed only by the occurrence or non-occurrence of one or more uncertain future events not wholly within the control of the entity; or, present obligations that arise from past events but are not recognised because (a) it is probable that an outflow of resources embodying economic benefits will be required to settle the obligations; or (b) the amount of the obligations cannot be measured with sufficient reliability. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of contingent liabilities' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Restructuring contingent liability [member]

標準ラベル（日）: リストラクチャリングに係る偶発負債 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a contingent liability for restructuring, such as the sale or termination of a line of business; closure of business locations in a country or region or relocation of activities from one country or region to another; changes in management structure; and fundamental reorganisations that have a material effect on the nature and focus of the entity's operations. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

定義: This member stands for a contingent liability for legal proceedings. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

標準ラベル（日）: 不利な契約に係る偶発負債 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a contingent liability for onerous contracts. An onerous contract is a contract in which the unavoidable costs of meeting the obligation under the contract exceed the economic benefits expected to be received under it. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Entity's total for related parties [member]

定義: This member stands for the standard value for the 'Categories of related parties' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Related parties [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Related parties [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 関連当事者 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for related parties. Related parties are persons or entities that are related to the entity that is preparing its financial statements (the reporting entity). (a) A person or a close member of that person’s family is related to a reporting entity if that person: (i) has control or joint control over the reporting entity; (ii) has significant influence over the reporting entity; or (iii) is a member of the key management personnel of the reporting entity or of a parent of the reporting entity. (b) An entity is related to a reporting entity if any of the following conditions applies: (i) The entity and the reporting entity are members of the same group (which means that each parent, subsidiary and fellow subsidiary is related to the others). (ii) One entity is an associate or joint venture of the other entity (or an associate or joint venture of a member of a group of which the other entity is a member). (iii) Both entities are joint ventures of the same third party. (iv) One entity is a joint venture of a third entity and the other entity is an associate of the third entity. (v) The entity is a post-employment benefit plan for the benefit of employees of either the reporting entity or an entity related to the reporting entity. If the reporting entity is itself such a plan, the sponsoring employers are also related to the reporting entity. (vi) The entity is controlled or jointly controlled by a person identified in (a). (vii) A person identified in (a)(i) has significant influence over the entity or is a member of the key management personnel of the entity (or of a parent of the entity). (viii) The entity, or any member of a group of which it is a part, provides key management personnel services to the reporting entity or to the parent of the reporting entity. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]; Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Parent [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Parent [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 親会社 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for an entity that controls one or more entities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Entities with joint control or significant influence over entity [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Entities with joint control or significant influence over entity [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業に対する共同支配又は重要な影響力を有している企業 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for entities that have joint control or significant influence over the entity. Joint control is a contractually agreed sharing of control of an arrangement, which exists only when decisions about the relevant activities require the unanimous consent of the parties sharing control. Significant influence is the power to participate in the financial and operating policy decisions of the investee, but not control or joint control of those policies.

定義: The amounts receivable resulting from related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

定義: The amount of outstanding commitments made by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

定義: The amount of outstanding commitments made on behalf of the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of terms and conditions of outstanding balances for related party transaction

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Provisions for doubtful debts related to outstanding balances of related party transaction
標準ラベル（英）: Provisions for doubtful debts related to outstanding balances of related party transaction
標準ラベル（日）: 関連当事者との取引の未決済残高に係る貸倒引当金
定義: The amount of provisions for doubtful debts related to the amount of outstanding balances in related party transactions. [Refer: Provisions]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expense recognised during period for bad and doubtful debts for related party transaction
標準ラベル（英）: Expense recognised during period for bad and doubtful debts for related party transaction

標準ラベル（英）: Amount incurred by entity for provision of key management personnel services provided by separate management entity

定義: The disclosure that related party transactions were made on terms equivalent to those that prevail in arm's length transactions, made only if such terms can be substantiated.

標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of whether entity applies exemption in IAS 24.25
標準ラベル（日）: 企業がIAS第24号第25項の免除を適用しているかどうかの説明

標準ラベル（日）: 政府の名称及び政府との関係の内容

標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of nature and amount of significant transactions

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of first-time adoption [text block]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of comparative information prepared under previous GAAP [abstract]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: IFRSs [member]
標準ラベル（英）: IFRSs [member]
標準ラベル（日）: IFRS [メンバー]

It also represents the standard value for the 'Financial effect of transition from previous GAAP to IFRSs' axis if no other member is used.

標準ラベル（英）: Effect of transition to IFRSs [member]

定義: This member stands for the financial effect of the transition from previous GAAP to IFRSs. [Refer: Previous GAAP [member]; IFRSs [member]]

標準ラベル（日）: 包括利益

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of effect of transition on reported financial performance

定義: The explanation of how the transition from previous GAAP to IFRSs affected the entity's reported financial performance. [Refer: Previous GAAP [member]; IFRSs [member]]

標準ラベル（日）: 企業がIFRSの適用を停止した理由の記述

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason why entity is resuming application of IFRSs
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason why entity is resuming application of IFRSs
標準ラベル（日）: 企業がIFRSの適用を再開しようとしている理由の記述

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of reasons why entity elected to apply IFRSs as if it had never stopped applying IFRSs
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of reasons why entity elected to apply IFRSs as if it had never stopped applying IFRSs

標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of cross-reference to interim financial statement disclosures for first-time adopter

定義: The explanation of cross-references to other published documents that include information that is material to understanding the entity's current interim period for first-time adopters of IFRSs.

定義: The disclosure of detailed information about financial instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of detailed information about financial instruments [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of detailed information about financial instruments [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融商品に関する詳細情報の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of detailed information about financial instruments [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of detailed information about financial instruments [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融商品に関する詳細情報の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to details of financial instruments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Classes of financial instruments [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Classes of financial instruments [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融商品のクラス [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial instruments, class [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial instruments, class [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融商品（クラス） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for aggregated classes of financial instruments. Financial instruments are contracts that give rise to a financial asset of one entity and a financial liability or equity instrument of another entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of financial instruments' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loan commitments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Loan commitments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: ローン・コミットメント [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for firm commitments to provide credit under pre-specified terms and conditions.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial guarantee contracts [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial guarantee contracts [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融保証契約 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for contracts that require the issuer to make specified payments to reimburse the holder for a loss it incurs because a specified debtor fails to make payment when due in accordance with the original or modified terms of a debt instrument.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Trade receivables [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Trade receivables [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売掛金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for trade receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Contract assets [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Contract assets [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 契約資産 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for contract assets. [Refer: Contract assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Lease receivables [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Lease receivables [member]
標準ラベル（日）: リース債権 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for receivables related to leases.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Mortgages [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Mortgages [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 住宅ローン [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a class of financial assets that represents loans to finance the purchase of assets where the asset acts as collateral to secure the loan.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loans to consumers [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Loans to consumers [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 消費者に対する貸付金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for loans that are made to individuals for personal use.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loans to corporate entities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Loans to corporate entities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 法人企業に対する貸付金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for loans made to corporate entities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loans to government [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Loans to government [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 政府に対する貸付金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for loans made to government.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of detailed information about financial instruments [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of detailed information about financial instruments [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融商品に関する詳細情報の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of accounting policy for recognising in profit or loss difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Description of accounting policy for recognising in profit or loss difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 当初認識時の公正価値と取引価格との差額の純損益への認識についての会計方針の記述 [テキストブロック]
定義: The description of the entity's accounting policy for recognising in profit or loss the difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price to reflect a change in factors (including time) that market participants would take into account when pricing the asset or liability. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reconciliation of aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Reconciliation of aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 当初認識時の公正価値と取引価格との間の純損益に未だ認識されていない差異の総額の調整表 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 当初認識時の公正価値と取引価格との間の純損益に未だ認識されていない差異の総額
定義: The aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price for financial instruments that is yet to be recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Changes in aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Changes in aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 当初認識時の公正価値と取引価格との間の純損益に未だ認識されていない差異の総額の増減 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through new transactions, aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through new transactions, aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 新しい取引による増加（減少）：当初認識時の公正価値と取引価格との間の純損益に未だ認識されていない差異の総額
定義: The increase (decrease) in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss resulting from new transactions. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through amounts recognised in profit or loss, aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through amounts recognised in profit or loss, aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識した金額による増加（減少）：当初認識時の公正価値と取引価格との間の純損益に未だ認識されていない差異の総額
定義: The increase (decrease) in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss resulting from amounts recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other increases, aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Other increases, aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: その他の増加：当初認識時の公正価値と取引価格との間の純損益に未だ認識されていない差異の総額
定義: The increase in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other decreases, aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Other decreases, aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: その他の減少：当初認識時の公正価値と取引価格との間の純損益に未だ認識されていない差異の総額
定義: The decrease in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total increase (decrease) in aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 当初認識時の公正価値と取引価格との間の純損益に未だ認識されていない差異の総額の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 当初認識時の公正価値と取引価格との間の純損益に未だ認識されていない差異の総額
定義: The aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price for financial instruments that is yet to be recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of conclusion why transaction price was not best evidence of fair value
標準ラベル（英）: Description of conclusion why transaction price was not best evidence of fair value
標準ラベル（日）: 取引価格が公正価値の最善の証拠ではなかったと判断した理由の記述
定義: The description of why the entity concluded that the transaction price was not the best evidence of fair value, including a description of the evidence that supports fair value.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Maximum exposure to credit risk
標準ラベル（英）: Maximum exposure to credit risk
標準ラベル（日）: 信用リスクに対する最大エクスポージャー
定義: The amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk without taking into account any collateral held or other credit enhancements (for example, netting agreements that do not qualify for offset in accordance with IAS 32). [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of collateral held as security and other credit enhancements and their financial effect in respect of amount that best represents maximum exposure
標準ラベル（英）: Description of collateral held as security and other credit enhancements and their financial effect in respect of amount that best represents maximum exposure
標準ラベル（日）: 保証として保有している担保及び他の信用補完、並びに信用リスクに対する最大エクスポージャーを最もよく表す金額に関してのそれらの財務的影響の記述
定義: The description of collateral held as security and other credit enhancements, and their financial effect (for example, a quantification of the extent to which collateral and other credit enhancements mitigate credit risk) in respect of the amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of collateral held as security and other credit enhancements
標準ラベル（英）: Description of collateral held as security and other credit enhancements
標準ラベル（日）: 保証として保有している担保及び他の信用補完の記述
定義: The description of collateral held as security and other credit enhancements in respect of the amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk. This includes a description of the nature and quality of the collateral held, an explanation of any significant changes in the quality of that collateral or credit enhancements and information about financial instruments for which an entity has not recognised a loss allowance because of the collateral. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about collateral held as security and other credit enhancements for credit-impaired financial assets [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Information about collateral held as security and other credit enhancements for credit-impaired financial assets [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 信用減損金融資産について保証として保有している担保及び他の信用補完に関する情報 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about the collateral held as security and other credit enhancements (for example, quantification of the extent to which collateral and other credit enhancements mitigate credit risk) for financial assets that are credit-impaired at the reporting date.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Maximum exposure to credit risk, financial instruments to which impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are not applied
標準ラベル（英）: Maximum exposure to credit risk, financial instruments to which impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are not applied
標準ラベル（日）: 信用リスクに対する最大エクスポージャー：IFRS第9号の減損の要求事項を適用しなかった金融商品
定義: The amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk in relation to financial instruments to which impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are not applied. [Refer: Maximum exposure to credit risk]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of collateral held as security and other credit enhancements and their financial effect in respect of amount that best represents maximum exposure, financial instruments to which impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are not applied
標準ラベル（英）: Description of collateral held as security and other credit enhancements and their financial effect in respect of amount that best represents maximum exposure, financial instruments to which impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are not applied
標準ラベル（日）: 保証として保有している担保及び他の信用補完、並びに信用リスクに対する最大エクスポージャーを最もよく表す金額に関してのそれらの財務的影響の記述：IFRS第9号の減損の要求事項が適用されていない金融商品
定義: The description of collateral held as security and other credit enhancements, and their financial effect (for example, a quantification of the extent to which collateral and other credit enhancements mitigate credit risk) in respect of the amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk of financial instruments to which impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are not applied. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of financial assets [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of financial assets [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of financial assets [abstract]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of financial assets [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to financial assets.

標準ラベル（英）: Classes of financial assets [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産のクラス [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets, class [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets, class [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産（クラス） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for aggregated classes of financial assets. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of financial assets' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets at amortised cost, class [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at amortised cost, class [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 償却原価で測定する金融資産（クラス） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the financial assets measured at amortised cost class. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Mortgages [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Mortgages [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 住宅ローン [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a class of financial assets that represents loans to finance the purchase of assets where the asset acts as collateral to secure the loan.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loans to consumers [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Loans to consumers [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 消費者に対する貸付金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for loans that are made to individuals for personal use.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loans to corporate entities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Loans to corporate entities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 法人企業に対する貸付金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for loans made to corporate entities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loans to government [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Loans to government [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 政府に対する貸付金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for loans made to government.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Trade receivables [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Trade receivables [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売掛金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for trade receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets at fair value, class [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at fair value, class [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値で測定する金融資産（クラス） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the financial assets measured at fair value class. [Refer: Financial assets; At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Trading securities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Trading securities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: トレーディング有価証券 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for financial instruments that (a) are acquired or incurred principally for the purpose of selling or repurchasing it in the near term; or (b) on initial recognition are part of a portfolio of identified financial instruments that are managed together and for which there is evidence of a recent actual pattern of short-term profit-taking. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Derivatives [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Derivatives [member]
標準ラベル（日）: デリバティブ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for financial instruments or other contracts within the scope of IFRS 9 with all three of the following characteristics: (a) Their value changes in response to the change in a specified interest rate, financial instrument price, commodity price, foreign exchange rate, index of prices or rates, credit rating or credit index, or other variable, provided in the case of a non-financial variable that the variable is not specific to a party to the contract (sometimes called the ‘underlying’); (b) They require no initial net investment or an initial net investment that is smaller than would be required for other types of contracts that would be expected to have a similar response to changes in market factors; (c) They are settled at a future date. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Option contract [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Option contract [member]
標準ラベル（日）: オプション契約 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a derivative financial instrument that gives the holder the right, but not the obligation, to purchase or sell an underlying asset for a specified price determined in advance. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Futures contract [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Futures contract [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 先物契約 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a standardised, exchange-traded contract for the purchase or sale of an underlying asset at a specified future date for a settlement price determined in advance.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Swap contract [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Swap contract [member]
標準ラベル（日）: スワップ契約 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a derivative financial instrument that involves the exchange of cash flow streams between the parties of the contract over a specified period. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Currency swap contract [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Currency swap contract [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 通貨スワップ契約 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a currency swap contract. [Refer: Swap contract [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest rate swap contract [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Interest rate swap contract [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 金利スワップ契約 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for an interest rate swap contract. [Refer: Swap contract [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Forward contract [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Forward contract [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 先渡契約 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a contract between two parties for the purchase or sale of an underlying asset at a specified future date for a settlement price determined in advance.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity investments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity investments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 持分投資 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for investments in equity instruments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets outside scope of IFRS 7, class [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets outside scope of IFRS 7, class [member]
標準ラベル（日）: IFRS第7号の範囲外の金融資産（クラス） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the financial assets outside the scope of IFRS 7 class. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Categories of financial assets [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Categories of financial assets [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産の区分 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets, category [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets, category [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産（区分） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for aggregated categories of financial assets. It also represents the standard value for the 'Categories of financial assets' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, category [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, category [member]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of financial assets [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of financial assets [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産
定義: The amount of assets that are: (a) cash; (b) an equity instrument of another entity; (c) a contractual right: (i) to receive cash or another financial asset from another entity; or (ii) to exchange financial assets or financial liabilities with another entity under conditions that are potentially favourable to the entity; or (d) a contract that will, or may be, settled in the entity’s own equity instruments and is: (i) a non-derivative for which the entity is, or may be, obliged to receive a variable number of the entity’s own equity instruments; or (ii) a derivative that will, or may be, settled other than by the exchange of a fixed amount of cash or another financial asset for a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments. For this purpose the entity’s own equity instruments do not include puttable financial instruments classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16A-16B of IAS 32, instruments that impose on the entity an obligation to deliver to another party a pro rata share of the net assets of the entity only on liquidation and are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32, or instruments that are contracts for the future receipt or delivery of the entity’s own equity instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets, at fair value
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets, at fair value
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産（公正価値）
定義: The fair value of financial assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Notional amount
標準ラベル（英）: Notional amount
標準ラベル（日）: 名目金額
定義: The nominal or face amount of a financial instrument, used to calculate payments made on that instrument.
