定義: The amount of additional allowance for credit losses of financial assets recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Utilisation, allowance account for credit losses of financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Utilisation, allowance account for credit losses of financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 目的使用：金融資産の貸倒引当金
定義: The decrease in an allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from the utilisation of the allowance. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reversal, allowance account for credit losses of financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Reversal, allowance account for credit losses of financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 戻入れ：金融資産の貸倒引当金
定義: The decrease in an allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from the reversal of impairment. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through net exchange differences, allowance account for credit losses of financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through net exchange differences, allowance account for credit losses of financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 正味の為替換算差額による増加（減少）：金融資産の貸倒引当金
定義: The increase (decrease) in an allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from the net exchange differences arising when the financial statements are translated from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through adjustments arising from passage of time, allowance account for credit losses of financial assets

定義: The increase (decrease) in the allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from adjustments arising from the passage of time. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through other changes, allowance account for credit losses of financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through other changes, allowance account for credit losses of financial assets

定義: The increase (decrease) in allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total increase (decrease) in allowance account for credit losses of financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in allowance account for credit losses of financial assets

定義: The amount of an allowance account used to record impairments to financial assets due to credit losses. [Refer: Financial assets]

定義: The amount of impairment loss on financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets; Impairment loss]

定義: The description of the entity's process for internal credit ratings. [Refer: Internal credit grades [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of relationship between internal and external ratings

標準ラベル（日）: 内部格付けと外部格付けの関係の記述
定義: The description of the relationship between internal and external credit ratings. [Refer: Internal credit grades [member]; External credit grades [member]]

定義: The amount of financial assets in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated when the entity initially applies IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

定義: The amount of financial assets in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated, and that were reclassified due to requirements of IFRS 9 when the entity initially applies IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets previously designated at fair value through profit or loss reclassified voluntarily, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets previously designated at fair value through profit or loss reclassified voluntarily, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（日）: 過去に純損益を通じた公正価値で測定するものに指定したが、任意に分類変更した金融資産：IFRS第9号の適用開始
定義: The amount of financial assets in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated, and that the entity voluntarily elected to reclassify when the entity initially applies IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at amortised cost, class [member]

定義: This member stands for the financial assets measured at amortised cost class. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets at fair value, class [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets at fair value, class [member]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Trading securities [member]

定義: This member stands for financial instruments that (a) are acquired or incurred principally for the purpose of selling or repurchasing it in the near term; or (b) on initial recognition are part of a portfolio of identified financial instruments that are managed together and for which there is evidence of a recent actual pattern of short-term profit-taking. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Derivatives [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Derivatives [member]
標準ラベル（日）: デリバティブ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for financial instruments or other contracts within the scope of IFRS 9 with all three of the following characteristics: (a) Their value changes in response to the change in a specified interest rate, financial instrument price, commodity price, foreign exchange rate, index of prices or rates, credit rating or credit index, or other variable, provided in the case of a non-financial variable that the variable is not specific to a party to the contract (sometimes called the ‘underlying’); (b) They require no initial net investment or an initial net investment that is smaller than would be required for other types of contracts that would be expected to have a similar response to changes in market factors; (c) They are settled at a future date. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Financial liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 金融負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that are: (a) a contractual obligation: (i) to deliver cash or another financial asset to another entity; or (ii) to exchange financial assets or financial liabilities with another entity under conditions that are potentially unfavourable to the entity; or (b) a contract that will, or may be, settled in the entity’s own equity instruments and is: (i) a non-derivative for which the entity is, or may be, obliged to deliver a variable number of the entity’s own equity instruments; or (ii) a derivative that will, or may be, settled other than by the exchange of a fixed amount of cash or another financial asset for a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments. For this purpose, rights, options or warrants to acquire a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments for a fixed amount of any currency are equity instruments if the entity offers the rights, options or warrants pro rata to all of its existing owners of the same class of its own non-derivative equity instruments. Also, for those purposes the entity’s own equity instruments do not include puttable financial instruments that are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16A-16B of IAS 32, instruments that impose on the entity an obligation to deliver to another party a pro rata share of the net assets of the entity only on liquidation and are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32, or instruments that are contracts for the future receipt or delivery of the entity’s own equity instruments. As an exception, an instrument that meets the definition of a financial liability is classified as an equity instrument if it has all the features and meets the conditions in paragraphs 16A-16B or paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]; Financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial liabilities, at fair value
標準ラベル（英）: Financial liabilities, at fair value
標準ラベル（日）: 金融負債（公正価値）
定義: The fair value of financial liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial liabilities]

定義: The amount of financial liabilities in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated when the entity initially applies IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

定義: The amount of financial liabilities in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated, and that were reclassified due to the requirements of IFRS 9 when the entity initially applies IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

定義: The amount of financial liabilities in the statement of financial position that were previously designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss but are no longer so designated, and that the entity voluntarily elected to reclassify when the entity initially applies IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in fair value of loans or receivables, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in fair value of loans or receivables, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 貸付金又は債権の公正価値の増加（減少）：金融資産の信用リスクの変動に起因するもの
定義: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of loans or receivables that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the loans and receivables determined either: (a) as the amount of change in their fair value that is not attributable to changes in market conditions that gave rise to market risk; or (b) using an alternative method that the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Market risk [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of loan or receivable, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of loan or receivable, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 貸付金又は債権の公正価値の増加（減少）の累計額：金融資産の信用リスクの変動に起因するもの
定義: The accumulated increase (decrease) in the fair value of loans or receivables that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the assets determined either: (a) as the amount of change in their fair value that is not attributable to changes in the market conditions that gave rise to the market risk; or (b) using an alternative method the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Market risk [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in fair value of loans or receivables related credit derivatives or similar instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in fair value of loans or receivables related credit derivatives or similar instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 貸付金又は債権に関連したクレジット・デリバティブ又は類似の金融商品の公正価値の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of credit derivatives or similar instruments related to loans or receivables. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of loans or receivables related credit derivatives or similar instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of loans or receivables related credit derivatives or similar instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 貸付金又は債権に関連したクレジット・デリバティブ又は類似の金融商品の公正価値の増加（減少）の累計額
定義: The aggregate increase (decrease) in the fair value of credit derivatives or similar instruments related to loans or receivables. [Refer: Derivatives [member]; Increase (decrease) in fair value of loans or receivables related credit derivatives or similar instruments]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した金融資産 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Maximum exposure to credit risk of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Maximum exposure to credit risk of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した金融資産の信用リスクに対する最大エクスポージャー
定義: The maximum exposure to the credit risk of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amount by which financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss related credit derivatives or similar instruments mitigate maximum exposure to credit risk
標準ラベル（英）: Amount by which financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss related credit derivatives or similar instruments mitigate maximum exposure to credit risk
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した金融資産に関連したクレジット・デリバティブ又は類似の金融商品が信用リスクに対する最大エクスポージャーを軽減している金額
定義: The amount by which credit derivatives or similar instruments related to financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss mitigate maximum exposure to credit risk. [Refer: Loans and receivables; Credit risk [member]; Derivatives [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した金融資産の公正価値の増加（減少）：金融資産の信用リスクの変動に起因
定義: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of a financial asset (or group of financial assets) designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of that asset determined either: (a) as the amount of change in its fair value that is not attributable to changes in market conditions that give rise to market risk ; or (b) using an alternative method the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した金融資産の公正価値の増加（減少）の累計額：金融資産の信用リスクの変動に起因するもの
定義: The accumulated increase (decrease) in the fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the assets determined either: (a) as the amount of change in their fair value that is not attributable to changes in market conditions that gave rise to market risk; or (b) using an alternative method that the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Market risk [member]; Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss related credit derivatives or similar instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss related credit derivatives or similar instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した金融資産に関連したクレジット・デリバティブ又は類似の金融商品の公正価値の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of credit derivatives or similar instruments related to financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Derivatives [member]; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss related credit derivatives or similar instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss related credit derivatives or similar instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した金融資産に関連したクレジット・デリバティブ又は類似の金融商品の公正価値の増加（減少）の累計額
定義: The accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of credit derivatives or similar instruments related to financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Derivatives [member]; Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss related credit derivatives or similar instruments; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Designated financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Designated financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定するものに指定された金融負債 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial liability, attributable to changes in credit risk of liability
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial liability, attributable to changes in credit risk of liability
標準ラベル（日）: 金融負債の公正価値の増加（減少）：負債の信用リスクの変動に起因するもの
定義: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of a financial liability that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of that liability. [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of financial liability, attributable to changes in credit risk of liability
標準ラベル（英）: Accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of financial liability, attributable to changes in credit risk of liability
標準ラベル（日）: 金融負債の公正価値の増加（減少）の累計額：負債の信用リスクの変動に起因するもの
定義: The accumulated increase (decrease) in the fair value of financial liabilities that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the liabilities. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Market risk [member]; Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial liability, attributable to changes in credit risk of liability]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Difference between carrying amount of financial liability and amount contractually required to pay at maturity to holder of obligation
標準ラベル（英）: Difference between carrying amount of financial liability and amount contractually required to pay at maturity to holder of obligation
標準ラベル（日）: 金融負債の帳簿価額と満期時に当該債務の保有者に契約上支払う必要のある金額との間の差額
定義: The amount by which the carrying amount of a financial liability is more (less) than the amount that the entity would be contractually required to pay at maturity to the holder of the obligation. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers of cumulative gain (loss) within equity when changes in liability's credit risk are presented in other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers of cumulative gain (loss) within equity when changes in liability's credit risk are presented in other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の信用リスクの変動をその他の包括利益に表示している場合の、資本の中での利得（損失）累計額の振替
定義: The amount of transfers within equity of the cumulative gain (loss) on financial liabilities designated as at fair value through profit or loss for which changes in the liability's credit risk are presented in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers of cumulative gain (loss) within equity when changes in liability's credit risk are presented in other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers of cumulative gain (loss) within equity when changes in liability's credit risk are presented in other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の信用リスクの変動をその他の包括利益に表示している場合の、資本の中での利得（損失）累計額の振替の理由の記述
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers within equity of the cumulative gain (loss) on a financial liability designated as at fair value through profit or loss when the entity is required to present the effects of changes in that liability’s credit risk in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss; Transfers of cumulative gain (loss) within equity when changes in liability's credit risk are presented in other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amount presented in other comprehensive income realised at derecognition of financial liability
標準ラベル（英）: Amount presented in other comprehensive income realised at derecognition of financial liability
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益に表示されている金額のうち金融負債の認識の中止の際に実現した金額
定義: The amount presented in other comprehensive income that was realised at derecognition of financial liabilities designated at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of methods to determine amount of changes in fair value of financial assets and financial liabilities attributable to changes in credit risk
標準ラベル（英）: Description of methods to determine amount of changes in fair value of financial assets and financial liabilities attributable to changes in credit risk
標準ラベル（日）: 信用リスクの変動に起因する金融資産及び金融負債の公正価値の変動額の算定方法の記述
定義: The description of the methods used to determine the amount of changes in the fair value of financial assets and financial liabilities attributable to changes in credit risk, including an explanation of why the method is appropriate. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons and relevant factors why amount of changes in fair value of financial assets and financial liabilities attributable to changes in credit risk are not faithfully represented
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons and relevant factors why amount of changes in fair value of financial assets and financial liabilities attributable to changes in credit risk are not faithfully represented
標準ラベル（日）: 信用リスクの変動に起因する金融資産及び金融負債の公正価値の変動額が忠実に表現されていない理由及び関連する要因の記述
定義: The description of the reasons and relevant factors why the disclosure for changes in the fair value of financial assets and financial liabilities attributable to changes in credit risk does not faithfully represent those changes. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of methodology or methodologies used to determine whether presenting effects of changes in liability's credit risk in other comprehensive income would create or enlarge accounting mismatch in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Description of methodology or methodologies used to determine whether presenting effects of changes in liability's credit risk in other comprehensive income would create or enlarge accounting mismatch in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の信用リスクの変動の影響をその他の包括利益に表示することが純損益における会計上のミスマッチを創出又は拡大することになるかどうかを判定するために用いた方法論の記述
定義: The description of the methodology or methodologies used to determine whether presenting the effects of changes in a financial liability's credit risk in other comprehensive income would create or enlarge an accounting mismatch in profit or loss. If an entity is required to present the effects of changes in a liability’s credit risk in profit or loss, the disclosure must include a detailed description of the economic relationship described between the characteristics of the liability and the characteristics of the other financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss whose value was changed as a result of changes in the liability's credit risk. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Description of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資の記述
定義: The description of the investments in equity instruments that have been designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason for using presentation alternative
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason for using presentation alternative
標準ラベル（日）: 表示の選択肢を使用する理由の記述
定義: The description of the reasons for making the irrevocable election to present subsequent changes in the fair value of an investment in an equity instrument that is not held for trading in other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資の公正価値の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資の公正価値の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [table]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資の公正価値の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. It also represents the standard value for the 'Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資の公正価値の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資
定義: The amount of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends recognised for investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income, held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends recognised for investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income, held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資について認識した配当：報告期間の末日現在で保有
定義: The amount of dividends related to investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income, held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends recognised for investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income, derecognised during period
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends recognised for investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income, derecognised during period
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資について認識した配当：期中に認識の中止
定義: The amount of dividends related to investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income, derecognised during the reporting period. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of transfers of cumulative gain or loss within equity of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of transfers of cumulative gain or loss within equity of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資の利得又は損失の累計額の資本の中での振替
定義: The explanation of transfers of the cumulative gain or loss within equity for investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason for disposing of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason for disposing of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資を処分した理由の記述
定義: The description of the reason for disposing of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income at date of derecognition
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income at date of derecognition
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資の認識の中止日現在の公正価値
定義: The fair value at the date of the derecognition of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cumulative gain (loss) on disposal of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Cumulative gain (loss) on disposal of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定するものとして指定した資本性金融商品に対する投資の処分による利得（損失）の累計額
定義: The cumulative gain (loss) on disposal of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reclassification out of financial assets at fair value through profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Reclassification out of financial assets at fair value through profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産からの分類変更
定義: The amount of financial assets reclassified out of the at fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reclassification into financial assets at fair value through profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Reclassification into financial assets at fair value through profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産への分類変更
定義: The amount of financial assets reclassified into the at fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reclassification out of available-for-sale financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Reclassification out of available-for-sale financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 売却可能金融資産からの分類変更
定義: The amount of financial assets reclassified out of the available-for-sale category. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reclassification into available-for-sale financial assets

標準ラベル（日）: 売却可能金融資産への分類変更

標準ラベル（英）: Counterparties [axis]

標準ラベル（英）: Counterparties [member]

標準ラベル（英）: Individually insignificant counterparties [member]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 相殺、強制可能なマスターネッティング契約又は類似の契約の対象となっている金融資産の純額 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements in statement of financial position [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements in statement of financial position [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 相殺、強制可能なマスターネッティング契約又は類似の契約の対象となっている財政状態計算書上の金融資産の純額 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gross financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements
標準ラベル（英）: Gross financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements
標準ラベル（日）: 相殺、強制可能なマスターネッティング契約又は類似の契約の対象となっている金融資産の総額
定義: The gross amount of recognised financial assets that are subject either to offsetting or to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gross financial liabilities set off against financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements
標準ラベル（英）: Gross financial liabilities set off against financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements
標準ラベル（日）: 相殺、強制可能なマスターネッティング契約又は類似の契約の対象となっている、金融資産と相殺した金融負債の総額
定義: The amount of financial liabilities set off against financial assets when an entity: (a) currently has a legally enforceable right to set off the recognised amounts; and (b) intends either to settle on a net basis or to realise the asset and settle the liability simultaneously. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements in statement of financial position
標準ラベル（英）: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements in statement of financial position
標準ラベル（日）: 相殺、強制可能なマスターネッティング契約又は類似の契約の対象となっている財政状態計算書上の金融資産の純額
定義: The net amount of financial assets that are subject either to offsetting or to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement, presented in the statement of financial position. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amounts subject to enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement not set off against financial assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Amounts subject to enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement not set off against financial assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 強制可能なマスターネッティング契約又は類似の契約の対象となっている金額で、金融資産と相殺されていないもの [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial instruments subject to enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement not set off against financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Financial instruments subject to enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement not set off against financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 強制可能なマスターネッティング契約又は類似の契約の対象となっている金融商品で、金融資産と相殺されていないもの
定義: The amount of financial instruments subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement that are not set off against financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

標準ラベル（英）: Cash collateral received subject to enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement not set off against financial assets

定義: The amount of cash collateral received that is subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement and that is not set off against financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total amounts subject to enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement not set off against financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Amounts subject to enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement not set off against financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 強制可能なマスターネッティング契約又は類似の契約の対象となっている金額で、金融資産と相殺されていないもの
定義: The amounts that are subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement and that are not set off against financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements
標準ラベル（英）: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements

定義: The amount remaining after deducting the amounts subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement that were not set off against financial assets, from the net amount of financial assets subject to offsetting or subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement presented in the statement of financial position.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of rights of set-off associated with financial assets subject to enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement
標準ラベル（英）: Description of rights of set-off associated with financial assets subject to enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement

定義: The description of the rights of set-off associated with the entity's recognised financial assets subject to enforceable master netting arrangements and similar agreements, including the nature of those rights. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of measurement differences for financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements
標準ラベル（英）: Description of measurement differences for financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reconciliation of financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements to individual line items in statement of financial position [text block]

標準ラベル（日）: 借入金の元本、利息、減債基金又は償還条件に関する当期中の契約違反の詳細の記述
定義: The description of details of defaults during the period of principal, interest, sinking fund or redemption terms of loans payable.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loans payable in default
標準ラベル（英）: Loans payable in default
標準ラベル（日）: 債務不履行となっている借入金
定義: The amount of loans payable in default.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of whether default was remedied or terms of loans payable were renegotiated before financial statements were authorised for issue
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of whether default was remedied or terms of loans payable were renegotiated before financial statements were authorised for issue
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表発行の承認前に、債務不履行の解消又は借入金の条件の再交渉が行われたかどうかの説明
定義: The explanation of whether a default on loans payable was remedied, or terms of the loans payable were renegotiated, before the financial statements were authorised for issue.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of details of breaches which permitted lender to demand accelerated repayment during period of principal, interest, sinking fund, or redemption terms of loans payable
標準ラベル（英）: Description of details of breaches which permitted lender to demand accelerated repayment during period of principal, interest, sinking fund, or redemption terms of loans payable
標準ラベル（日）: 借入金の元本、利息、減債基金又は償還条件に関する当期中の契約違反（貸手が即時返済の請求ができるもの）の詳細の記述
定義: The description of the details of breaches during the period of principal, interest, sinking fund or redemption terms of loans payable that permitted the lender to demand accelerated repayment.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loans payable in breach which permitted lender to demand accelerated repayment
標準ラベル（英）: Loans payable in breach which permitted lender to demand accelerated repayment
標準ラベル（日）: 契約違反となっている借入金（貸手が即時返済の請求ができるもの）
定義: The amount of loans payable in breach of the terms that permitted the lender to demand accelerated repayment.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of whether breaches which permitted lender to demand accelerated repayment were remedied or terms of loans payable were renegotiated before financial statements were authorised for issue
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of whether breaches which permitted lender to demand accelerated repayment were remedied or terms of loans payable were renegotiated before financial statements were authorised for issue
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表発行の承認前に、債務不履行（貸手が即時返済の請求ができるもの）の解消又は借入金の条件の再交渉が行われたかどうかの説明
定義: The explanation of whether breaches of loan terms that permitted the lender to demand accelerated repayment were remedied, or terms of loans payable were renegotiated, before the financial statements were authorised for issue.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value hedges [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value hedges [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヘッジ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for hedges of the exposure to changes in fair value of a recognised asset or liability or an unrecognised firm commitment, or an identified portion of such an asset, liability or firm commitment, that is attributable to a particular risk and could affect profit or loss. [Refer: Hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash flow hedges [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flow hedges [member]
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for hedges of the exposure to variability in cash flows that (a) are attributable to a particular risk associated with a recognised asset or liability (such as all or some future interest payments on variable rate debt) or a highly probable forecast transaction; and (b) could affect profit or loss. [Refer: Hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedges of net investment in foreign operations [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Hedges of net investment in foreign operations [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 在外営業活動体に対する純投資のヘッジ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for hedges of the entity's monetary items that are receivable from or payable to a foreign operation, for which settlement is neither planned nor likely to occur in the foreseeable future. A foreign operation is an entity that is a subsidiary, associate, joint venture or branch of a reporting entity, the activities of which are based or conducted in a country or currency other than those of the reporting entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of detailed information about hedges [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of detailed information about hedges [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジに関する詳細情報の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of type of hedge
標準ラベル（英）: Description of type of hedge
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジの種類の記述
定義: The description of the type of a hedge used by the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of financial instruments designated as hedging instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Description of financial instruments designated as hedging instruments
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段に指定された金融商品の記述
定義: The description of financial instruments designated as hedging instruments. Hedging instruments are designated derivatives or (for a hedge of the risk of changes in foreign currency exchange rates only) designated non-derivative financial assets or non-derivative financial liabilities whose fair value or cash flows are expected to offset changes in the fair value or cash flows of a designated hedged item. [Refer: Derivatives [member]; Derivative financial assets; Derivative financial liabilities; Financial instruments, class [member]; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Financial instruments designated as hedging instruments, at fair value
標準ラベル（英）: Financial instruments designated as hedging instruments, at fair value
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段に指定された金融商品（公正価値）
定義: The fair value of financial instruments designated as hedging instruments. Hedging instruments are designated derivatives or (for a hedge of the risk of changes in foreign currency exchange rates only) designated non-derivative financial assets or non-derivative financial liabilities whose fair value or cash flows are expected to offset changes in the fair value or cash flows of a designated hedged item. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Derivatives [member]; Derivative financial assets; Derivative financial liabilities; Financial instruments, class [member]; Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of risks being hedged
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of risks being hedged
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジされているリスクの性質の記述
定義: The description of the nature of risks being hedged.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of periods when cash flows expected to occur
標準ラベル（英）: Description of periods when cash flows expected to occur
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フローが発生すると見込まれる期間の記述
定義: The description of periods when cash flows are expected to occur for cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of periods when cash flows affect profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Description of periods when cash flows affect profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フローが純損益に影響を与える期間の記述
定義: The description of periods when cash flows are expected to affect profit or loss for cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of forecast transactions for which hedge accounting had been used in previous period but which are no longer expected to occur
標準ラベル（英）: Description of forecast transactions for which hedge accounting had been used in previous period but which are no longer expected to occur
標準ラベル（日）: 過去の期間にヘッジ会計を適用したが発生が見込まれなくなった予定取引の記述
定義: The description of forecast transactions for which hedge accounting had previously been used but which are no longer expected to occur.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) on hedging instrument, fair value hedges
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) on hedging instrument, fair value hedges
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段に係る利得（損失）：公正価値ヘッジ
定義: The gains (losses) on hedging instruments in fair value hedges. [Refer: Fair value hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) on hedged item attributable to hedged risk, fair value hedges
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) on hedged item attributable to hedged risk, fair value hedges
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ対象に係る利得（損失）のうちヘッジされたリスクに起因する部分：公正価値ヘッジ
定義: The gains (losses) on hedged items in fair value hedges, which are attributable to the hedged risk. [Refer: Fair value hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) on ineffectiveness of cash flow hedges recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) on ineffectiveness of cash flow hedges recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識したキャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジの非有効部分に係る利得（損失）
定義: The gains (losses) on the ineffective portion of cash flow hedges recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) on ineffectiveness of hedges of net investments in foreign operations recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) on ineffectiveness of hedges of net investments in foreign operations recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識した在外営業活動体に対する純投資のヘッジの非有効部分に係る利得（損失）
定義: The gains (losses) on the ineffective portion of hedges of net investments in foreign operations recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Hedges of net investment in foreign operations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of general hedge accounting [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of general hedge accounting [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 一般ヘッジ会計の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for general hedge accounting.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of cross-reference to disclosures about hedge accounting presented outside financial statements
標準ラベル（英）: Description of cross-reference to disclosures about hedge accounting presented outside financial statements
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表外に表示したヘッジ会計に関する開示への参照の記述
定義: The description of cross-reference to disclosures about hedge accounting presented outside financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ会計に関連したリスク管理戦略の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ会計に関連したリスク管理戦略の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting [table]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ会計に関連したリスク管理戦略の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the risk management strategy in relation to hedge accounting.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Types of risks [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Types of risks [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: リスクの種類 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Risks [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Risks [member]
標準ラベル（日）: リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all types of risks. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of risks' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Credit risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Credit risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 信用リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the risk that one party to a financial instrument will cause a financial loss for the other party by failing to discharge an obligation. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liquidity risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Liquidity risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 流動性リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the risk that an entity will encounter difficulty in meeting obligations associated with financial liabilities that are settled by delivering cash or another financial asset. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Market risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Market risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 市場リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market prices. Market risk comprises three types of risk: currency risk, interest rate risk and other price risk. [Refer: Currency risk [member]; Interest rate risk [member]; Other price risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Currency risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Currency risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 為替リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a type of market risk representing the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in foreign exchange rates. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest rate risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Interest rate risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 金利リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market interest rates. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other price risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Other price risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の価格リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a type of market risk representing the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market prices (other than those arising from interest rate risk or currency risk), whether those changes are caused by factors specific to the individual financial instrument or its issuer, or by factors affecting all similar financial instruments traded in the market. [Refer: Currency risk [member]; Interest rate risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 株価リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in equity prices. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Commodity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Commodity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: コモディティ価格リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in commodity prices. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Prepayment risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Prepayment risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 期限前償還リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the type of risk that one party to a financial asset will incur a financial loss because the other party repays earlier or later than expected. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Residual value risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Residual value risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 残存価値リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in residual values. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Risk diversification effect [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Risk diversification effect [member]
標準ラベル（日）: リスク分散効果 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the effect of the diversification of risks arising from financial instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ会計に関連したリスク管理戦略の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of risk management strategy related to hedge accounting [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ会計に関連したリスク管理戦略の説明 [テキストブロック]
定義: The explanation of the risk management strategy related to hedge accounting.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of hedging instruments used to hedge risk exposures and how they are used
標準ラベル（英）: Description of hedging instruments used to hedge risk exposures and how they are used
標準ラベル（日）: リスク・エクスポージャーをヘッジするために使用したヘッジ手段とその使用方法の記述
定義: The description of hedging instruments used to hedge risk exposures and how they are used. [Refer: Hedging instruments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how entity determines economic relationship between hedged item and hedging instrument for purpose of assessing hedge effectiveness
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how entity determines economic relationship between hedged item and hedging instrument for purpose of assessing hedge effectiveness
標準ラベル（日）: 企業がヘッジ有効性評価の目的上ヘッジ対象とヘッジ手段との間の経済的関係をどのように判断しているのかの記述
定義: The description of how the entity determines the economic relationship between the hedged item and the hedging instrument for the purpose of assessing the hedge effectiveness. Hedge effectiveness is the extent to which changes in the fair value or the cash flows of the hedging instrument offset changes in the fair value or the cash flows of the hedged item. [Refer: Hedging instruments [member]; Hedged items [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how entity establishes hedge ratio and what sources of hedge ineffectiveness are
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how entity establishes hedge ratio and what sources of hedge ineffectiveness are
標準ラベル（日）: 企業がヘッジ比率を設定している方法及びヘッジ非有効部分の発生源の記述
定義: The description of how the entity establishes the hedge ratio and what are the sources of hedge ineffectiveness. Hedge ratio is the relationship between the quantity of the hedging instrument and the quantity of the hedged item in terms of their relative weighting. [Refer: Gain (loss) on hedge ineffectiveness]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about how entity determined risk component designated as hedged item [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Information about how entity determined risk component designated as hedged item [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業がヘッジ対象に指定したリスク要素をどのように決定したのかに関する情報 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about how the entity determined the risk component designated as the hedged item (including a description of the nature of the relationship between the risk component and the item as a whole). [Refer: Hedged items [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about how designated risk component relates to hedged item in its entirety [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Information about how designated risk component relates to hedged item in its entirety [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 指定されたリスク要素がヘッジ対象全体にどのように関連しているのかに関する情報 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about how the designated risk component relates to the hedged item in its entirety. [Refer: Hedged items [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about ultimate risk management strategy in relation to hedging relationships that entity frequently resets
標準ラベル（英）: Information about ultimate risk management strategy in relation to hedging relationships that entity frequently resets
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が頻繁に再設定するヘッジ関係に係る最終的なリスク管理戦略に関する情報
定義: Information about the ultimate risk management strategy in relation to hedging relationships that the entity frequently resets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how entity reflects its risk management strategy by using hedge accounting and designating hedging relationships that it frequently resets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how entity reflects its risk management strategy by using hedge accounting and designating hedging relationships that it frequently resets
標準ラベル（日）: 企業がヘッジ会計の使用と頻繁に再設定するヘッジ関係の指定によってリスク管理戦略をどのように反映しているのかの記述
定義: The description of how the entity reflects its risk management strategy by using hedge accounting and designating hedging relationships that it frequently resets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Indication of how frequently hedging relationships are discontinued and restarted
標準ラベル（英）: Indication of how frequently hedging relationships are discontinued and restarted
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ関係の中止及び再開の頻度の指標
定義: The description of an indication of how frequently the hedging relationships are discontinued and restarted.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of fact and reason why volume of hedging relationships to which exemption in IFRS 7.23C applies is unrepresentative of normal volumes
標準ラベル（英）: Description of fact and reason why volume of hedging relationships to which exemption in IFRS 7.23C applies is unrepresentative of normal volumes
標準ラベル（日）: IFRS第7号の第23C項の免除規定が適用されるヘッジ関係の量が名目数量を表していない旨及びその理由の記述
定義: The description of the fact and reason why the volume of the hedging relationships to which the exemption in paragraph 23C of IFRS 7 applies is unrepresentative of the normal volumes.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about terms and conditions of hedging instruments and how they affect future cash flows [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about terms and conditions of hedging instruments and how they affect future cash flows [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段の契約条件及びそれが将来キャッシュ・フローにどのように影響を与えるのかに関する情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about the terms and conditions of hedging instruments and how they affect future cash flows. [Refer: Hedging instruments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about terms and conditions of hedging instruments and how they affect future cash flows [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about terms and conditions of hedging instruments and how they affect future cash flows [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段の契約条件及びそれが将来キャッシュ・フローにどのように影響を与えるのかに関する情報の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about terms and conditions of hedging instruments and how they affect future cash flows [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about terms and conditions of hedging instruments and how they affect future cash flows [table]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段の契約条件及びそれが将来キャッシュ・フローにどのように影響を与えるのかに関する情報の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the terms and conditions of hedging instruments and how they affect future cash flows.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Commodity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Commodity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: コモディティ価格リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in commodity prices. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Prepayment risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Prepayment risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 期限前償還リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the type of risk that one party to a financial asset will incur a financial loss because the other party repays earlier or later than expected. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Residual value risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Residual value risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 残存価値リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in residual values. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Risk diversification effect [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Risk diversification effect [member]
標準ラベル（日）: リスク分散効果 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the effect of the diversification of risks arising from financial instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedging instruments [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Hedging instruments [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedging instruments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Hedging instruments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for hedging instruments. A hedging instrument can be a designated: (a) derivative measured at fair value through profit or loss, except for some written options (see paragraph B6.2.4 of IFRS 9); (b) non-derivative financial asset or non-derivative financial liability measured at fair value through profit or loss, unless it is a financial liability designated as at fair value through profit or loss for which the amount of its change in fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of that liability is presented in other comprehensive income in accordance with paragraph 5.7.7 of IFRS 9. For a hedge of foreign currency risk, the foreign currency risk component of a non-derivative financial asset or a non-derivative financial liability may be designated as a hedging instrument provided that it is not an investment in an equity instrument for which an entity has elected to present changes in fair value in other comprehensive income in accordance with paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9. This member also represents the standard value for the 'Hedging instruments' axis if no other member is used.

標準ラベル（英）: Maturity [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 満期 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

定義: This member stands for aggregated time bands. It also represents the standard value for the 'Maturity' axis if no other member is used.

定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Risks [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Risks [member]
標準ラベル（日）: リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all types of risks. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of risks' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Credit risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Credit risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 信用リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the risk that one party to a financial instrument will cause a financial loss for the other party by failing to discharge an obligation. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liquidity risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Liquidity risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 流動性リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the risk that an entity will encounter difficulty in meeting obligations associated with financial liabilities that are settled by delivering cash or another financial asset. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Market risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Market risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 市場リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market prices. Market risk comprises three types of risk: currency risk, interest rate risk and other price risk. [Refer: Currency risk [member]; Interest rate risk [member]; Other price risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Currency risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Currency risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 為替リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a type of market risk representing the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in foreign exchange rates. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest rate risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Interest rate risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 金利リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market interest rates. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other price risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Other price risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の価格リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a type of market risk representing the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market prices (other than those arising from interest rate risk or currency risk), whether those changes are caused by factors specific to the individual financial instrument or its issuer, or by factors affecting all similar financial instruments traded in the market. [Refer: Currency risk [member]; Interest rate risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 株価リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in equity prices. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Commodity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: コモディティ価格リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in commodity prices. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Prepayment risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Prepayment risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 期限前償還リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the type of risk that one party to a financial asset will incur a financial loss because the other party repays earlier or later than expected. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Residual value risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Residual value risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 残存価値リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in residual values. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Risk diversification effect [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Risk diversification effect [member]
標準ラベル（日）: リスク分散効果 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the effect of the diversification of risks arising from financial instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Types of hedges [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Types of hedges [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジの種類 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedges [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Hedges [member]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all types of hedges. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of hedges' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value hedges [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value hedges [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヘッジ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for hedges of the exposure to changes in fair value of a recognised asset or liability or an unrecognised firm commitment, or an identified portion of such an asset, liability or firm commitment, that is attributable to a particular risk and could affect profit or loss. [Refer: Hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash flow hedges [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flow hedges [member]
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for hedges of the exposure to variability in cash flows that (a) are attributable to a particular risk associated with a recognised asset or liability (such as all or some future interest payments on variable rate debt) or a highly probable forecast transaction; and (b) could affect profit or loss. [Refer: Hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedges of net investment in foreign operations [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Hedges of net investment in foreign operations [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 在外営業活動体に対する純投資のヘッジ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for hedges of the entity's monetary items that are receivable from or payable to a foreign operation, for which settlement is neither planned nor likely to occur in the foreseeable future. A foreign operation is an entity that is a subsidiary, associate, joint venture or branch of a reporting entity, the activities of which are based or conducted in a country or currency other than those of the reporting entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedging instruments [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Hedging instruments [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedging instruments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Hedging instruments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for hedging instruments. A hedging instrument can be a designated: (a) derivative measured at fair value through profit or loss, except for some written options (see paragraph B6.2.4 of IFRS 9); (b) non-derivative financial asset or non-derivative financial liability measured at fair value through profit or loss, unless it is a financial liability designated as at fair value through profit or loss for which the amount of its change in fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of that liability is presented in other comprehensive income in accordance with paragraph 5.7.7 of IFRS 9. For a hedge of foreign currency risk, the foreign currency risk component of a non-derivative financial asset or a non-derivative financial liability may be designated as a hedging instrument provided that it is not an investment in an equity instrument for which an entity has elected to present changes in fair value in other comprehensive income in accordance with paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9. This member also represents the standard value for the 'Hedging instruments' axis if no other member is used.

標準ラベル（英）: Hedging instrument, assets
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段：資産
定義: The amount of a hedging instrument, recognised as an asset. [Refer: Hedging instruments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedging instrument, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Hedging instrument, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ手段：負債
