標準ラベル（日）: 全体が認識の中止となるわけではない譲渡金融資産の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety
標準ラベル（日）: 全体が認識の中止となるわけではない譲渡金融資産の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety. [Refer: Transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety [member]; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of risks and rewards of ownership to which entity is exposed
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of risks and rewards of ownership to which entity is exposed
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が晒されている所有に係るリスク及び経済価値の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the risks and rewards of ownership of transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety to which the entity is exposed. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of relationship between transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety and associated liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of relationship between transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety and associated liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 全体が認識の中止となるわけではない譲渡金融資産とそれに関連する負債との間の関係の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the relationship between transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety and associated liabilities, including restrictions arising from the transfer on the reporting entity's use of the transferred assets. [Refer: Transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety [member]; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value of transferred financial assets (associated financial liabilities) that are not derecognised in their entirety [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of transferred financial assets (associated financial liabilities) that are not derecognised in their entirety [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 全体が認識の中止となるわけではない譲渡金融資産（関連する金融負債）の公正価値 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value of transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety
標準ラベル（日）: 全体が認識の中止となるわけではない譲渡金融資産の公正価値
定義: The fair value of transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value of associated financial liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of associated financial liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 関連する金融負債の公正価値
定義: The fair value of financial liabilities associated with transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net fair value of transferred financial assets (associated financial liabilities) that are not derecognised in their entirety
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of transferred financial assets (associated financial liabilities) that are not derecognised in their entirety
標準ラベル（日）: 全体が認識の中止となるわけではない譲渡金融資産（関連する金融負債）の公正価値
定義: The difference between the fair value of transferred financial assets that have not been derecognised in their entirety and their associated liabilities. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets that entity continues to recognise
標準ラベル（英）: Assets that entity continues to recognise
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が認識を継続する資産
定義: The amount of transferred financial assets that the entity continues to recognise in full. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Associated liabilities that entity continues to recognise
標準ラベル（英）: Associated liabilities that entity continues to recognise
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が認識を継続する関連する負債
定義: The amount of liabilities associated with transferred financial assets that the entity continues to recognise in full. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Original assets before transfer
標準ラベル（英）: Original assets before transfer
標準ラベル（日）: 譲渡前における従前の資産
定義: The amount of the original assets before transfer for transferred assets that the entity continues to recognise to the extent of its continuing involvement.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets that entity continues to recognise to extent of continuing involvement
標準ラベル（英）: Assets that entity continues to recognise to extent of continuing involvement
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が継続的関与の範囲で認識を継続する資産
定義: The amount of transferred financial assets that the entity continues to recognise to the extent of its continuing involvement. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Associated liabilities that entity continues to recognise to extent of continuing involvement
標準ラベル（英）: Associated liabilities that entity continues to recognise to extent of continuing involvement
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が継続的関与の範囲で認識を継続する関連する負債
定義: The amount of liabilities associated with transferred financial assets that the entity continues to recognise to the extent of its continuing involvement. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of instrument [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of instrument [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与（金融商品の形態別） [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Types of instrument [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Types of instrument [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融商品の形態 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all types of financial instruments. It also represents the standard value for the 'Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of instrument' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Written put options [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Written put options [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売建プット・オプション [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for derivative financial contracts sold that oblige the entity to purchase an underlying asset at a specified strike price if the other party exercises the option. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Purchased call options [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Purchased call options [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 買建コール・オプション [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for derivative financial contracts purchased that give the entity the right, but not the obligation, to purchase an underlying asset at a specified strike price. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Guarantees [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Guarantees [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 保証 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for formal promises, often in writing, in which one party assumes responsibility for another's debts or responsibilities, or in which the party provides assurance that certain conditions will be fulfilled.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of transfer [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of transfer [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与（譲渡の形態別） [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Types of transfer [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Types of transfer [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 譲渡の形態 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all types of transfers of financial instruments. It also represents the standard value for the 'Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of transfer' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Securities lending [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Securities lending [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 有価証券貸借 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the lending of securities in which the lender transfers securities in exchange for collateral provided by the borrower.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Factoring of receivables [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Factoring of receivables [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 債権のファクタリング [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for transactions in which an entity transfers its receivables to another party (the factor).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Securitisations [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Securitisations [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 証券化 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for securitisations, whereby individual assets are pooled together and sold to an entity that issues debt instruments backed by the pool of assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Recognised assets representing continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Recognised assets representing continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与を表す認識した資産
定義: The amount of assets recognised in the statement of financial position representing the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Recognised liabilities representing continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Recognised liabilities representing continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与を表す認識した負債
定義: The amount of liabilities recognised in the statement of financial position representing the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line items of recognised assets and liabilities representing continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line items of recognised assets and liabilities representing continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与を表す認識した資産及び負債の表示科目の記述
定義: The description of the line items in the statement of financial position in which the carrying amounts of assets and liabilities that represent the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets are recognised. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value of assets representing continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of assets representing continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与を表す資産の公正価値
定義: The fair value of assets representing the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value of liabilities representing continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of liabilities representing continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与を表す負債の公正価値
定義: The fair value of liabilities representing the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Maximum exposure to loss from continuing involvement
標準ラベル（英）: Maximum exposure to loss from continuing involvement
標準ラベル（日）: 継続的関与から生じる損失に対する最大エクスポージャー
定義: The amount that best represents the entity's maximum exposure to loss from its continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about how maximum exposure to loss from continuing involvement is determined
標準ラベル（英）: Information about how maximum exposure to loss from continuing involvement is determined
標準ラベル（日）: 継続的関与から生じる損失に対する最大エクスポージャーの算定方法に関する情報
定義: Information about how the amount of the entity's maximum exposure to loss from its continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets is determined. [Refer: Maximum exposure to loss from continuing involvement; Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Undiscounted cash outflow required to repurchase derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Undiscounted cash outflow required to repurchase derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産を買い戻すのに必要となる割引前キャッシュ・フロー
定義: The undiscounted cash outflows that would, or may be, required to repurchase derecognised financial assets (for example, the strike price in an option agreement). [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets
標準ラベル（英）: Other amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets
標準ラベル（日）: 譲渡資産に関して譲受人に支払うべきその他の金額
定義: The amounts payable to the transferee in respect of transferred financial assets other than the undiscounted cash outflows that would or may be required to repurchase derecognised financial assets (for example, the strike price in an option agreement). [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Qualitative information about continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Qualitative information about continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与についての定性的情報
定義: Qualitative information about the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets that explains and supports required quantitative disclosures. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gain (loss) of derecognised financial assets at date of transfer
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) of derecognised financial assets at date of transfer
標準ラベル（日）: 譲渡日に認識の中止をした金融資産の利得（損失）
定義: The gain (loss) recognised on derecognised financial assets as of the date of the transfer of the assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income from continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Income from continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与から生じた収益
定義: The amount of income recognised from the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets (for example, fair value changes in derivative instruments). [Refer: Financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income from continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets cumulatively recognised
標準ラベル（英）: Income from continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets cumulatively recognised
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与から生じた収益の認識した累計額
定義: The cumulative amount of income recognised from the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets (for example, fair value changes in derivative instruments). [Refer: Income from continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expense from continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Expense from continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与から生じる費用
定義: The amount of expense recognised from the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets (for example, fair value changes in derivative instruments). [Refer: Financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expense from continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets cumulatively recognised
標準ラベル（英）: Expense from continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets cumulatively recognised
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与から生じる費用の認識した累計額
定義: The amount of cumulative expense recognised from the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets (for example, fair value changes in derivative instruments). [Refer: Expense from continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation when greatest transfer activity took place
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation when greatest transfer activity took place
標準ラベル（日）: 最大の譲渡活動がいつ発生したのかの説明
定義: The explanation of when the greatest transfer activity took place within a reporting period (for example, over the last five days before the end of the reporting period) throughout which the total amount of proceeds from the transfer activity (that qualifies for derecognition) is not evenly distributed (for example, if a substantial proportion of the total amount of transfer activity takes place in the closing days of a reporting period).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gain (loss) from transfer activity during period representing greatest transfer activity
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) from transfer activity during period representing greatest transfer activity
標準ラベル（日）: 最大の譲渡活動を表す期中の譲渡活動から生じた利得（損失）
定義: The gain (loss) recognised from the transfer of financial assets during the part of the reporting period within which the greatest transfer activity took place when the total amount of proceeds from the transfer activity (that qualifies for derecognition) is not evenly distributed throughout the reporting period. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proceeds from transfer activity during period representing greatest transfer activity
標準ラベル（英）: Proceeds from transfer activity during period representing greatest transfer activity
標準ラベル（日）: 最大の譲渡活動を表す期中の譲渡活動による入金額
定義: The amount of proceeds recognised from the transfer of financial assets during the part of the reporting period within which the greatest transfer activity took place when the total amount of proceeds from the transfer activity (that qualifies for derecognition) is not evenly distributed throughout the reporting period. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of undiscounted cash outflows to repurchase derecognised financial assets or amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of undiscounted cash outflows to repurchase derecognised financial assets or amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産を買い戻すのに必要となる割引前キャッシュ・フロー又は譲渡資産に関して譲受人に支払うべきその他の金額の満期分析の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of a maturity analysis of the undiscounted cash outflows that would or may be required to repurchase derecognised financial assets or other amounts payable to the transferee in respect of transferred assets, showing the remaining contractual maturities of the entity's continuing involvement. [Refer: Undiscounted cash outflow required to repurchase derecognised financial assets; Other amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of undiscounted cash outflows to repurchase derecognised financial assets or amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of undiscounted cash outflows to repurchase derecognised financial assets or amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産を買い戻すのに必要となる割引前キャッシュ・フロー又は譲渡資産に関して譲受人に支払うべきその他の金額の満期分析の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of undiscounted cash outflows to repurchase derecognised financial assets or amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of undiscounted cash outflows to repurchase derecognised financial assets or amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産を買い戻すのに必要となる割引前キャッシュ・フロー又は譲渡資産に関して譲受人に支払うべきその他の金額の満期分析の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the maturity analysis of undiscounted cash outflows to repurchase derecognised financial assets or amounts payable to the transferee in respect of the transferred assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Maturity [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Maturity [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 満期 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Aggregated time bands [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Aggregated time bands [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 全期間合計 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for aggregated time bands. It also represents the standard value for the 'Maturity' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Not later than one year [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Not later than one year [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 1年以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of not later than one year.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Not later than three months [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Not later than three months [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 3か月以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of not later than three months.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Not later than one month [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Not later than one month [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 1か月以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of not later than one month.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Later than one month and not later than three months [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Later than one month and not later than three months [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 1か月超3か月以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of later than one month and not later than three months.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Later than three months and not later than one year [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Later than three months and not later than one year [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 3か月超1年以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of later than three months and not later than one year.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Later than three months and not later than six months [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Later than three months and not later than six months [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 3か月超6か月以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of later than three months and not later than six months.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Later than six months and not later than one year [member]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of instrument [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of instrument [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与（金融商品の形態別） [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Types of instrument [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Types of instrument [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 金融商品の形態 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all types of financial instruments. It also represents the standard value for the 'Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of instrument' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Written put options [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Written put options [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売建プット・オプション [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for derivative financial contracts sold that oblige the entity to purchase an underlying asset at a specified strike price if the other party exercises the option. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Purchased call options [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Purchased call options [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 買建コール・オプション [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for derivative financial contracts purchased that give the entity the right, but not the obligation, to purchase an underlying asset at a specified strike price. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Guarantees [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Guarantees [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 保証 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for formal promises, often in writing, in which one party assumes responsibility for another's debts or responsibilities, or in which the party provides assurance that certain conditions will be fulfilled.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of transfer [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of transfer [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産に対する継続的関与（譲渡の形態別） [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Types of transfer [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Types of transfer [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 譲渡の形態 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all types of transfers of financial instruments. It also represents the standard value for the 'Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of transfer' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Securities lending [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Securities lending [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 有価証券貸借 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the lending of securities in which the lender transfers securities in exchange for collateral provided by the borrower.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Factoring of receivables [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Factoring of receivables [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 債権のファクタリング [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for transactions in which an entity transfers its receivables to another party (the factor).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Securitisations [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Securitisations [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 証券化 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for securitisations, whereby individual assets are pooled together and sold to an entity that issues debt instruments backed by the pool of assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of undiscounted cash outflows to repurchase derecognised financial assets or amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of undiscounted cash outflows to repurchase derecognised financial assets or amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産を買い戻すのに必要となる割引前キャッシュ・フロー又は譲渡資産に関して譲受人に支払うべきその他の金額の満期分析の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Undiscounted cash outflow required to repurchase derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Undiscounted cash outflow required to repurchase derecognised financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の中止をした金融資産を買い戻すのに必要となる割引前キャッシュ・フロー
定義: The undiscounted cash outflows that would, or may be, required to repurchase derecognised financial assets (for example, the strike price in an option agreement). [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets
標準ラベル（英）: Other amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets
標準ラベル（日）: 譲渡資産に関して譲受人に支払うべきその他の金額
定義: The amounts payable to the transferee in respect of transferred financial assets other than the undiscounted cash outflows that would or may be required to repurchase derecognised financial assets (for example, the strike price in an option agreement). [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of initial application of IFRS 9 [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of initial application of IFRS 9 [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: IFRS第9号の適用開始の説明 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of qualitative information to enable users of financial statements to understand: (a) how the entity applied the classification requirements in IFRS 9 to those financial assets whose classification has changed as a result of applying IFRS 9; and (b) the reasons for any designation or de-designation of financial assets or financial liabilities as measured at fair value through profit or loss at the date of initial application.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in financial assets on basis of measurement category, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in financial assets on basis of measurement category, initial application of IFRS 9

定義: The increase (decrease) in financial assets on the basis of their measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 (ie not resulting from a change in the measurement attribute on transition to IFRS 9). [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in financial assets arising from change in measurement attribute, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in financial assets arising from change in measurement attribute, initial application of IFRS 9

定義: The increase (decrease) in financial assets arising from a change in measurement attribute on the entity's transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in financial liabilities on basis of measurement category, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in financial liabilities on basis of measurement category, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（日）: 測定区分に基づく金融負債の増加（減少）：IFRS第9号の適用開始
定義: The increase (decrease) in financial liabilities on the basis of their measurement categories in accordance with IAS 39 (ie not resulting from a change in the measurement attribute on transition to IFRS 9). [Refer: Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in financial liabilities arising from change in measurement attribute, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in financial liabilities arising from change in measurement attribute, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（日）: 測定属性の変更から生じた金融負債の増加（減少）：IFRS第9号の適用開始
定義: The increase (decrease) in financial liabilities arising from a change in the measurement attribute on the entity's transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of financial assets reclassified as measured at amortised cost, initial application of IFRS 9

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss or other comprehensive income if financial assets had not been reclassified as measured at amortised cost, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss or other comprehensive income if financial assets had not been reclassified as measured at amortised cost, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（日）: 金融資産を償却原価で測定するものとして分類変更しなかったとすれば純損益又はその他の包括利益に認識されたであろう公正価値測定による利得（損失）：IFRS第10号の適用開始
定義: The fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss or other comprehensive income if financial assets had not been reclassified so that they are measured at amortised cost as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value of financial assets reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss and into fair value through other comprehensive income, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of financial assets reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss and into fair value through other comprehensive income, initial application of IFRS 9

定義: The fair value of financial assets that have been reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss and into the fair value through other comprehensive income as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss if financial assets had not been reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss and into fair value through other comprehensive income, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss if financial assets had not been reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss and into fair value through other comprehensive income, initial application of IFRS 9

定義: The fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss if financial assets had not been reclassified out of the fair value through profit or loss and into the fair value through other comprehensive income as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Effective interest rate determined on date of reclassification of financial assets out of fair value through profit or loss category, initial application of IFRS 9

標準ラベル（英）: Interest revenue (expense) recognised for financial assets reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category, initial application of IFRS 9

定義: The amount of interest revenue (expense) recognised for financial assets that have been reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

標準ラベル（英）: Fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss or other comprehensive income if financial liabilities had not been reclassified as measured at amortised cost, initial application of IFRS 9

定義: The fair value gain (loss) that would have been recognised in profit or loss or other comprehensive income if financial liabilities had not been reclassified so that they are measured at amortised cost as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Effective interest rate determined on date of reclassification of financial liabilities out of fair value through profit or loss category, initial application of IFRS 9
標準ラベル（英）: Effective interest rate determined on date of reclassification of financial liabilities out of fair value through profit or loss category, initial application of IFRS 9

定義: The effective interest rate determined on the date that the entity reclassifies its financial liabilities out of fair value through profit or loss category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

定義: The amount of interest revenue (expense) recognised for financial liabilities that have been reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities]
