定義: This member stands for all types of measurement. It also represents the standard value for the 'Measurement' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: At fair value [member]
標準ラベル（英）: At fair value [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for measurement based on fair value. Fair value is the price that would be received to sell an asset or paid to transfer a liability in an orderly transaction between market participants at the measurement date.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 経常的な公正価値測定 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for fair value measurements which other IFRSs require or permit in the statement of financial position at the end of each reporting period. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Non-recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 非経常的な公正価値測定 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for fair value measurements which other IFRSs require or permit in the statement of financial position in particular circumstances. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Not measured at fair value in statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Not measured at fair value in statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 財政状態計算書において公正価値で測定されていないが公正価値が開示されているもの [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for items not measured at fair value in the statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Classes of assets [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Classes of assets [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 資産の種類 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Assets [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資産 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for resources: (a) controlled by an entity as a result of past events; and (b) from which future economic benefits are expected to flow to the entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of assets' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Trading equity securities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Trading equity securities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: トレーディング持分証券 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for equity instruments that (a) are acquired or incurred principally for the purpose of selling or repurchasing it in the near term; or (b) on initial recognition are part of a portfolio of identified financial instruments that are managed together and for which there is evidence of a recent actual pattern of short-term profit-taking.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other equity securities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Other equity securities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の持分証券 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for equity instruments that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Debt securities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Debt securities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 債券 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for instruments held by the entity that represent indebtedness.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Hedge fund investments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Hedge fund investments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジファンド投資 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for investments in hedge funds.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Derivatives [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Derivatives [member]
標準ラベル（日）: デリバティブ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for financial instruments or other contracts within the scope of IFRS 9 with all three of the following characteristics: (a) Their value changes in response to the change in a specified interest rate, financial instrument price, commodity price, foreign exchange rate, index of prices or rates, credit rating or credit index, or other variable, provided in the case of a non-financial variable that the variable is not specific to a party to the contract (sometimes called the ‘underlying’); (b) They require no initial net investment or an initial net investment that is smaller than would be required for other types of contracts that would be expected to have a similar response to changes in market factors; (c) They are settled at a future date. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investment property [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Investment property [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資不動産 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for investment property. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of investment property' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Investment property]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current assets held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current assets held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的で保有する非流動資産 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for non-current assets that are available for immediate sale in their present condition, subject only to terms that are usual and customary for sales of such assets, and for which sale is highly probable. [Refer: Non-current assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Levels of fair value hierarchy [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Levels of fair value hierarchy [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーの各レベル [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: All levels of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: All levels of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのすべてのレベル [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all levels of the fair value hierarchy. It also represents the standard value for the 'Levels of fair value hierarchy' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル1 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are quoted prices (unadjusted) in active markets for identical assets or liabilities that the entity can access at the measurement date.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル2 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are inputs other than quoted prices included within Level 1 that are observable for the asset or liability, either directly or indirectly.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are unobservable inputs for the asset or liability. Unobservable inputs are inputs for which market data are not available and that are developed using the best information available about the assumptions that the market participants would use when pricing the asset or liability.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of assets [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of assets [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 資産の公正価値測定の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets
標準ラベル（英）: Assets
標準ラベル（日）: 資産
定義: The amount of resources: (a) controlled by the entity as a result of past events; and (b) from which future economic benefits are expected to flow to the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の理由の記述：資産
定義: The description of the reasons for the fair value measurement of assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, assets held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, assets held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル1からレベル2への振替：報告期間の末日現在で保有している資産
定義: The amount of transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of assets held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル1からレベル2への振替の理由の記述：資産
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of assets held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, assets held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, assets held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル2からレベル1への振替：報告期間の末日現在で保有している資産
定義: The amount of transfers out of Level 2 and into Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy of assets held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル2からレベル1への振替の理由の記述：資産
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers out of Level 2 and into Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy of assets held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of policy for determining when transfers between levels are deemed to have occurred, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of policy for determining when transfers between levels are deemed to have occurred, assets
標準ラベル（日）: レベル間の振替がいつ生じたとみなすのかの判断に関する方針の記述：資産
定義: The description of the policy for determining when transfers of assets between levels of the fair value hierarchy are deemed to have occurred. The policy about the timing of recognising transfers shall be the same for transfers into the levels as for transfers out of the levels.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of valuation techniques used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of valuation techniques used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた評価技法の記述：資産
定義: The description of the valuation techniques (for example, the market approach, cost approach and income approach) used for the fair value measurement of assets. [Refer: Valuation techniques [member]; Cost approach [member]; Income approach [member]; Market approach [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of inputs used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of inputs used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いたインプットの記述：資産
定義: The description of inputs used in the fair value measurement of assets. Inputs are the assumptions that market participants would use when pricing the asset, including assumptions about risk such as the risk inherent in a particular valuation technique used to measure fair value (such as a pricing model) and the risk inherent in the inputs to the valuation technique.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of change in valuation technique used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of change in valuation technique used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた評価技法の変更の記述：資産
定義: The description of a change in valuation technique (for example, changing from a market approach to an income approach or the use of an additional valuation technique) for the fair value measurement of assets. [Refer: Income approach [member]; Market approach [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for change in valuation technique used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for change in valuation technique used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた評価技法の変更の理由の記述：資産
定義: The description of the reasons for a change in valuation technique (for example, changing from a market approach to an income approach or the use of an additional valuation technique) for the fair value measurement of assets. [Refer: Income approach [member]; Market approach [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reconciliation of changes in fair value measurement, assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Reconciliation of changes in fair value measurement, assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の増減の調整表：資産 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Assets
標準ラベル（日）: 資産
定義: The amount of resources: (a) controlled by the entity as a result of past events; and (b) from which future economic benefits are expected to flow to the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Changes in fair value measurement, assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Changes in fair value measurement, assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の増減：資産 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識した利得（損失）：公正価値測定：資産
定義: The gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss on the fair value measurement of assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益に認識した利得（損失）：公正価値測定：資産
定義: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on the fair value measurement of assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Purchases, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Purchases, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 購入：公正価値測定：資産
定義: The increase in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from purchases of those assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Sales, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Sales, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 売却：公正価値測定：資産
定義: The decrease in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from sales. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Issues, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Issues, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 発行：公正価値測定：資産
定義: The increase in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from issues of those assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Settlements, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Settlements, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 決済：公正価値測定：資産
定義: The decrease in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from settlements. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3への振替：資産
定義: The amount of transfers of assets into Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers out of Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers out of Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3からの振替：資産
定義: The amount of transfers of assets out of Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total increase (decrease) in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の増加（減少）：資産
定義: The increase (decrease) in the fair value measurement of assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Assets
標準ラベル（日）: 資産
定義: The amount of resources: (a) controlled by the entity as a result of past events; and (b) from which future economic benefits are expected to flow to the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line items in profit or loss where gains (losses) are recognised, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line items in profit or loss where gains (losses) are recognised, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 利得（損失）が認識されている純損益の中の表示科目の記述：公正価値測定：資産
定義: The description of the line item(s) in profit or loss in which the gains (losses) during the period for assets measured at fair value are recognised. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line items in other comprehensive income where gains (losses) are recognised, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line items in other comprehensive income where gains (losses) are recognised, fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 利得（損失）が認識されているその他の包括利益の中の表示科目の記述：公正価値測定：資産
定義: The description of the line item(s) in other comprehensive income in which the gains (losses) during the period for assets measured at fair value are recognised. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3への振替の理由の記述：資産
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers of assets into Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3からの振替の理由の記述：資産
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers of assets out of Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss attributable to change in unrealised gains or losses for assets held at end of period, fair value measurement
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss attributable to change in unrealised gains or losses for assets held at end of period, fair value measurement
標準ラベル（日）: 期末現在で保有している資産に係る未実現損益の変動に起因する純損益に認識した利得（損失）：公正価値測定
定義: The gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss for assets measured at fair value that are attributable to the change in unrealised gains or losses relating to those assets held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line items in profit or loss where gains (losses) attributable to change in unrealised gains or losses for assets held at end of period are recognised, fair value measurement
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line items in profit or loss where gains (losses) attributable to change in unrealised gains or losses for assets held at end of period are recognised, fair value measurement
標準ラベル（日）: 期末現在で保有している資産に係る未実現損益の変動に起因する利得（損失）が認識されている純損益の中の表示科目の記述：公正価値測定
定義: The description of the line item(s) in profit or loss in which gains (losses) for the period recognised in profit or loss are reported for assets measured at fair value that are attributable to the change in unrealised gains (losses) relating to those assets held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of valuation processes used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of valuation processes used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた評価プロセスの記述：資産
定義: The description of the valuation processes used by the entity for the fair value measurement of assets (including, for example, how an entity decides its valuation policies and procedures and analyses changes in fair value measurements from period to period).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of group within entity that decides entity's valuation policies and procedures, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of group within entity that decides entity's valuation policies and procedures, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 企業の評価の方針及び手続を決定する企業内のグループの記述：資産
定義: The description of the group within the entity that decides the entity's fair value measurement valuation policies and procedures for assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of to whom group within entity that decides entity's valuation policies and procedures reports, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of to whom group within entity that decides entity's valuation policies and procedures reports, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 企業の評価の方針及び手続を決定する企業内のグループが誰に対して報告するのかの記述：資産
定義: The description of who the group within the entity that decides the entity's fair value measurement valuation policies and procedures for assets reports to.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of internal reporting procedures for discussing and assessing fair value measurements, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of internal reporting procedures for discussing and assessing fair value measurements, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定を検討し評価するための内部報告手続の記述：資産
定義: The description of the internal reporting procedures in place (for example, whether and, if so, how, pricing, risk management or audit committees discuss and assess the fair value measurements) for the group within the entity that decides the entity's fair value measurement valuation policies and procedures for assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of frequency and methods for testing procedures of pricing models, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of frequency and methods for testing procedures of pricing models, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 価格算定モデルの検証手続の頻度及び方法の記述：資産
定義: The description of the frequency and methods for calibration, back testing and other testing procedures of fair value measurement pricing models for assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of process for analysing changes in fair value measurements, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of process for analysing changes in fair value measurements, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の変動の分析に関するプロセスの記述：資産
定義: The description of the process for analysing changes in the fair value measurements of assets from period to period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how entity determined that third-party information used in fair value measurement was developed in accordance with IFRS 13, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how entity determined that third-party information used in fair value measurement was developed in accordance with IFRS 13, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた第三者の情報がIFRS第13号に従って作成されたと企業がどのようにして判断したのかの記述：資産
定義: The description of how the entity determined that third-party information, such as broker quotes or pricing services, used in the fair value measurement of assets, was developed in accordance with IFRS 13.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of methods used to develop and substantiate unobservable inputs used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of methods used to develop and substantiate unobservable inputs used in fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた観察可能でないインプットの作成及び立証に用いた方法の記述：資産
定義: The description of the methods used to develop and substantiate the unobservable inputs used in the fair value measurement of assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of sensitivity of fair value measurement to changes in unobservable inputs, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of sensitivity of fair value measurement to changes in unobservable inputs, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 観察可能でないインプットの変動に対する公正価値測定の感応度の記述：資産
定義: The description of the sensitivity of the fair value measurement of assets to changes in unobservable inputs if a change to those inputs might result in a higher or lower fair value measurement.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of interrelationships between unobservable inputs and of how they might magnify or mitigate effect of changes in unobservable inputs on fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of interrelationships between unobservable inputs and of how they might magnify or mitigate effect of changes in unobservable inputs on fair value measurement, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 観察可能でないインプット間の相互関係、及び観察可能でないインプットの変動が公正価値測定に与える影響をそれがどのように増幅又は軽減する可能性があるのかの記述：資産
定義: The description of the interrelationships between unobservable inputs and of how they might magnify or mitigate the effect of changes in the unobservable inputs on the fair value measurement of assets. [Refer: Disclosure of significant unobservable inputs used in fair value measurement of assets [text block]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of fact that changing one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions would change fair value significantly, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of fact that changing one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions would change fair value significantly, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 観察可能でないインプットを合理的に考え得る代替的な仮定を反映するように変更すると、公正価値が著しく変化する旨の記述：資産
定義: The description of the fact that changing one or more unobservable inputs for the fair value measurement of assets to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions would change fair value significantly.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 合理的に考え得る代替的な仮定を反映するための観察可能でないインプットの変更による公正価値測定の増加（減少）：資産
定義: The amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value measurement of assets due to a change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Increase in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 合理的に考え得る代替的な仮定を反映するための観察可能でないインプットの変更による公正価値測定の増加：資産
定義: The amount of increase in the fair value measurement of assets due to a change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Decrease in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Decrease in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 合理的に考え得る代替的な仮定を反映するための観察可能でないインプットの変更による公正価値測定の減少：資産
定義: The amount of decrease in the fair value measurement of assets due to a change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how effect on fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions was calculated, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how effect on fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions was calculated, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 合理的に考え得る代替的な仮定を反映するための観察可能でないインプットの変更による公正価値測定への影響の計算方法の記述：資産
定義: The description of how the effect on fair value measurement of assets due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions was calculated.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of fact that highest and best use of non-financial asset differs from current use
標準ラベル（英）: Description of fact that highest and best use of non-financial asset differs from current use
標準ラベル（日）: 非金融資産の最有効使用が現在の用途と異なる旨の記述
定義: The description of the fact that the use of a non-financial asset that would maximise the value of the asset or the group of assets and liabilities (for example, a business) within which the asset would be used differs from its current use.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason why non-financial asset is being used in manner different from highest and best use
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason why non-financial asset is being used in manner different from highest and best use
標準ラベル（日）: 非金融資産が最有効使用とは異なる方法で使用されている理由の記述
定義: The description of the reason why a non-financial asset is being used in a manner that is different from the use that would maximise the value of the asset or the group of assets and liabilities (for example, a business) within which the asset would be used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information sufficient to permit reconciliation of classes determined for fair value measurement to line items in statement of financial position, assets [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information sufficient to permit reconciliation of classes determined for fair value measurement to line items in statement of financial position, assets [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定のために決定されたクラスを財政状態計算書上の表示科目と調整できるようにするのに十分な情報の開示：資産 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information sufficient to permit the reconciliation of classes of assets determined for fair value measurement to the line items in the statement of financial position.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of accounting policy decision to use exception in IFRS 13.48, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of accounting policy decision to use exception in IFRS 13.48, assets
標準ラベル（日）: IFRS第13号第48項の例外措置を使用するという会計方針の決定の記述：資産
定義: The description of the fact that the entity made an accounting policy decision to use the exception in paragraph 48 of IFRS 13 for assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of class of assets measured at fair value
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of class of assets measured at fair value
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値で測定されている資産のクラスの性質の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the class of assets being measured at fair value, including the characteristics of the items being measured, that are taken into account when determining the relevant inputs. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how third-party information was taken into account when measuring fair value, assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how third-party information was taken into account when measuring fair value, assets
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値を測定する際に第三者の情報をどのように考慮したのかの記述：資産
定義: The description of how third-party information, such as broker quotes, pricing services, net asset values and relevant market data, was taken into account when measuring the fair value of assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of liabilities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of liabilities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の公正価値測定の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the fair value measurement of liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の公正価値測定の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of liabilities [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of liabilities [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の公正価値測定の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the fair value measurement of liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Measurement [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Measurement [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 測定 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Aggregated measurement [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Aggregated measurement [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 測定の合算 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all types of measurement. It also represents the standard value for the 'Measurement' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: At fair value [member]
標準ラベル（英）: At fair value [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for measurement based on fair value. Fair value is the price that would be received to sell an asset or paid to transfer a liability in an orderly transaction between market participants at the measurement date.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 経常的な公正価値測定 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for fair value measurements which other IFRSs require or permit in the statement of financial position at the end of each reporting period. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Non-recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 非経常的な公正価値測定 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for fair value measurements which other IFRSs require or permit in the statement of financial position in particular circumstances. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Not measured at fair value in statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Not measured at fair value in statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 財政状態計算書において公正価値で測定されていないが公正価値が開示されているもの [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for items not measured at fair value in the statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Classes of liabilities [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Classes of liabilities [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債のクラス [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for present obligations of the entity arising from past events, the settlement of which is expected to result in an outflow from the entity of resources embodying economic benefits. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of liabilities' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Levels of fair value hierarchy [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Levels of fair value hierarchy [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーの各レベル [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: All levels of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: All levels of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのすべてのレベル [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all levels of the fair value hierarchy. It also represents the standard value for the 'Levels of fair value hierarchy' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル1 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are quoted prices (unadjusted) in active markets for identical assets or liabilities that the entity can access at the measurement date.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル2 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are inputs other than quoted prices included within Level 1 that are observable for the asset or liability, either directly or indirectly.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are unobservable inputs for the asset or liability. Unobservable inputs are inputs for which market data are not available and that are developed using the best information available about the assumptions that the market participants would use when pricing the asset or liability.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of liabilities [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of liabilities [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の公正価値測定の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 負債
定義: The amount of present obligations of the entity arising from past events, the settlement of which is expected to result in an outflow from the entity of resources embodying economic benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の理由の記述：負債
定義: The description of the reasons for the fair value measurement of liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル1からレベル2への振替：報告期間の末日現在で保有している負債
定義: The amount of transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of liabilities held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル1からレベル2への振替の理由の記述：負債
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of liabilities held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル2からレベル1への振替：報告期間の末日現在で保有している負債
定義: The amount of transfers out of Level 2 and into Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy of liabilities held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル2からレベル1への振替の理由の記述：負債
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers out of Level 2 and into Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy of liabilities held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of policy for determining when transfers between levels are deemed to have occurred, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of policy for determining when transfers between levels are deemed to have occurred, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: レベル間の振替がいつ生じたとみなすのかの判断に関する方針の記述：負債
定義: The description of the policy for determining when transfers of liabilities between levels of the fair value hierarchy are deemed to have occurred. The policy about the timing of recognising transfers shall be the same for transfers into the levels as for transfers out of the levels.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of valuation techniques used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of valuation techniques used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた評価技法の記述：負債
定義: The description of the valuation techniques (for example, the market approach, cost approach and income approach) used for the fair value measurement of liabilities. [Refer: Valuation techniques [member]; Cost approach [member]; Income approach [member]; Market approach [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of inputs used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of inputs used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いたインプットの記述：負債
定義: The description of inputs used in the fair value measurement of liabilities. Inputs are the assumptions that market participants would use when pricing the liability, including assumptions about risk such as the risk inherent in a particular valuation technique used to measure fair value (such as a pricing model) and the risk inherent in the inputs to the valuation technique.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of change in valuation technique used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of change in valuation technique used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた評価技法の変更の記述：負債
定義: The description of a change in valuation technique (for example, changing from a market approach to an income approach or the use of an additional valuation technique) for the fair value measurement of liabilities. [Refer: Income approach [member]; Market approach [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for change in valuation technique used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for change in valuation technique used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた評価技法の変更の理由の記述：負債
定義: The description of the reasons for a change in valuation technique (for example, changing from a market approach to an income approach or the use of an additional valuation technique) for the fair value measurement of liabilities. [Refer: Income approach [member]; Market approach [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reconciliation of changes in fair value measurement, liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Reconciliation of changes in fair value measurement, liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の増減の調整表：負債 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 負債
定義: The amount of present obligations of the entity arising from past events, the settlement of which is expected to result in an outflow from the entity of resources embodying economic benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Changes in fair value measurement, liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Changes in fair value measurement, liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の増減：負債 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Losses (gains) recognised in profit or loss, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識した利得（損失）：公正価値測定：負債
定義: The gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss on the fair value measurement of liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Losses (gains) recognised in other comprehensive income, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益に認識した利得（損失）：公正価値測定：負債
定義: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on the fair value measurement of liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Purchases, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Purchases, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 購入：公正価値測定：負債
定義: The increase in the fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from purchases of those liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Sales, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Sales, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 売却：公正価値測定：負債
定義: The decrease in the fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from sales. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Issues, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Issues, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 発行：公正価値測定：負債
定義: The increase in fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from issues of those liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Settlements, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Settlements, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 決済：公正価値測定：負債
定義: The decrease in the fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from settlements. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3への振替：負債
定義: The amount of transfers of liabilities into Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers out of Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers out of Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3からの振替：負債
定義: The amount of transfers of liabilities out of Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total increase (decrease) in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の増加（減少）：負債
定義: The increase (decrease) in the fair value measurement of liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 負債
定義: The amount of present obligations of the entity arising from past events, the settlement of which is expected to result in an outflow from the entity of resources embodying economic benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line items in profit or loss where gains (losses) are recognised, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line items in profit or loss where gains (losses) are recognised, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 利得（損失）が認識されている純損益の中の表示科目の記述：公正価値測定：負債
定義: The description of the line item(s) in profit or loss in which the gains (losses) during the period for liabilities measured at fair value are recognised. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line items in other comprehensive income where gains (losses) are recognised, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line items in other comprehensive income where gains (losses) are recognised, fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 利得（損失）が認識されているその他の包括利益の中の表示科目の記述：公正価値測定：負債
定義: The description of the line item(s) in other comprehensive income in which the gains (losses) during the period for liabilities measured at fair value are recognised. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3への振替の理由の記述：負債
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers of liabilities into Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3からの振替の理由の記述：負債
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers of liabilities out of Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss attributable to change in unrealised gains or losses for liabilities held at end of period, fair value measurement
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss attributable to change in unrealised gains or losses for liabilities held at end of period, fair value measurement
標準ラベル（日）: 期末現在で保有している負債に係る未実現損益の変動に起因する純損益に認識した利得（損失）：公正価値測定
定義: The gains (losses) recognised in profit or loss for liabilities measured at fair value that are attributable to the change in unrealised gains or losses relating to those liabilities held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line items in profit or loss where gains (losses) attributable to change in unrealised gains or losses for liabilities held at end of period are recognised, fair value measurement
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line items in profit or loss where gains (losses) attributable to change in unrealised gains or losses for liabilities held at end of period are recognised, fair value measurement
標準ラベル（日）: 期末現在で保有している負債に係る未実現損益の変動に起因する利得（損失）が認識されている純損益の中の表示科目の記述：公正価値測定
定義: The description of the line item(s) in profit or loss in which gains (losses) for the period recognised in profit or loss are reported for liabilities measured at fair value that are attributable to the change in unrealised gains (losses) relating to those liabilities held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of valuation processes used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of valuation processes used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた評価プロセスの記述：負債
定義: The description of the valuation processes used by the entity for fair value measurement of liabilities (including, for example, how an entity decides its valuation policies and procedures and analyses changes in fair value measurements from period to period).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of group within entity that decides entity's valuation policies and procedures, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of group within entity that decides entity's valuation policies and procedures, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 企業の評価の方針及び手続を決定する企業内のグループの記述：負債
定義: The description of the group within the entity that decides the entity's fair value measurement valuation policies and procedures for liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of to whom group within entity that decides entity's valuation policies and procedures reports, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of to whom group within entity that decides entity's valuation policies and procedures reports, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 企業の評価の方針及び手続を決定する企業内のグループが誰に対して報告するのかの記述：負債
定義: The description of who the group within the entity that decides the entity's fair value measurement valuation policies and procedures for liabilities reports to.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of internal reporting procedures for discussing and assessing fair value measurements, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of internal reporting procedures for discussing and assessing fair value measurements, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定を検討し評価するための内部報告手続の記述：負債
定義: The description of the internal reporting procedures in place (for example, whether and, if so, how, pricing, risk management or audit committees discuss and assess the fair value measurements) for the group within the entity that decides the entity's fair value measurement valuation policies and procedures for liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of frequency and methods for testing procedures of pricing models, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of frequency and methods for testing procedures of pricing models, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 価格算定モデルの検証手続の頻度及び方法の記述：負債
定義: The description of the frequency and methods for calibration, back testing and other testing procedures of fair value measurement pricing models for liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of process for analysing changes in fair value measurements, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of process for analysing changes in fair value measurements, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の変動の分析に関するプロセスの記述：負債
定義: The description of the process for analysing changes in the fair value measurements of liabilities from period to period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how entity determined that third-party information used in fair value measurement was developed in accordance with IFRS 13, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how entity determined that third-party information used in fair value measurement was developed in accordance with IFRS 13, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた第三者の情報がIFRS第13号に従って作成されたと企業がどのようにして判断したのかの記述：負債
定義: The description of how the entity determined that third-party information, such as broker quotes or pricing services, used in the fair value measurement of liabilities, was developed in accordance with IFRS 13.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of methods used to develop and substantiate unobservable inputs used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of methods used to develop and substantiate unobservable inputs used in fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定に用いた観察可能でないインプットの作成及び立証に用いた方法の記述：負債
定義: The description of the methods used to develop and substantiate the unobservable inputs used in the fair value measurement of liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of sensitivity of fair value measurement to changes in unobservable inputs, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of sensitivity of fair value measurement to changes in unobservable inputs, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 観察可能でないインプットの変動に対する公正価値測定の感応度の記述：負債
定義: The description of the sensitivity of the fair value measurement of liabilities to changes in unobservable inputs if a change in those inputs to a different amount might result in a higher or lower fair value measurement.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of interrelationships between unobservable inputs and of how they might magnify or mitigate effect of changes in unobservable inputs on fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of interrelationships between unobservable inputs and of how they might magnify or mitigate effect of changes in unobservable inputs on fair value measurement, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 観察可能でないインプット間の相互関係、及び観察可能でないインプットの変動が公正価値測定に与える影響をそれがどのように増幅又は軽減する可能性があるのかの記述：負債
定義: The description of the interrelationships between unobservable inputs and of how they might magnify or mitigate the effect of changes in the unobservable inputs on the fair value measurement of liabilities. [Refer: Disclosure of significant unobservable inputs used in fair value measurement of liabilities [text block]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of fact that changing one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions would change fair value significantly, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of fact that changing one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions would change fair value significantly, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 観察可能でないインプットを合理的に考え得る代替的な仮定を反映するように変更すると、公正価値が著しく変化する旨の記述：負債
定義: The description of the fact that changing one or more unobservable inputs for the fair value measurement of liabilities to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions would change the fair value significantly.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 合理的に考え得る代替的な仮定を反映するための観察可能でないインプットの変更による公正価値測定の増加（減少）：負債
定義: The amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value measurement of liabilities due to a change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Increase in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 合理的に考え得る代替的な仮定を反映するための観察可能でないインプットの変更による公正価値測定の増加：負債
定義: The amount of increase in the fair value measurement of liabilities due to a change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Decrease in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Decrease in fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 合理的に考え得る代替的な仮定を反映するための観察可能でないインプットの変更による公正価値測定の減少：負債
定義: The amount of decrease in the fair value measurement of liabilities due to a change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how effect on fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions was calculated, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how effect on fair value measurement due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions was calculated, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 合理的に考え得る代替的な仮定を反映するための観察可能でないインプットの変更による公正価値測定への影響の計算方法の記述：負債
定義: The description of how the effect on the fair value measurement of liabilities due to change in one or more unobservable inputs to reflect reasonably possible alternative assumptions was calculated.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information sufficient to permit reconciliation of classes determined for fair value measurement to line items in statement of financial position, liabilities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information sufficient to permit reconciliation of classes determined for fair value measurement to line items in statement of financial position, liabilities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定のために決定されたクラスを財政状態計算書上の表示科目と調整できるようにするのに十分な情報の開示：負債 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information sufficient to permit the reconciliation of classes of liabilities determined for fair value measurement to the line items in the statement of financial position.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of accounting policy decision to use exception in IFRS 13.48, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of accounting policy decision to use exception in IFRS 13.48, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: IFRS第13号第48項の例外措置を使用するという会計方針の決定の記述：負債
定義: The description of the fact that the entity made an accounting policy decision to use the exception in paragraph 48 of IFRS 13 for liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of class of liabilities measured at fair value
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of class of liabilities measured at fair value
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値で測定されている負債のクラスの性質の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the class of liabilities being measured at fair value, including the characteristics of the items being measured, that are taken into account when determining the relevant inputs. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how third-party information was taken into account when measuring fair value, liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how third-party information was taken into account when measuring fair value, liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値を測定する際に第三者の情報をどのように考慮したのかの記述：負債
定義: The description of how third-party information, such as broker quotes, pricing services, net asset values and relevant market data, was taken into account when measuring the fair value of liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of equity [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of equity [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本の公正価値測定の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the fair value measurement of equity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本の公正価値測定の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of equity [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of equity [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本の公正価値測定の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the fair value measurement of equity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Measurement [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Measurement [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 測定 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Aggregated measurement [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Aggregated measurement [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 測定の合算 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all types of measurement. It also represents the standard value for the 'Measurement' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: At fair value [member]
標準ラベル（英）: At fair value [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for measurement based on fair value. Fair value is the price that would be received to sell an asset or paid to transfer a liability in an orderly transaction between market participants at the measurement date.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 経常的な公正価値測定 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for fair value measurements which other IFRSs require or permit in the statement of financial position at the end of each reporting period. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Non-recurring fair value measurement [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 非経常的な公正価値測定 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for fair value measurements which other IFRSs require or permit in the statement of financial position in particular circumstances. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Not measured at fair value in statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Not measured at fair value in statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 財政状態計算書において公正価値で測定されていないが公正価値が開示されているもの [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for items not measured at fair value in the statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Classes of entity's own equity instruments [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Classes of entity's own equity instruments [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業自身の資本性金融商品のクラス [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Entity's own equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Entity's own equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業自身の資本性金融商品 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for equity instruments issued by the entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of entity's own equity instruments' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Levels of fair value hierarchy [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Levels of fair value hierarchy [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーの各レベル [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: All levels of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: All levels of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのすべてのレベル [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all levels of the fair value hierarchy. It also represents the standard value for the 'Levels of fair value hierarchy' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル1 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are quoted prices (unadjusted) in active markets for identical assets or liabilities that the entity can access at the measurement date.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル2 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are inputs other than quoted prices included within Level 1 that are observable for the asset or liability, either directly or indirectly.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル3 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are unobservable inputs for the asset or liability. Unobservable inputs are inputs for which market data are not available and that are developed using the best information available about the assumptions that the market participants would use when pricing the asset or liability.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of equity [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of fair value measurement of equity [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本の公正価値測定の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity
標準ラベル（英）: Equity
標準ラベル（日）: 資本
定義: The amount of residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for fair value measurement, entity's own equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for fair value measurement, entity's own equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値測定の理由の記述：企業自身の資本性金融商品
定義: The description of the reasons for the fair value measurement of the entity's own equity instruments. [Refer: Entity's own equity instruments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル1からレベル2への振替：報告期間の末日現在で保有している企業自身の資本性金融商品
定義: The amount of transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of the entity's own equity instruments held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Entity's own equity instruments [member]; Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル1からレベル2への振替の理由の記述：企業自身の資本性金融商品
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of the entity's own equity instruments held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments held at end of reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル2からレベル1への振替：報告期間の末日現在で保有している企業自身の資本性金融商品
定義: The amount of any transfers out of Level 2 and into Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy of the entity's own equity instruments held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Entity's own equity instruments [member]; Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値ヒエラルキーのレベル2からレベル1への振替の理由の記述：企業自身の資本性金融商品
定義: The description of the reasons for transfers out of Level 2 and into Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy of entity's own equity instruments held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of policy for determining when transfers between levels are deemed to have occurred, entity's own equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Description of policy for determining when transfers between levels are deemed to have occurred, entity's own equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: レベル間の振替がいつ生じたとみなすのかの判断に関する方針の記述：企業自身の資本性金融商品
