表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of identification of financial statements to which separate financial statements relate
標準ラベル（英）: Description of identification of financial statements to which separate financial statements relate
標準ラベル（日）: 個別財務諸表が関連する財務諸表の識別の記述
定義: The description of the identity of financial statements to which separate financial statements relate.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Identification of unadjusted comparative information
標準ラベル（英）: Identification of unadjusted comparative information
標準ラベル（日）: 未修正の比較情報の特定
定義: The identification of unadjusted comparative information in the financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement that unadjusted comparative information has been prepared on different basis
標準ラベル（英）: Statement that unadjusted comparative information has been prepared on different basis
標準ラベル（日）: 未修正の比較情報が異なる基礎で作成されている旨の記載
定義: The statement that unadjusted comparative information in the financial statements has been prepared on a different basis.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of basis of preparation of unadjusted comparative information
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of basis of preparation of unadjusted comparative information
標準ラベル（日）: 未修正の比較情報の作成基礎の説明
定義: The explanation of the basis used for the preparation of unadjusted comparative information in the financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of interests in other entities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of interests in other entities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 他の企業への関与の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for interests in other entities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of significant judgements and assumptions made in relation to interests in other entities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of significant judgements and assumptions made in relation to interests in other entities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 他の企業への関与に関する重大な判断及び仮定の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of significant judgements and assumptions made in relation to interests in other entities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that entity does not control another entity even though it holds more than half of voting rights
標準ラベル（英）: Description of significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that entity does not control another entity even though it holds more than half of voting rights
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が他の企業の議決権の過半を保有しているが支配していないと決定した際に行った重大な判断及び仮定の記述
定義: The description of significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that the entity does not control another entity even though it holds more than half of the voting rights.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that entity controls another entity even though it holds less than half of voting rights
標準ラベル（英）: Description of significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that entity controls another entity even though it holds less than half of voting rights
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が他の企業の議決権の過半を保有していないが支配していると決定した際に行った重大な判断及び仮定の記述
定義: The description of significant judgements and assumptions made when the entity determines that it controls another entity even though it holds less than half of voting rights.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that entity is agent or principal
標準ラベル（英）: Description of significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that entity is agent or principal
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が代理人なのか本人なのかを決定する際に行った重大な判断及び仮定の記述
定義: The description of the significant judgements and assumptions made when determining that the entity is an agent or a principal.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons why presumption investor has significant influence is overcome when its interest in investee is more than twenty per cent
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons why presumption investor has significant influence is overcome when its interest in investee is more than twenty per cent
標準ラベル（日）: 投資者が重要な影響力を有しているという推定が覆された理由の記述（投資先に対する持分が20％以上である場合）
定義: The description of significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that the entity does not have significant influence over another entity even though it holds more than 20 per cent of the voting rights of another entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons why presumption investor does not have significant influence is overcome when its interest in investee is less than twenty per cent
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons why presumption investor does not have significant influence is overcome when its interest in investee is less than twenty per cent
標準ラベル（日）: 投資者が重要な影響力を有していないという推定が覆された理由の記述（投資先に対する持分が20％未満である場合）
定義: The description of significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that the entity has significant influence over another entity even though it holds less than 20 per cent of the voting rights of another entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of how entity aggregated interests in similar entities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of how entity aggregated interests in similar entities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が類似した企業への関与をどのように集約したのかの開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of how the entity aggregated its interests in similar entities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of interests in subsidiaries [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of interests in subsidiaries [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社への関与の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of interests in subsidiaries. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of composition of group [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of composition of group [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業集団の構成の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the composition of the group (the parent and all its subsidiaries). [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Parent [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of subsidiaries [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of subsidiaries [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of subsidiaries. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of subsidiaries [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of subsidiaries [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of subsidiaries [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of subsidiaries [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to subsidiaries.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Subsidiaries [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Subsidiaries [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Entity's total for subsidiaries [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Entity's total for subsidiaries [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社についての企業全体の合計 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the standard value for the 'Subsidiaries' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Subsidiaries [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Subsidiaries [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for entities that are controlled by another entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Subsidiaries with material non-controlling interests [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Subsidiaries with material non-controlling interests [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 重要性のある非支配持分がある子会社 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for subsidiaries that have non-controlling interests that are material to the reporting entity. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Non-controlling interests]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of subsidiaries [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of subsidiaries [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Name of subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Name of subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の名称
定義: The name of a subsidiary. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Principal place of business of subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Principal place of business of subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の主要な事業場所
定義: The principal place of business of a subsidiary. [Refer: Principal place of business; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Country of incorporation of subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Country of incorporation of subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の法人設立国
定義: The country in which a subsidiary of the entity is incorporated. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proportion of ownership interests held by non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（英）: Proportion of ownership interests held by non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（日）: 非支配持分が保有している所有持分の割合
定義: The proportion of ownership interests in a subsidiary held by non-controlling interests. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Non-controlling interests]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proportion of voting rights held by non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（英）: Proportion of voting rights held by non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（日）: 非支配持分が保有している議決権の割合
定義: The proportion of the voting rights in a subsidiary held by non-controlling interests. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Non-controlling interests]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss), attributable to non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss), attributable to non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（日）: 純利益（純損失）：非支配持分に帰属
定義: The profit (loss) attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Profit (loss); Non-controlling interests]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（英）: Non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（日）: 非支配持分
定義: The amount of equity in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to a parent. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends paid to non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends paid to non-controlling interests
標準ラベル（日）: 非支配持分への配当金支払額
定義: The amount of dividends paid to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Non-controlling interests]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current assets
標準ラベル（英）: Current assets
標準ラベル（日）: 流動資産
定義: The amount of assets that the entity (a) expects to realise or intends to sell or consume in its normal operating cycle; (b) holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) expects to realise within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) classifies as cash or cash equivalents (as defined in IAS 7) unless the asset is restricted from being exchanged or used to settle a liability for at least twelve months after the reporting period. [Refer: Assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current assets
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current assets
標準ラベル（日）: 非流動資産
定義: The amount of assets that do not meet the definition of current assets. [Refer: Current assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Current liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 流動負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have an unconditional right to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 非流動負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that do not meet the definition of current liabilities. [Refer: Current liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revenue
標準ラベル（英）: Revenue
標準ラベル（日）: 収益
定義: The income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities. Income is increases in economic benefits during the accounting period in the form of inflows or enhancements of assets or decreases of liabilities that result in an increase in equity, other than those relating to contributions from equity participants.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss)
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss)
標準ラベル（日）: 純利益（純損失）
定義: The total of income less expenses, excluding the components of other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: 包括利益
定義: The amount of change in equity resulting from transactions and other events, other than those changes resulting from transactions with owners in their capacity as owners.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Date of end of reporting period of financial statements of subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Date of end of reporting period of financial statements of subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の財務諸表の報告期間の末日
定義: The date of the end of the reporting period of the financial statements of a subsidiary.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason why using different reporting date or period for subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason why using different reporting date or period for subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社について異なる報告日又は期間を使用している理由の記述
定義: The description of the reason why the financial statements of a subsidiary, when such financial statements are used to prepare consolidated financial statements, are as of a date or for a period that is different from that of the parent's financial statements. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of significant restrictions on entity's ability to access or use assets and settle liabilities of group
標準ラベル（英）: Description of significant restrictions on entity's ability to access or use assets and settle liabilities of group
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が企業集団の資産のアクセス又は利用及び負債の決済を行う能力に関する重大な制限の記述
定義: The description of significant restrictions (for example, statutory, contractual and regulatory restrictions) on the entity's ability to access or use the assets and settle the liabilities of the group, such as (a) those that restrict the ability of a parent or its subsidiaries to transfer cash or other assets to (or from) other entities within the group; and (b) guarantees or other requirements that may restrict dividends and other capital distributions being paid, or loans and advances being made or repaid, to (or from) other entities within the group. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature and extent to which protective rights of non-controlling interests can significantly restrict entity's ability to access or use assets and settle liabilities of group
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature and extent to which protective rights of non-controlling interests can significantly restrict entity's ability to access or use assets and settle liabilities of group
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が企業集団の資産のアクセス又は利用及び負債の決済を行う能力を著しく制限する可能性のある、非支配持分の防御的な権利の内容及び程度の記述
定義: The description of the nature and extent to which protective rights of non-controlling interests can significantly restrict the entity's ability to access or use the assets and settle the liabilities of the group (such as when a parent is obliged to settle the liabilities of a subsidiary before settling its own liabilities, or when approval of non-controlling interests is required either to access the assets or to settle the liabilities of a subsidiary). Protective rights are rights designed to protect the interest of the party holding those rights without giving that party power over the entity to which those rights relate. [Refer: Non-controlling interests; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets to which significant restrictions apply
標準ラベル（英）: Assets to which significant restrictions apply
標準ラベル（日）: 重大な制限が適用される資産
定義: The amount in the consolidated financial statements of the assets of the group to which significant restrictions (for example, statutory, contractual and regulatory restrictions) apply on the entity's ability to access or use the assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities to which significant restrictions apply
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities to which significant restrictions apply
標準ラベル（日）: 重大な制限が適用される負債
定義: The amount in the consolidated financial statements of the liabilities of the group to which significant restrictions (for example, statutory, contractual and regulatory restrictions) apply on the entity's ability to settle the liabilities of the group.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about consolidated structured entities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about consolidated structured entities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 連結している組成された企業に関する情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about consolidated structured entities. [Refer: Consolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about consolidated structured entities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about consolidated structured entities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 連結している組成された企業に関する情報の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about consolidated structured entities [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about consolidated structured entities [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 連結している組成された企業に関する情報の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to consolidated structured entities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Consolidated structured entities [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Consolidated structured entities [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 連結している組成された企業 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Entity's total for consolidated structured entities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Entity's total for consolidated structured entities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 連結している組成された企業についての企業全体の合計 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the standard value for the 'Consolidated structured entities' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Consolidated structured entities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Consolidated structured entities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 連結している組成された企業 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for consolidated structured entities. A structured entity is an entity that has been designed so that voting or similar rights are not the dominant factor in deciding who controls the entity, such as when any voting rights relate to administrative tasks only and the relevant activities are directed by means of contractual arrangements. [Refer: Consolidated [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about consolidated structured entities [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about consolidated structured entities [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 連結している組成された企業に関する情報の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of terms of contractual arrangements that could require parent or subsidiaries to provide financial support to structured entity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of terms of contractual arrangements that could require parent or subsidiaries to provide financial support to structured entity
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に財務的支援を提供することを親会社又は子会社に要求する可能性のある契約上の取決めの条件の記述
定義: The description of the terms of contractual arrangements that could require the parent or its subsidiaries to provide financial support to a structured entity, including events or circumstances that could expose the reporting entity to a loss (for example, liquidity arrangements or credit rating triggers associated with obligations to purchase assets of the structured entity or provide financial support). [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of type of support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（英）: Description of type of support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に対して契約上の義務がないのに提供した支援の種類の記述
定義: The description of the type of financial or other support (for example, purchasing assets of, or instruments issued by, the structured entity) provided to a structured entity without having a contractual obligation to do so, including situations in which the entity assisted the structured entity in obtaining financial support. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（英）: Support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に対して契約上の義務がないのに提供した支援
定義: The amount of financial or other support (for example, purchasing assets of, or instruments issued by, the structured entity) provided to a structured entity without having a contractual obligation to do so, including assistance in obtaining financial support. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for providing support to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for providing support to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に対して契約上の義務なしに支援を提供した理由の記述
定義: The description of reasons for providing financial or other support (for example, purchasing assets of, or instruments issued by, the structured entity) to a structured entity without having a contractual obligation to do so, including situations in which the entity assisted the structured entity in obtaining financial support.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of factors in reaching decision to provide support to previously unconsolidated structured entity that resulted in obtaining control
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of factors in reaching decision to provide support to previously unconsolidated structured entity that resulted in obtaining control
標準ラベル（日）: これまで非連結であった組成された企業に対して支配の獲得を生じた支援を提供する決定に至った際の要因の説明
定義: The explanation of the relevant factors in reaching the decision by a parent or any of its subsidiaries to provide, without having a contractual obligation to do so, financial or other support to a previously unconsolidated structured entity that resulted in the entity controlling the structured entity. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of intentions to provide support to structured entity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of intentions to provide support to structured entity
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に支援を提供する意図の記述
定義: The description of the entity's current intentions to provide financial or other support to a structured entity, including intentions to assist the structured entity in obtaining financial support.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of effects of changes in parent's ownership interest in subsidiary that do not result in loss of control on equity attributable to owners of parent [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of effects of changes in parent's ownership interest in subsidiary that do not result in loss of control on equity attributable to owners of parent [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 支配の喪失に至らない子会社に対する親会社の所有持分の変動が親会社の所有者に帰属する持分に与える影響の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of a schedule that shows the effects of any changes in the parent's ownership interest in a subsidiary that do not result in a loss of control on the equity attributable to owners of the parent.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control, equity attributable to owners of parent
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control, equity attributable to owners of parent
標準ラベル（日）: 支配の喪失には至らない子会社に対する所有持分の変動による増加（減少）：親会社の所有者に帰属する資本
定義: The increase (decrease) in equity attributable to owners of the parent through changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Equity attributable to owners of parent]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) recognised when control of subsidiary is lost

定義: The gains (losses) recognised in association with the loss of control over a subsidiary, which are attributable to the former controlling interest.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Portion of gains (losses) recognised when control of subsidiary is lost, attributable to recognising investment retained in former subsidiary

標準ラベル（日）: 子会社に対する支配を喪失した際に認識した利得（損失）：旧子会社に対して保持している投資の認識に起因
定義: The portion of gains (losses) from losing control of a subsidiary attributable to recognising any investment retained in the former subsidiary at its fair value at the date when control is lost. [Refer: Gains (losses) recognised when control of subsidiary is lost; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line item(s) in profit or loss in which gain (loss) is recognised when control of subsidiary is lost

定義: The description of the line item(s) in profit or loss in which the gain (loss) is recognised (if not presented separately) when control of a subsidiary is lost. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

定義: The disclosure of associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

標準ラベル（日）: 個々には重要性のない関連会社の合算 [メンバー]

標準ラベル（日）: 関連会社の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

標準ラベル（英）: Name of associate
標準ラベル（日）: 関連会社の名称
定義: The name of an associate. [Refer: Associates [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of entity's relationship with associate
標準ラベル（日）: 企業の関連会社との関係の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the entity's relationship with an associate (for example, describing the nature of the activities of the associate and whether they are strategic to the entity's activities). [Refer: Associates [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Principal place of business of associate
標準ラベル（日）: 関連会社の主要な事業場所
定義: The principal place of business of an associate. [Refer: Principal place of business; Associates [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Country of incorporation of associate
標準ラベル（日）: 関連会社の法人設立国
定義: The country in which an associate of the entity is incorporated. [Refer: Associates [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proportion of ownership interest in associate
標準ラベル（英）: Proportion of ownership interest in associate

定義: The proportion of ownership interest in an associate attributable to the entity. [Refer: Associates [member]]

定義: The proportion of the voting rights in an associate held by the entity. [Refer: Associates [member]]

定義: The description of whether the investment in an associate is measured using the equity method or at fair value. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Associates [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Description of basis of preparation of summarised financial information of associate
標準ラベル（日）: 関連会社の要約財務情報の作成の基礎の記述
定義: The description of the basis of preparation of summarised financial information of an associate. [Refer: Associates [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends received
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends received
標準ラベル（日）: 配当金受取額
定義: The amount of dividends received.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current assets
標準ラベル（英）: Current assets
標準ラベル（日）: 流動資産
定義: The amount of assets that the entity (a) expects to realise or intends to sell or consume in its normal operating cycle; (b) holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) expects to realise within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) classifies as cash or cash equivalents (as defined in IAS 7) unless the asset is restricted from being exchanged or used to settle a liability for at least twelve months after the reporting period. [Refer: Assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current assets
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current assets
標準ラベル（日）: 非流動資産
定義: The amount of assets that do not meet the definition of current assets. [Refer: Current assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Current liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 流動負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have an unconditional right to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 非流動負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that do not meet the definition of current liabilities. [Refer: Current liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revenue
標準ラベル（英）: Revenue
標準ラベル（日）: 収益
定義: The income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities. Income is increases in economic benefits during the accounting period in the form of inflows or enhancements of assets or decreases of liabilities that result in an increase in equity, other than those relating to contributions from equity participants.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) from continuing operations
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) from continuing operations
標準ラベル（日）: 継続事業からの純利益（純損失）

定義: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益
定義: The amount of income and expense (including reclassification adjustments) that is not recognised in profit or loss as required or permitted by IFRSs. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: 包括利益
定義: The amount of change in equity resulting from transactions and other events, other than those changes resulting from transactions with owners in their capacity as owners.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value of investments in associates for which there are quoted market prices
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of investments in associates for which there are quoted market prices
標準ラベル（日）: 公表市場価格のある関連会社に対する投資の公正価値
定義: The fair value of investments in associates if there are quoted market prices for the investment. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments in associates]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Investments accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している投資
定義: The amount of investments accounted for using the equity method. The equity method is a method of accounting whereby the investment is initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter for the post-acquisition change in the investor's share of net assets of the investee. The investor's profit or loss includes its share of the profit or loss of the investee. The investor's other comprehensive income includes its share of the other comprehensive income of the investee. [Refer: At cost [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of profit (loss) from continuing operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method

定義: The entity's share of the profit (loss) from continuing operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Continuing operations [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss) from continuing operations]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of post-tax profit (loss) from discontinued operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method

定義: The entity's share of the post-tax profit (loss) from discontinued operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Discontinued operations [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss) from discontinued operations]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, net of tax
標準ラベル（英）: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, net of tax

定義: The entity's share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, net of tax. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of total comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Share of total comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method

定義: The entity's share of the total comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Joint ventures [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method]

定義: The disclosure of the reconciliation of the summarised financial information of an associate accounted for using the equity method to the carrying amount of the reporting entity's interest in the associate. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]; Associates [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of joint ventures [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Name of joint venture
標準ラベル（英）: Name of joint venture
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業の名称
定義: The name of a joint venture. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of entity's relationship with joint venture
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of entity's relationship with joint venture
標準ラベル（日）: 企業の共同支配企業との関係の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the entity's relationship with a joint venture (for example, describing the nature of the activities of the joint venture and whether they are strategic to the entity's activities). [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Principal place of business of joint venture
標準ラベル（英）: Principal place of business of joint venture
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業の主要な事業場所
定義: The principal place of business of a joint venture. [Refer: Principal place of business; Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Country of incorporation of joint venture
標準ラベル（英）: Country of incorporation of joint venture
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業の法人設立国
定義: The country in which a joint venture of the entity is incorporated. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proportion of ownership interest in joint venture
標準ラベル（英）: Proportion of ownership interest in joint venture
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業に対する所有持分割合
定義: The proportion of ownership interest in a joint venture attributable to the entity. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proportion of voting rights held in joint venture
標準ラベル（英）: Proportion of voting rights held in joint venture
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業に対して保有している議決権の割合
定義: The proportion of the voting rights in a joint venture held by the entity. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of whether investment in joint venture is measured using equity method or at fair value
標準ラベル（英）: Description of whether investment in joint venture is measured using equity method or at fair value
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業に対する投資を持分法と公正価値のいずれで測定するのかの記述
定義: The description of whether the investment in a joint venture is measured using the equity method or at fair value. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of basis of preparation of summarised financial information of joint venture
標準ラベル（英）: Description of basis of preparation of summarised financial information of joint venture
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業の要約財務情報の作成の基礎の記述
定義: The description of the basis of preparation of summarised financial information of a joint venture. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dividends received
標準ラベル（英）: Dividends received
標準ラベル（日）: 配当金受取額
定義: The amount of dividends received.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current assets
標準ラベル（英）: Current assets
標準ラベル（日）: 流動資産
定義: The amount of assets that the entity (a) expects to realise or intends to sell or consume in its normal operating cycle; (b) holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) expects to realise within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) classifies as cash or cash equivalents (as defined in IAS 7) unless the asset is restricted from being exchanged or used to settle a liability for at least twelve months after the reporting period. [Refer: Assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current assets
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current assets
標準ラベル（日）: 非流動資産
定義: The amount of assets that do not meet the definition of current assets. [Refer: Current assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Current liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 流動負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have an unconditional right to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 非流動負債
定義: The amount of liabilities that do not meet the definition of current liabilities. [Refer: Current liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revenue
標準ラベル（英）: Revenue
標準ラベル（日）: 収益
定義: The income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities. Income is increases in economic benefits during the accounting period in the form of inflows or enhancements of assets or decreases of liabilities that result in an increase in equity, other than those relating to contributions from equity participants.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) from continuing operations
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) from continuing operations
標準ラベル（日）: 継続事業からの純利益（純損失）
定義: The profit (loss) from continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations
標準ラベル（日）: 非継続事業からの純利益（純損失）
定義: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益
定義: The amount of income and expense (including reclassification adjustments) that is not recognised in profit or loss as required or permitted by IFRSs. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: 包括利益
定義: The amount of change in equity resulting from transactions and other events, other than those changes resulting from transactions with owners in their capacity as owners.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物
定義: The amount of cash on hand and demand deposits, along with short-term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and that are subject to an insignificant risk of changes in value. [Refer: Cash; Cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other current financial liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Other current financial liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の金融負債（流動）
定義: The amount of current financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities; Current financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other non-current financial liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Other non-current financial liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の金融負債（非流動）
定義: The amount of non-current financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Depreciation and amortisation expense
標準ラベル（英）: Depreciation and amortisation expense
標準ラベル（日）: 減価償却費及び償却費
定義: The amount of depreciation and amortisation expense. Depreciation and amortisation are the systematic allocations of depreciable amounts of assets over their useful lives.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest income
標準ラベル（英）: Interest income
標準ラベル（日）: 金利収益
定義: The amount of income arising from interest.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest expense
標準ラベル（英）: Interest expense
標準ラベル（日）: 金利費用
定義: The amount of expense arising from interest.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax expense (income), continuing operations
標準ラベル（英）: Tax expense (income), continuing operations
標準ラベル（日）: 税金費用（収益）：継続事業
定義: The aggregate amount included in the determination of profit (loss) for the period in respect of current tax and deferred tax that relate to continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Current tax expense (income); Deferred tax expense (income)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value of investments in joint ventures for which there are quoted market prices
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of investments in joint ventures for which there are quoted market prices
標準ラベル（日）: 公表市場価格のある共同支配企業に対する投資の公正価値
定義: The fair value of investments in joint ventures if there are quoted market prices for the investment. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]; Investments in joint ventures]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Investments accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している投資
定義: The amount of investments accounted for using the equity method. The equity method is a method of accounting whereby the investment is initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter for the post-acquisition change in the investor's share of net assets of the investee. The investor's profit or loss includes its share of the profit or loss of the investee. The investor's other comprehensive income includes its share of the other comprehensive income of the investee. [Refer: At cost [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of profit (loss) from continuing operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Share of profit (loss) from continuing operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している関連会社及び共同支配企業の継続事業からの純利益（純損失）に対する持分
定義: The entity's share of the profit (loss) from continuing operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Continuing operations [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss) from continuing operations]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of post-tax profit (loss) from discontinued operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Share of post-tax profit (loss) from discontinued operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している関連会社及び共同支配企業の非継続事業からの税引後利益（損失）に対する持分
定義: The entity's share of the post-tax profit (loss) from discontinued operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Discontinued operations [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss) from discontinued operations]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, net of tax
標準ラベル（英）: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, net of tax
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している関連会社及び共同支配企業のその他の包括利益に対する持分（税引後）
定義: The entity's share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, net of tax. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of total comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Share of total comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している関連会社及び共同支配企業の包括利益合計額に対する持分
定義: The entity's share of the total comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Joint ventures [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reconciliation of summarised financial information of joint venture accounted for using equity method to carrying amount of interest in joint venture [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reconciliation of summarised financial information of joint venture accounted for using equity method to carrying amount of interest in joint venture [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している共同支配企業の要約財務情報と共同支配企業に対する持分の帳簿価額との調整表の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the reconciliation of the summarised financial information of a joint venture accounted for using the equity method to the carrying amount of the reporting entity's interest in the joint venture. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]; Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature and extent of significant restrictions on transfer of funds to entity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature and extent of significant restrictions on transfer of funds to entity
標準ラベル（日）: 企業への送金に対する重大な制限の内容及び程度の記述
定義: The description of the nature and extent of any significant restrictions (for example, resulting from borrowing arrangements or regulatory requirements) on the ability of other entities to transfer funds to the reporting entity in the form of cash dividends or to repay loans or advances.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Date of end of reporting period of financial statements of joint venture
標準ラベル（英）: Date of end of reporting period of financial statements of joint venture
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業の財務諸表の報告期間の末日
定義: The date of the end of the reporting period of the financial statements of a joint venture.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason why using different reporting date or period for joint venture
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason why using different reporting date or period for joint venture
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業について異なる報告日又は期間を使用している理由の記述
定義: The description of the reason why the financial statements of a joint venture used in applying the equity method are as of a date or for a period that is different from that of the entity. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures
標準ラベル（英）: Unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業の損失に対する未認識の持分相当額
定義: The amount of the unrecognised share of joint ventures' losses if the entity has stopped recognising its share of losses when applying the equity method. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cumulative unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures
標準ラベル（英）: Cumulative unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業の損失に対する未認識の持分の累計額
定義: The cumulative amount of the unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures if the entity has stopped recognising its share of losses when applying the equity method. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]; Unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Commitments in relation to joint ventures
標準ラベル（英）: Commitments in relation to joint ventures
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業に係るコミットメント
定義: The commitments that the entity has relating to its joint ventures as specified in paragraphs B18-B20 of IFRS 12. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Contingent liabilities incurred in relation to interests in joint ventures
標準ラベル（英）: Contingent liabilities incurred in relation to interests in joint ventures
標準ラベル（日）: 共同支配企業に対する持分に関して発生した偶発負債
定義: The amount of contingent liabilities incurred in relation to interests in joint ventures. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of contingent liabilities of joint ventures incurred jointly with other investors
標準ラベル（英）: Share of contingent liabilities of joint ventures incurred jointly with other investors
標準ラベル（日）: 他の投資者と共同で負っている共同支配企業の偶発負債に対する持分
定義: The entity's share of contingent liabilities incurred jointly with other investors with joint control of the joint ventures. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Joint ventures [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of interests in unconsolidated structured entities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of interests in unconsolidated structured entities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の組成された企業への関与の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of interests in structured entities that are not controlled by the entity (unconsolidated structured entities). [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of unconsolidated structured entities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of unconsolidated structured entities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の組成された企業の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of unconsolidated structured entities. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of unconsolidated structured entities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of unconsolidated structured entities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の組成された企業の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of unconsolidated structured entities [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of unconsolidated structured entities [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の組成された企業の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to unconsolidated structured entities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unconsolidated structured entities [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Unconsolidated structured entities [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の組成された企業 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Entity's total for unconsolidated structured entities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Entity's total for unconsolidated structured entities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の組成された企業についての企業全体の合計 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the standard value for the 'Unconsolidated structured entities' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の組成された企業 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for unconsolidated structured entities. A structured entity is an entity that has been designed so that voting or similar rights are not the dominant factor in deciding who controls the entity, such as when any voting rights relate to administrative tasks only and the relevant activities are directed by means of contractual arrangements. [Refer: Consolidated [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Securitisation vehicles [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Securitisation vehicles [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 証券化ビークル [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for vehicles used for the process of securitisation, whereby individual assets are pooled together and sold to a special purpose vehicle that issues debt instruments backed by the pool of assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Asset-backed financings [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Asset-backed financings [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資産担保金融 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for asset-backed financings.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investment funds [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Investment funds [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資ファンド [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for investment funds.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of unconsolidated structured entities [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of unconsolidated structured entities [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の組成された企業の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about interests in structured entity [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about interests in structured entity [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に対する関与に関する情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of qualitative and quantitative information about the entity's interests in structured entities, including, but not limited to, the nature, purpose, size and activities of the structured entity and how the structured entity is financed.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how entity determined which structured entities it sponsored
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how entity determined which structured entities it sponsored
標準ラベル（日）: 企業がどの組成された企業のスポンサーとなっているのかをどのように判断したのかの記述
定義: The description of how the entity has determined which structured entities it has sponsored.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income from structured entities
標準ラベル（英）: Income from structured entities
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業からの収益
定義: The amount of income from structured entities including recurring and non-recurring fees, interest, dividends, gains or losses on the remeasurement or derecognition of interests in structured entities and gains or losses from the transfer of assets and liabilities to the structured entity. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of types of income from structured entities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of types of income from structured entities
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業からの収益の形態の記述
定義: The description of the types of income from structured entities. [Refer: Income from structured entities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets transferred to structured entities, at time of transfer
標準ラベル（英）: Assets transferred to structured entities, at time of transfer
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に移転された資産（移転時）
定義: The amount, at the time of transfer, of all assets transferred to structured entities. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets recognised in entity's financial statements in relation to structured entities
標準ラベル（英）: Assets recognised in entity's financial statements in relation to structured entities
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に関して企業の財務諸表に認識した資産
定義: The amount of assets recognised in the entity's financial statements relating to its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Assets; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities recognised in entity's financial statements in relation to structured entities
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities recognised in entity's financial statements in relation to structured entities
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に関して企業の財務諸表に認識した負債
定義: The amount of liabilities recognised in the entity's financial statements relating to its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Liabilities; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line items in statement of financial position in which assets and liabilities recognised in relation to structured entities are recognised
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line items in statement of financial position in which assets and liabilities recognised in relation to structured entities are recognised
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に係る資産及び負債が認識されている財政状態計算書上の表示科目の記述
定義: The description of the line items in the statement of financial position in which assets and liabilities in relation to structured entities are recognised.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities
標準ラベル（英）: Maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業への関与から生じる損失に対する最大エクスポージャー
定義: The amount that best represents the entity's maximum exposure to loss from its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about how maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities is determined
標準ラベル（英）: Information about how maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities is determined
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業への関与から生じる損失に対する最大エクスポージャーの算定方法に関する情報
定義: Information about how the amount that best represents the entity's maximum exposure to loss from its interests in structured entities is determined. [Refer: Maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of fact and reasons why maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities cannot be quantified
標準ラベル（英）: Description of fact and reasons why maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities cannot be quantified
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業への関与から生じる損失に対する最大エクスポージャーが定量化できない旨及びその理由の記述
定義: The description of the fact and reasons why the entity cannot quantify its maximum exposure to loss from its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of comparison between assets and liabilities recognised in relation to structured entities and maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of comparison between assets and liabilities recognised in relation to structured entities and maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に関して認識した資産及び負債と組成された企業への関与から生じる損失に対する最大エクスポージャーとの比較の記述
定義: The description of the comparison of the carrying amount of assets and liabilities of the entity that relate to its interests in structured entities and the entity's maximum exposure to loss from those entities. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]; Maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of type of support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（英）: Description of type of support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に対して契約上の義務がないのに提供した支援の種類の記述
定義: The description of the type of financial or other support (for example, purchasing assets of, or instruments issued by, the structured entity) provided to a structured entity without having a contractual obligation to do so, including situations in which the entity assisted the structured entity in obtaining financial support. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（英）: Support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に対して契約上の義務がないのに提供した支援
定義: The amount of financial or other support (for example, purchasing assets of, or instruments issued by, the structured entity) provided to a structured entity without having a contractual obligation to do so, including assistance in obtaining financial support. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for providing support to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for providing support to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に対して契約上の義務なしに支援を提供した理由の記述
定義: The description of reasons for providing financial or other support (for example, purchasing assets of, or instruments issued by, the structured entity) to a structured entity without having a contractual obligation to do so, including situations in which the entity assisted the structured entity in obtaining financial support.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of intentions to provide support to structured entity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of intentions to provide support to structured entity
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に支援を提供する意図の記述
定義: The description of the entity's current intentions to provide financial or other support to a structured entity, including intentions to assist the structured entity in obtaining financial support.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Additional information about nature of and changes in risks associated with interests in structured entities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Additional information about nature of and changes in risks associated with interests in structured entities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業への関与に関連したリスクの内容及び変動に関する追加的な情報 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of additional information about the nature of, and changes in, risks associated with interests in structured entities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of terms of contractual arrangements that could require parent or subsidiaries to provide financial support to structured entity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of terms of contractual arrangements that could require parent or subsidiaries to provide financial support to structured entity
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業に財務的支援を提供することを親会社又は子会社に要求する可能性のある契約上の取決めの条件の記述
定義: The description of the terms of contractual arrangements that could require the parent or its subsidiaries to provide financial support to a structured entity, including events or circumstances that could expose the reporting entity to a loss (for example, liquidity arrangements or credit rating triggers associated with obligations to purchase assets of the structured entity or provide financial support). [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Losses incurred in relation to interests in structured entities
標準ラベル（英）: Losses incurred in relation to interests in structured entities
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業への関与に関して生じた損失
定義: The amount of losses incurred by the entity relating to its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of whether entity is required to absorb losses of structured entities before other parties
標準ラベル（英）: Description of whether entity is required to absorb losses of structured entities before other parties
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業の損失を企業が他の当事者よりも前に負担することを要求されているかどうかの記述
定義: The description of whether the entity is required to absorb losses of structured entities before other parties.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Maximum limit of losses of structured entities which entity is required to absorb before other parties
標準ラベル（英）: Maximum limit of losses of structured entities which entity is required to absorb before other parties
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業の損失を企業が他の当事者よりも前に負担することを要求されている場合の当該損失の上限
定義: The maximum limit of losses of structured entities that the entity is required to absorb before other parties. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of ranking and amounts of potential losses in structured entities borne by parties whose interests rank lower than entity's interests [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of ranking and amounts of potential losses in structured entities borne by parties whose interests rank lower than entity's interests [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 関与が企業よりも後順位の当事者が負担する、組成された企業の潜在的損失の順位及び金額の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the ranking and amounts of potential losses in structured entities borne by parties whose interests rank lower than entity's interests in the structured entities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about liquidity arrangements, guarantees or other commitments with third parties that may affect fair value or risk of interests in structured entities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about liquidity arrangements, guarantees or other commitments with third parties that may affect fair value or risk of interests in structured entities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 第三者との流動性に関する取決め、保証又は他のコミットメントで、組成された企業に対する持分の公正価値又はリスクに影響を与える可能性のあるものに関する情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about liquidity arrangements, guarantees or other commitments with third parties that may affect the fair value or risk of the entity's interests in structured entities. [Refer: Guarantees [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of difficulties structured entity experienced in financing its activities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of difficulties structured entity experienced in financing its activities
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業が活動資金を調達する際に経験した困難の記述
定義: The description of the difficulties that a structured entity has experienced in financing its activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of forms of funding of structured entity and their weighted-average life [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of forms of funding of structured entity and their weighted-average life [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 組成された企業の資金調達の形態及びその加重平均存続期間の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the forms of funding (for example, commercial paper or medium-term notes) of structured entities and their weighted-average life.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of investment entities. An investment entity is an entity that: (a) obtains funds from one or more investors for the purpose of providing those investor(s) with investment management services; (b) commits to its investor(s) that its business purpose is to invest funds solely for returns from capital appreciation, investment income, or both; and (c) measures and evaluates the performance of substantially all of its investments on a fair value basis.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that entity is investment entity
標準ラベル（英）: Information about significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that entity is investment entity
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が投資企業であると判定した際に行った重要な判断及び仮定に関する情報
定義: Information about significant judgements and assumptions made in determining that the entity is an investment entity. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for concluding that entity is investment entity if it does not have one or more typical characteristics
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for concluding that entity is investment entity if it does not have one or more typical characteristics
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が典型的な特徴のうちの1つ又は複数を有していない場合に投資企業であると結論を下した理由の記述
定義: The description of the reasons for concluding that the entity is an investment entity if it does not have one or more typical characteristics of an investment entity. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of change of investment entity status
標準ラベル（英）: Description of change of investment entity status
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業の地位の変動の記述
定義: The description of the change of investment entity status. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for change of investment entity status
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for change of investment entity status
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業の地位の変動の理由の記述
定義: The description of the reasons for the change of investment entity status. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of effect of change of investment entity status on financial statements [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of effect of change of investment entity status on financial statements [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業の地位の変動が財務諸表に与える影響の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the effect of the change of investment entity status on the financial statements. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Fair value of subsidiaries that cease to be consolidated as of date of change of investment entity status
標準ラベル（英）: Fair value of subsidiaries that cease to be consolidated as of date of change of investment entity status
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業の地位の変動日現在での、連結しなくなった子会社の公正価値
定義: The fair value, as of the date of change of investment entity status, of subsidiaries that cease to be consolidated. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gain (loss) on cessation of consolidation of subsidiaries due to change of investment entity status
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) on cessation of consolidation of subsidiaries due to change of investment entity status
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業の地位の変動による子会社の連結の停止に係る利得（損失）
定義: The gain (loss) arising on the cessation of the consolidation of subsidiaries due to the change of investment entity status. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of line item(s) in profit or loss in which gain (loss) on cessation of consolidation of subsidiaries is recognised
標準ラベル（英）: Description of line item(s) in profit or loss in which gain (loss) on cessation of consolidation of subsidiaries is recognised
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の連結の停止に係る利得（損失）が認識されている純損益の中の表示科目の記述
定義: The description of line item(s) in profit or loss in which gain (loss) on cessation of consolidation of subsidiaries due to change of investment entity status is recognised. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement that investment entity is required to apply exception from consolidation
標準ラベル（英）: Statement that investment entity is required to apply exception from consolidation
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業が連結からの例外の適用を要求されている旨の記載
定義: The statement that the investment entity is required to apply an exception from consolidation. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated subsidiaries [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated subsidiaries [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の子会社に関する情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about unconsolidated subsidiaries. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated subsidiaries [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated subsidiaries [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の子会社に関する情報の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated subsidiaries [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated subsidiaries [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の子会社に関する情報の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to unconsolidated subsidiaries.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unconsolidated subsidiaries [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Unconsolidated subsidiaries [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の子会社 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Entity's total for unconsolidated subsidiaries [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Entity's total for unconsolidated subsidiaries [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の子会社についての企業全体の合計 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the standard value for the 'Unconsolidated subsidiaries' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unconsolidated subsidiaries [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Unconsolidated subsidiaries [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の子会社 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for unconsolidated subsidiaries. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unconsolidated subsidiaries that investment entity controls directly [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Unconsolidated subsidiaries that investment entity controls directly [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業が直接支配している非連結の子会社 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for unconsolidated subsidiaries that the investment entity controls directly. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unconsolidated subsidiaries controlled by subsidiaries of investment entity [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Unconsolidated subsidiaries controlled by subsidiaries of investment entity [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業の子会社が支配している非連結の子会社 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for unconsolidated subsidiaries controlled by subsidiaries of the investment entity. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated subsidiaries [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated subsidiaries [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の子会社に関する情報の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Name of subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Name of subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の名称
定義: The name of a subsidiary. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Principal place of business of subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Principal place of business of subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の主要な事業場所
定義: The principal place of business of a subsidiary. [Refer: Principal place of business; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Country of incorporation of subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Country of incorporation of subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社の法人設立国
定義: The country in which a subsidiary of the entity is incorporated. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proportion of ownership interest in subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Proportion of ownership interest in subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社に対する所有持分割合
定義: The proportion of ownership interest in a subsidiary attributable to the entity. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Proportion of voting rights held in subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Proportion of voting rights held in subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社に対して保有している議決権の割合
定義: The proportion of the voting rights in a subsidiary held by the entity. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature and extent of significant restrictions on transfer of funds to entity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature and extent of significant restrictions on transfer of funds to entity
標準ラベル（日）: 企業への送金に対する重大な制限の内容及び程度の記述
定義: The description of the nature and extent of any significant restrictions (for example, resulting from borrowing arrangements or regulatory requirements) on the ability of other entities to transfer funds to the reporting entity in the form of cash dividends or to repay loans or advances.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of current commitments or intentions to provide support to subsidiary
標準ラベル（英）: Description of current commitments or intentions to provide support to subsidiary
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社に支援を提供するという現在のコミットメント又は意図の記述
定義: The description of current commitments or intentions to provide support to a subsidiary. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of type of support provided to subsidiary by investment entity or its subsidiaries without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（英）: Description of type of support provided to subsidiary by investment entity or its subsidiaries without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業又はその子会社が契約上の義務なしに子会社に提供した支援の種類の記述
定義: The description of the type of support provided to a subsidiary by the investment entity or its subsidiaries without having a contractual obligation to do so. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Support provided to subsidiary by investment entity or its subsidiaries without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（英）: Support provided to subsidiary by investment entity or its subsidiaries without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業又はその子会社が契約上の義務なしに子会社に提供した支援
定義: The amount of support provided to a subsidiary by the investment entity or its subsidiaries without having a contractual obligation to do so. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reasons for providing support to subsidiary by investment entity or its subsidiaries without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reasons for providing support to subsidiary by investment entity or its subsidiaries without having contractual obligation to do so
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業又はその子会社が契約上の義務なしに子会社に支援を提供した理由の記述
定義: The description of the reasons for providing support to a subsidiary by the investment entity or its subsidiaries without having a contractual obligation to do so. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業が支配している非連結の組成された企業に関する情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about unconsolidated structured entities controlled by an investment entity. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業が支配している非連結の組成された企業に関する情報の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業が支配している非連結の組成された企業に関する情報の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to unconsolidated structured entities controlled by the investment entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業が支配している非連結の組成された企業 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業が支配している非連結の組成された企業 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for unconsolidated structured entities controlled by an investment entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about unconsolidated structured entities controlled by investment entity [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業が支配している非連結の組成された企業に関する情報の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of terms of contractual arrangements that could require investment entity or its subsidiaries to provide financial support to unconsolidated structured entity controlled by investment entity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of terms of contractual arrangements that could require investment entity or its subsidiaries to provide financial support to unconsolidated structured entity controlled by investment entity
標準ラベル（日）: 投資企業が支配している非連結の組成された企業への財務的支援を提供することを投資企業又はその子会社に要求する可能性のある契約上の取決めの条件の記述
定義: The description of the terms of contractual arrangements that could require an investment entity or its subsidiaries to provide financial support to an unconsolidated structured entity controlled by the investment entity. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of relevant factors in reaching decision to provide support that resulted in controlling unconsolidated structured entity
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of relevant factors in reaching decision to provide support that resulted in controlling unconsolidated structured entity
標準ラベル（日）: 非連結の組成された企業を支配する結果となった支援を提供する意思決定に至った関連性のある要因の説明
定義: The explanation of the relevant factors in reaching the decision by an investment entity or any of its unconsolidated subsidiaries to provide, without having a contractual obligation to do so, financial or other support to an unconsolidated, structured entity that the investment entity did not control, that resulted in obtaining control. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of fact that entity does not have legal or constructive obligation to negative net assets, transition from proportionate consolidation to equity method

標準ラベル（日）: 負の純資産に係る法的債務又は推定的債務を企業が有していない旨の記述：比例連結から持分法への移行
定義: The description of the fact that the entity does not have a legal or constructive obligation in relation to the negative net assets, if aggregating all previously proportionately consolidated assets and liabilities on transition from proportionate consolidation to equity method results in negative net assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cumulative unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures, transition from proportionate consolidation to equity method

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of breakdown of assets and liabilities aggregated into single line investment balance, transition from proportionate consolidation to equity method [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 単一科目の投資残高に集約された資産及び負債の内訳の開示：比例連結から持分法への移行 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the breakdown of assets and liabilities that have been aggregated into the single line investment balance for the transition from proportionate consolidation to the equity method.

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reconciliation between investment derecognised and assets and liabilities recognised, transition from equity method to accounting for assets and liabilities [text block]
