標準ラベル（日）: 5年超 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of later than five years.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of finance lease and operating lease by lessor [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of finance lease and operating lease by lessor [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 貸手によるファイナンス・リース及びオペレーティング・リースの開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gross investment in finance lease
標準ラベル（英）: Gross investment in finance lease
標準ラベル（日）: ファイナンス・リースの投資未回収総額
定義: The aggregate of: (a) the minimum lease payments receivable by the lessor under a finance lease; and (b) any unguaranteed residual value accruing to the lessor. Minimum lease payments are payments over the lease term that the lessee is or can be required to make, excluding contingent rent, costs for services and taxes to be paid by, and reimbursed to, the lessor, together with: (a) for a lessee, any amounts guaranteed by the lessee or by a party related to the lessee; or (b) for a lessor, any residual value guaranteed to the lessor by: (i) the lessee; (ii) a party related to the lessee; or (iii) a third party unrelated to the lessor that is financially capable of discharging the obligations under the guarantee.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unearned finance income on finance lease
標準ラベル（英）: Unearned finance income on finance lease
標準ラベル（日）: ファイナンス・リースに係る未稼得金融収益
定義: The difference for a finance lease between: (a) the gross investment in the lease, and (b) the net investment in the lease. The gross investment in the lease is the aggregate of: (a) the minimum lease payments receivable by the lessor under a finance lease; and (b) any unguaranteed residual value accruing to the lessor. The net investment in the lease is the gross investment in the lease discounted at the interest rate implicit in the lease. [Refer: Finance income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Minimum finance lease payments receivable, at present value
標準ラベル（英）: Minimum finance lease payments receivable, at present value
標準ラベル（日）: 受取最低ファイナンス・リース料総額（現在価値）
定義: The present value of minimum finance lease payments receivable. Minimum lease payments are payments over the lease term that the lessee is or can be required to make, excluding contingent rent, costs for services and taxes to be paid by, and reimbursed to, the lessor, together with: (a) for a lessee, any amounts guaranteed by the lessee or by a party related to the lessee; or (b) for a lessor, any residual value guaranteed to the lessor by: (i) the lessee; (ii) a party related to the lessee; or (iii) a third party unrelated to the lessor that is financially capable of discharging the obligations under the guarantee.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Minimum lease payments receivable under non-cancellable operating lease
標準ラベル（英）: Minimum lease payments receivable under non-cancellable operating lease
標準ラベル（日）: 解約不能オペレーティング・リースによる最低受取リース料総額
定義: The amount of future minimum lease payments receivable under non-cancellable operating leases. Minimum lease payments are payments over the lease term that the lessee is or can be required to make, excluding contingent rent, costs for services and taxes to be paid by, and reimbursed to, the lessor, together with: (a) for a lessee, any amounts guaranteed by the lessee or by a party related to the lessee; or (b) for a lessor, any residual value guaranteed to the lessor by: (i) the lessee; (ii) a party related to the lessee; or (iii) a third party unrelated to the lessor that is financially capable of discharging the obligations under the guarantee.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Contingent rents recognised as income [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Contingent rents recognised as income [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 収益として認識した変動リース料 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Contingent rents recognised as income, classified as finance lease
標準ラベル（英）: Contingent rents recognised as income, classified as finance lease
標準ラベル（日）: 収益として認識した変動リース料（ファイナンス・リースに分類）
定義: The amount of contingent rents recognised as income for finance leases. [Refer: Contingent rents recognised as income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Contingent rents recognised as income, classified as operating lease
標準ラベル（英）: Contingent rents recognised as income, classified as operating lease
標準ラベル（日）: 収益として認識した変動リース料（オペレーティング・リースに分類）
定義: The amount of contingent rents recognised as income for operating leases. [Refer: Contingent rents recognised as income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total contingent rents recognised as income
標準ラベル（英）: Contingent rents recognised as income
標準ラベル（日）: 収益として認識した変動リース料
定義: The portion of lease payments recognised as income that is not fixed in amount but is based on the future amount of a factor that changes other than with the passage of time (for example, percentage of future sales, amount of future use, future price indices, future market rates of interest).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of unguaranteed residual values accruing to benefit of lessor
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of unguaranteed residual values accruing to benefit of lessor
標準ラベル（日）: 貸手の利益となる無保証残存価値の説明
定義: The explanation of unguaranteed residual values accruing to the benefit of the lessor. Unguaranteed residual value is that portion of the residual value of the leased asset, the realisation of which by the lessor is not assured or is guaranteed solely by a party related to the lessor.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments receivable
標準ラベル（英）: Accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments receivable
標準ラベル（日）: 回収不能な受取最低リース料総額に対する引当金累計額
定義: The amount of accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments receivable. Minimum lease payments are payments over the lease term that the lessee is or can be required to make, excluding contingent rent, costs for services and taxes to be paid by and reimbursed to the lessor, together with: (a) for a lessee, any amounts guaranteed by the lessee or by a party related to the lessee; or (b) for a lessor, any residual value guaranteed to the lessor by: (i) the lessee; (ii) a party related to the lessee; or (iii) a third party unrelated to the lessor that is financially capable of discharging the obligations under the guarantee.

定義: This member stands for assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of quantitative information about right-of-use assets [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of quantitative information about right-of-use assets [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 使用権資産に関する定量的情報の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Depreciation, right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（英）: Depreciation, right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（日）: 減価償却額：使用権資産
定義: The amount of depreciation of right-of-use assets. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Right-of-use assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（英）: Right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（日）: 使用権資産
定義: The amount of assets that represent a lessee's right to use an underlying asset for the lease term. Underlying asset is an asset that is the subject of a lease, for which the right to use that asset has been provided by a lessor to a lessee.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Effective date of revaluation, right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（英）: Effective date of revaluation, right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（日）: 再評価の実施日：使用権資産
定義: The effective date of the revaluation for right-of-use assets stated at revalued amounts. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of involvement of independent valuer in revaluation, right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of involvement of independent valuer in revaluation, right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（日）: 再評価への独立した鑑定人の関与の説明：使用権資産
定義: The explanation of whether an independent valuer was involved for right-of-use assets stated at revalued amounts. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Right-of-use assets, revalued assets, at cost
標準ラベル（英）: Right-of-use assets, revalued assets, at cost
標準ラベル（日）: 使用権資産：再評価資産（取得原価）
定義: The amount of right-of-use assets that would have been recognised had the revalued assets been carried under the cost model. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Right-of-use assets, revaluation surplus
標準ラベル（英）: Right-of-use assets, revaluation surplus
標準ラベル（日）: 使用権資産：再評価剰余金
定義: The amount of the revaluation surplus that relates to right-of-use assets. [Refer: Revaluation surplus; Right-of-use assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Right-of-use assets, increase (decrease) in revaluation surplus
標準ラベル（英）: Right-of-use assets, increase (decrease) in revaluation surplus
標準ラベル（日）: 使用権資産：再評価剰余金の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in the revaluation surplus that relates to right-of-use assets. [Refer: Revaluation surplus; Right-of-use assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of restrictions on distribution of revaluation surplus to shareholders, right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of restrictions on distribution of revaluation surplus to shareholders, right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（日）: 再評価剰余金の株主への分配に対する制限の記述：使用権資産
定義: The description of any restrictions on the distribution to shareholders of the balance of the revaluation surplus for right-of-use assets. [Refer: Revaluation surplus; Right-of-use assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest expense on lease liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Interest expense on lease liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: リース負債に係る金利費用
定義: The amount of interest expense on lease liabilities. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expense relating to short-term leases for which recognition exemption has been used
標準ラベル（英）: Expense relating to short-term leases for which recognition exemption has been used
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の免除を適用した短期リースに係る費用
定義: The amount of the expense relating to short-term leases accounted for applying paragraph 6 of IFRS 16. This expense need not include the expense relating to leases with a lease term of one month or less. Short-term lease is a lease that, at the commencement date, has a lease term of 12 months or less. A lease that contains a purchase option is not a short-term lease.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expense relating to leases of low-value assets for which recognition exemption has been used
標準ラベル（英）: Expense relating to leases of low-value assets for which recognition exemption has been used
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の免除を適用した少額資産のリースに係る費用
定義: The amount of the expense relating to leases of low-value assets accounted for applying paragraph 6 of IFRS 16. This expense shall not include the expense relating to short-term leases of low-value assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expense relating to variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Expense relating to variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: リース負債の測定に含めていない変動リース料に係る費用
定義: The amount of the expense relating to variable lease payments not included in the measurement of lease liabilities. Variable lease payments are the portion of payments made by a lessee to a lessor for the right to use an underlying asset during the lease term that varies because of changes in facts or circumstances occurring after the commencement date, other than the passage of time. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income from subleasing right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（英）: Income from subleasing right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（日）: 使用権資産のサブリースによる収益
定義: The amount of income from subleasing right-of-use assets. Sublease is a transaction for which an underlying asset is re-leased by a lessee (‘intermediate lessor’) to a third party, and the lease (‘head lease’) between the head lessor and lessee remains in effect. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash outflow for leases
標準ラベル（英）: Cash outflow for leases
標準ラベル（日）: リースに係るキャッシュ・アウトフロー
定義: The cash outflow for leases.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Additions to right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（英）: Additions to right-of-use assets
標準ラベル（日）: 使用権資産の増加
定義: The amount of additions to right-of-use assets. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) arising from sale and leaseback transactions
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) arising from sale and leaseback transactions
標準ラベル（日）: セール・アンド・リースバック取引から生じた利得（損失）
定義: The gains (losses) arising from sale and leaseback transactions.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Lease commitments for short-term leases for which recognition exemption has been used
標準ラベル（英）: Lease commitments for short-term leases for which recognition exemption has been used
標準ラベル（日）: 認識の免除を適用した短期リースに係るリース約定
定義: The amount of the lease commitments for short-term leases accounted for applying paragraph 6 of IFRS 16. Short-term lease is a lease that, at the commencement date, has a lease term of 12 months or less. A lease that contains a purchase option is not a short-term lease.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of additional information about leasing activities for lessee [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of additional information about leasing activities for lessee [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 借手のリース活動に関する追加的な情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of additional information about leasing activities of a lessee.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about nature of lessee's leasing activities
標準ラベル（英）: Information about nature of lessee's leasing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 借手のリース活動の性質に関する情報
定義: Information about the nature of the lessee's leasing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about potential exposure to future cash outflows not reflected in measurement of lease liability
標準ラベル（英）: Information about potential exposure to future cash outflows not reflected in measurement of lease liability
標準ラベル（日）: リース負債の測定に反映していない将来キャッシュ・アウトフローに対する潜在的エクスポージャーに関する情報
定義: Information about the lessee's potential exposure to future cash outflows that are not reflected in the measurement of the lease liability. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about lessee's exposure arising from variable lease payments
標準ラベル（英）: Information about lessee's exposure arising from variable lease payments
標準ラベル（日）: 変動リース料から生じる借手のエクスポージャーに関する情報
定義: Information about the lessee's exposure arising from variable lease payments. Variable lease payments are the portion of payments made by a lessee to a lessor for the right to use an underlying asset during the lease term that varies because of changes in facts or circumstances occurring after the commencement date, other than the passage of time.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about lessee's exposure arising from extension options and termination options
標準ラベル（英）: Information about lessee's exposure arising from extension options and termination options
標準ラベル（日）: 延長オプション及び解約オプションから生じる借手のエクスポージャーに関する情報
定義: Information about the lessee's exposure arising from extension options and termination options.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about lessee's exposure arising from residual value guarantees
標準ラベル（英）: Information about lessee's exposure arising from residual value guarantees
標準ラベル（日）: 残価保証から生じる借手のエクスポージャーに関する情報
定義: Information about the lessee's exposure arising from residual value guarantees. Residual value guarantee is a guarantee made to a lessor by a party unrelated to the lessor that the value (or part of the value) of an underlying asset at the end of a lease will be at least a specified amount.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about exposure arising from leases not yet commenced to which lessee is committed
標準ラベル（英）: Information about exposure arising from leases not yet commenced to which lessee is committed
標準ラベル（日）: 借手が契約しているがまだ開始していないリースから生じるエクスポージャーに関する情報
定義: Information about the lessee's exposure arising from leases not yet commenced to which the lessee is committed.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about restrictions or covenants imposed by leases on lessee
標準ラベル（英）: Information about restrictions or covenants imposed by leases on lessee
標準ラベル（日）: リースにより借手に課されている制限又は特約に関する情報
定義: Information about the restrictions or covenants imposed by leases on the lessee.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about sale and leaseback transactions
標準ラベル（英）: Information about sale and leaseback transactions
標準ラベル（日）: セール・アンド・リースバック取引に関する情報
定義: Information about the sale and leaseback transactions.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement that lessee accounts for short-term leases using recognition exemption
標準ラベル（英）: Statement that lessee accounts for short-term leases using recognition exemption
標準ラベル（日）: 借手が短期リースを認識の免除を適用して会計処理している旨の記載
定義: The statement that the lessee accounts for short-term leases using the recognition exemption in paragraph 6 of IFRS 16. Short-term lease is a lease that, at the commencement date, has a lease term of 12 months or less. A lease that contains a purchase option is not a short-term lease.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Statement that lessee accounts for leases of low-value assets using recognition exemption
標準ラベル（英）: Statement that lessee accounts for leases of low-value assets using recognition exemption
標準ラベル（日）: 借手が少額資産のリースを認識の免除を適用して会計処理している旨の記載
定義: The statement that the lessee accounts for leases of low-value assets using the recognition exemption in paragraph 6 of IFRS 16.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of quantitative information about leases for lessor [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of quantitative information about leases for lessor [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 貸手のリースに関する定量的情報の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Selling profit (loss) on finance leases
標準ラベル（英）: Selling profit (loss) on finance leases
標準ラベル（日）: ファイナンス・リースに係る販売利益（損失）
定義: The selling profit (loss) on finance leases. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Finance income on net investment in finance lease
標準ラベル（英）: Finance income on net investment in finance lease
標準ラベル（日）: 正味ファイナンス・リース投資未回収価額に係る金融収益
定義: The amount of finance income on the net investment in the finance lease. [Refer: Finance income; Net investment in finance lease]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income relating to variable lease payments not included in measurement of net investment in finance lease
標準ラベル（英）: Income relating to variable lease payments not included in measurement of net investment in finance lease
標準ラベル（日）: 正味ファイナンス・リース投資未回収額の測定に含めていない変動リース料に係る収益
定義: The amount of income relating to variable lease payments not included in the measurement of the net investment in the finance lease. Variable lease payments are the portion of payments made by a lessee to a lessor for the right to use an underlying asset during the lease term that varies because of changes in facts or circumstances occurring after the commencement date, other than the passage of time. [Refer: Net investment in finance lease]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Operating lease income
標準ラベル（英）: Operating lease income
標準ラベル（日）: オペレーティング・リース収益
定義: The amount of operating lease income. Operating lease is a lease that does not transfer substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income relating to variable lease payments for operating leases that do not depend on index or rate
標準ラベル（英）: Income relating to variable lease payments for operating leases that do not depend on index or rate
標準ラベル（日）: オペレーティング・リースに係る変動リース料のうち指数又はレートに応じて決まるもの以外に係る収益
定義: The amount of income relating to variable lease payments for operating leases that do not depend on an index or a rate. Variable lease payments are the portion of payments made by a lessee to a lessor for the right to use an underlying asset during the lease term that varies because of changes in facts or circumstances occurring after the commencement date, other than the passage of time.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of additional information about leasing activities for lessor [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of additional information about leasing activities for lessor [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 貸手のリース活動に関する追加的な情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of additional information about leasing activities of a lessor.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about nature of lessor's leasing activities
標準ラベル（英）: Information about nature of lessor's leasing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 貸手のリース活動の性質に関する情報
定義: Information about the nature of the lessor's leasing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about how lessor manages risk associated with rights it retains in underlying assets
標準ラベル（英）: Information about how lessor manages risk associated with rights it retains in underlying assets
標準ラベル（日）: 貸手が原資産に対して保持している権利に関連したリスクをどのように管理しているのかに関する情報
定義: Information about how the lessor manages the risk associated with the rights it retains in underlying assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about risk management strategy for rights that lessor retains in underlying assets
標準ラベル（英）: Information about risk management strategy for rights that lessor retains in underlying assets
標準ラベル（日）: 貸手が原資産に対して保持している権利についてのリスク管理戦略に関する情報
定義: Information about the risk management strategy for the rights that the lessor retains in underlying assets, including any means by which the lessor reduces that risk.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of significant changes in net investment in finance lease [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of significant changes in net investment in finance lease [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 正味ファイナンス・リース投資未回収額の著しい変動の説明 [テキストブロック]
定義: The explanation of the significant changes in the carrying amount of the net investment in finance leases. [Refer: Net investment in finance lease]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in net investment in finance lease
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in net investment in finance lease
標準ラベル（日）: 正味ファイナンス・リース投資未回収額の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in the net investment in finance lease. [Refer: Net investment in finance lease]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of finance lease payments receivable [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of finance lease payments receivable [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: ファイナンス・リース料債権の満期分析の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of a maturity analysis of finance lease payments receivable. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of finance lease payments receivable [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of finance lease payments receivable [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: ファイナンス・リース料債権の満期分析の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of finance lease payments receivable [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of finance lease payments receivable [table]
標準ラベル（日）: ファイナンス・リース料債権の満期分析の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the maturity analysis of finance lease payments receivable.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Maturity [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Maturity [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 満期 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Aggregated time bands [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Aggregated time bands [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 全期間合計 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for aggregated time bands. It also represents the standard value for the 'Maturity' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Not later than one year [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Not later than one year [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 1年以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of not later than one year.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Later than one year and not later than two years [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Later than one year and not later than two years [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 1年超2年以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of later than one year and not later than two years.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Later than two years and not later than three years [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Later than two years and not later than three years [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 2年超3年以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of later than two years and not later than three years.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Later than three years and not later than four years [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Later than three years and not later than four years [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 3年超4年以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of later than three years and not later than four years.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Later than four years and not later than five years [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Later than four years and not later than five years [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 4年超5年以内 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of later than four years and not later than five years.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Later than five years [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Later than five years [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 5年超 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a time band of later than five years.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of finance lease payments receivable [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of maturity analysis of finance lease payments receivable [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: ファイナンス・リース料債権の満期分析の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Undiscounted finance lease payments to be received
標準ラベル（英）: Undiscounted finance lease payments to be received
標準ラベル（日）: 割引前の受取ファイナンス・リース料
定義: The amount of undiscounted finance lease payments to be received. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reconciliation of undiscounted lease payments to net investment in finance lease [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Reconciliation of undiscounted lease payments to net investment in finance lease [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 割引前のリース料と正味ファイナンス・リース投資未回収額の調整表 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Undiscounted finance lease payments to be received
標準ラベル（英）: Undiscounted finance lease payments to be received
標準ラベル（日）: 割引前の受取ファイナンス・リース料
定義: The amount of undiscounted finance lease payments to be received. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unearned finance income relating to finance lease payments receivable
標準ラベル（英）: Unearned finance income relating to finance lease payments receivable
標準ラベル（日）: ファイナンス・リース債権に係る未稼得金融収益
定義: The amount of unearned finance income relating to the finance lease payments receivable. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset. [Refer: Finance income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Discounted unguaranteed residual value of assets subject to finance lease
標準ラベル（英）: Discounted unguaranteed residual value of assets subject to finance lease
標準ラベル（日）: ファイナンス・リースの対象資産の無保証残存価値（割引後）
定義: The amount of the discounted unguaranteed residual value of assets subject to finance leases. Unguaranteed residual value is the portion of the residual value of the underlying asset, the realisation of which by a lessor is not assured or is guaranteed solely by a party related to the lessor. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net investment in finance lease
標準ラベル（英）: Net investment in finance lease
標準ラベル（日）: 正味ファイナンス・リース投資未回収額
定義: The gross investment in the finance lease discounted at the interest rate implicit in the lease. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset. Gross investment in the finance lease is the sum of: (a) the lease payments receivable by a lessor under a finance lease; and (b) any unguaranteed residual value accruing to the lessor. Interest rate implicit in the lease is the rate of interest that causes the present value of (a) the lease payments and (b) the unguaranteed residual value to equal to the sum of (i) the fair value of the underlying asset and (ii) the initial direct costs of the lessor.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Weighted average lessee's incremental borrowing rate applied to lease liabilities recognised at date of initial application of IFRS 16
標準ラベル（英）: Weighted average lessee's incremental borrowing rate applied to lease liabilities recognised at date of initial application of IFRS 16
標準ラベル（日）: IFRS第16号の適用開始日現在で認識したリース負債に適用される借手の追加借入利子率の加重平均
定義: The weighted average lessee's incremental borrowing rate applied to lease liabilities recognised in the statement of financial position at the date of initial application of IFRS 16. The incremental borrowing rate is the rate of interest that a lessee would have to pay to borrow over a similar term, and with a similar security, the funds necessary to obtain an asset of a similar value to the right-of-use asset in a similar economic environment.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of difference between operating lease commitments disclosed applying IAS 17 and lease liabilities recognised at date of initial application of IFRS 16 [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of difference between operating lease commitments disclosed applying IAS 17 and lease liabilities recognised at date of initial application of IFRS 16 [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: IAS第17号を適用して開示したオペレーティング・リース約定とIFRS第16号の適用開始日に認識したリース負債との差額の説明 [テキストブロック]
定義: The explanation of the difference between: (a) operating lease commitments disclosed applying IAS 17 at the end of the annual reporting period immediately preceding the date of initial application of IFRS 16, discounted using the incremental borrowing rate at the date of initial application; and (b) lease liabilities recognised in the statement of financial position at the date of initial application of IFRS 16. The incremental borrowing rate is the rate of interest that a lessee would have to pay to borrow over a similar term, and with a similar security, the funds necessary to obtain an asset of a similar value to the right-of-use asset in a similar economic environment.

定義: The statement that the lessee uses one or more of the specified practical expedients in paragraph C10 of IFRS 16 when applying IFRS 16 retrospectively in accordance with paragraph C5(b) to leases classified as operating leases applying IAS 17.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Service concession arrangements [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Service concession arrangements [member]
標準ラベル（日）: サービス委譲契約 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for arrangements in which an entity (the operator) may enter into an arrangement with another entity (the grantor) to provide services that give the public access to major economic and social facilities. The grantor may be a public or private sector entity, including a governmental body. Examples of service concession arrangements involve water treatment and supply facilities, motorways, car parks, tunnels, bridges, airports and telecommunication networks. Examples of arrangements that are not service concession arrangements include an entity outsourcing the operation of its internal services (for example, employee cafeteria, building maintenance, and accounting or information technology functions). It also represents the standard value for the 'Service concession arrangements' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Government [member]]

標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬契約の種類 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share-based payment arrangements [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Share-based payment arrangements [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬契約 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for an agreement between the entity or another group entity or any shareholder of the group entity and another party (including an employee) that entitles the other party to receive (a) cash or other assets of the entity for amounts that are based on the price (or value) of equity instruments (including shares or share options) of the entity or another group entity; or (b) equity instruments (including shares or share options) of the entity or another group entity, provided that the specified vesting conditions, if any, are met. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of share-based payment arrangements' axis if no other member is used.

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of terms and conditions of share-based payment arrangement [line items]

定義: The description of the vesting requirements for a type of share-based payment arrangement that existed at any time during the period. An entity with substantially similar types of share-based payment arrangements may aggregate this information. [Refer: Share-based payment arrangements [member]]
