表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of determination of fair value of goods or services received or fair value of equity instruments granted on share-based payments
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of determination of fair value of goods or services received or fair value of equity instruments granted on share-based payments
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬において受け取った財若しくはサービスの公正価値又は付与した資本性金融商品の公正価値の算定の説明
定義: The explanation that enables users of financial statements to understand how the fair value of the goods or services received, or the fair value of the equity instruments granted, in share-based payment arrangements was determined. [Refer: Share-based payment arrangements [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of indirect measurement of fair value of goods or services received, share options granted during period [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of indirect measurement of fair value of goods or services received, share options granted during period [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 受け取った財又はサービスの公正価値の間接的な測定の開示：期中に付与したストック・オプション [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about indirect, by reference to the fair value of the equity instruments granted, measurement of the fair value of goods or services received as consideration for the entity's share options.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Weighted average fair value at measurement date, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Weighted average fair value at measurement date, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: 測定日時点の加重平均公正価値：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The weighted average fair value of share options granted during the period at the measurement date. [Refer: Weighted average [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about how fair value was measured, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Information about how fair value was measured, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値の測定方法に関する情報：付与したストック・オプション
定義: Information on how the fair value of share options granted was measured.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of option pricing model, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Description of option pricing model, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: オプション価格算定モデルの記述：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The description of the option pricing model used for share options granted. [Refer: Option pricing model [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of inputs to option pricing model, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Description of inputs to option pricing model, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: オプション価格算定モデルに対する入力値の記述：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The description of inputs to the option pricing model for share options granted. [Refer: Option pricing model [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Weighted average share price, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Weighted average share price, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: 加重平均株価：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The weighted average share price used as input to the option pricing model to calculate the fair value of share options granted. [Refer: Option pricing model [member]; Weighted average [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Exercise price, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Exercise price, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: 行使価格：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The exercise price of share options granted.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expected volatility, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Expected volatility, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: 予想ボラティリティ：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The expected volatility of the share price used to calculate the fair value of the share options granted. Expected volatility is a measure of the amount by which a price is expected to fluctuate during a period. The measure of volatility used in option pricing models is the annualised standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a period of time.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Option life, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Option life, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: オプションの残存期間：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The option life of share options granted.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expected dividend, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Expected dividend, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: 予想配当：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The amount of an expected dividend used to calculate the fair value of share options granted.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expected dividend as percentage, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Expected dividend as percentage, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: 予想配当率：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The percentage of an expected dividend used to calculate the fair value of share options granted.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Risk free interest rate, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Risk free interest rate, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: リスクフリー金利：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The implied yield currently available on zero-coupon government issues of the country in whose currency the exercise price for share options granted is expressed, with a remaining term equal to the expected term of the option being valued (based on the option's remaining contractual life and taking into account the effects of expected early exercise). [Refer: Government [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of other inputs to options pricing model, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Description of other inputs to options pricing model, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: オプション価格算定モデルに対するその他の入力値の記述：付与したストック・オプション
定義: The description of inputs to option pricing model for share options granted that the entity does not disclose separately. [Refer: Option pricing model [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of method used and assumptions made to incorporate effects of expected early exercise, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Description of method used and assumptions made to incorporate effects of expected early exercise, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: 使用した方法及び予想される早期権利行使の影響を織り込むために行った仮定の記述
定義: The description of the method used and the assumptions made to incorporate the effects of exercising granted share options early.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about how expected volatility was determined, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Information about how expected volatility was determined, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: 予想ボラティリティの算定方法に関する情報：付与したストック・オプション
定義: Information about how the expected volatility used for pricing share options granted was determined, including an explanation of the extent to which expected volatility was based on historical volatility.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information whether and how other features were incorporated into measurement of fair value, share options granted
標準ラベル（英）: Information whether and how other features were incorporated into measurement of fair value, share options granted
標準ラベル（日）: その他の特徴を公正価値の測定に織り込んでいるかどうか及びその場合の方法に関する情報：付与したストック・オプション
定義: Information about whether and how other features of option grant (such as a market condition) were incorporated into the measurement of the fair value of options granted.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of indirect measurement of fair value of goods or services received, other equity instruments granted during period [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of indirect measurement of fair value of goods or services received, other equity instruments granted during period [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 受け取った財又はサービスの公正価値の間接的な測定の開示：期中に付与した他の資本性金融商品 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about indirect, by reference to the fair value of the equity instruments granted, measurement of the fair value of goods or services received as consideration for the entity's other equity instruments (ie other than share options).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of other equity instruments granted in share-based payment arrangement
標準ラベル（英）: Number of other equity instruments granted in share-based payment arrangement
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬契約で付与したその他の資本性金融商品の数
定義: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) granted in a share-based payment arrangement.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Weighted average fair value at measurement date, other equity instruments granted
標準ラベル（英）: Weighted average fair value at measurement date, other equity instruments granted
標準ラベル（日）: 測定日時点の加重平均公正価値：付与した他の資本性金融商品
定義: The weighted average fair value at the measurement date of granted equity instruments other than share options. [Refer: Weighted average [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information how fair value was measured, other equity instruments granted
標準ラベル（英）: Information how fair value was measured, other equity instruments granted
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値の測定方法に関する情報：付与したその他の資本性金融商品
定義: Information about how the weighted average fair value at the measurement date of other equity instruments granted (ie other than share options) was measured.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about how fair was determined if not on basis of observable market, other equity instruments granted
標準ラベル（英）: Information about how fair was determined if not on basis of observable market, other equity instruments granted
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値の算定方法に関する情報（観察可能な市場を基礎にしていない場合）：付与した他の資本性金融商品
定義: Information about how the fair value was determined for other equity instruments granted (ie other than share options) if it was not measured on the basis of an observable market price.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information whether and how expected dividends were incorporated into measurement of fair value, other equity instruments granted
標準ラベル（英）: Information whether and how expected dividends were incorporated into measurement of fair value, other equity instruments granted
標準ラベル（日）: 予想配当を公正価値の測定に織り込んでいるかどうか及びその場合の方法に関する情報：付与したその他の資本性金融商品
定義: Information about whether and how expected dividends were incorporated into measurement of fair value for other equity instruments granted (ie other than share options).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information whether and how other features were incorporated into measurement of fair value, other equity instruments granted
標準ラベル（英）: Information whether and how other features were incorporated into measurement of fair value, other equity instruments granted
標準ラベル（日）: その他の特徴を公正価値の測定に織り込んでいるかどうか及びその場合の方法に関する情報：付与したその他の資本性金融商品
定義: Information about whether and how other features of other equity instruments granted (ie other than share options) were incorporated into the measurement of fair value of these equity instruments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of indirect measurement of fair value of goods or services received, share-based payment arrangements modified during period [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of indirect measurement of fair value of goods or services received, share-based payment arrangements modified during period [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 受け取った財又はサービスの公正価値の間接的な測定の開示：期中に条件が変更された株式に基づく報酬契約 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about indirect, by reference to the fair value of the equity instruments granted, measurement of the fair value of goods or services received as consideration for the entity's equity instruments in share-based payment arrangements that were modified.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of modifications, modified share-based payment arrangements
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of modifications, modified share-based payment arrangements
標準ラベル（日）: 条件変更の説明：条件が変更された株式に基づく報酬契約
定義: The explanation of the modifications for share-based payment arrangements. [Refer: Share-based payment arrangements [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Incremental fair value granted, modified share-based payment arrangements
標準ラベル（英）: Incremental fair value granted, modified share-based payment arrangements
標準ラベル（日）: 付与した増分公正価値：条件が変更された株式に基づく報酬契約
定義: The difference, for modified share-based payment arrangements, between the fair value of the modified equity instrument and that of the original equity instrument, both estimated as at the date of the modification. [Refer: Share-based payment arrangements [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information on how incremental fair value granted was measured, modified share-based payment arrangements
標準ラベル（英）: Information on how incremental fair value granted was measured, modified share-based payment arrangements
標準ラベル（日）: 付与した増分公正価値の測定方法に関する情報：条件が変更された株式に基づく報酬契約
定義: Information about how the incremental fair value granted was measured for modified share-based payment arrangements. [Refer: Incremental fair value granted, modified share-based payment arrangements; Share-based payment arrangements [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of direct measurement of fair value of goods or services received
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of direct measurement of fair value of goods or services received
標準ラベル（日）: 受け取った財又はサービスの公正価値の直接的な測定の説明
定義: The explanation of how the fair value of goods or services received was determined if it was measured directly (for example, whether fair value was measured at a market price for those goods or services).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason why fair value of goods or services received cannot be reliably estimated
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason why fair value of goods or services received cannot be reliably estimated
標準ラベル（日）: 受け取った財又はサービスの公正価値を信頼性をもって見積れない理由の記述
定義: The description of the reason why the presumption that the fair value of goods or services received in equity-settled share-based payment transactions with parties other than employees can be estimated reliably was rebutted.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of effect of share-based payments on entity's profit or loss [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of effect of share-based payments on entity's profit or loss [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬が企業の純損益に与える影響の説明 [テキストブロック]
定義: The explanation that enables users of financial statements to understand the effect of share-based payment transactions on the entity's profit (loss).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expense from share-based payment transactions in which goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Expense from share-based payment transactions in which goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 受け取った財又はサービスが資産としての認識の要件を満たさない株式に基づく報酬取引による費用 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expense from equity-settled share-based payment transactions in which goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets
標準ラベル（英）: Expense from equity-settled share-based payment transactions in which goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets
標準ラベル（日）: 受け取った財又はサービスが資産としての認識の要件を満たさない持分決済型の株式に基づく報酬取引による費用
定義: The amount of expense arising from equity-settled share-based payment transactions in which the goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets. [Refer: Expense from share-based payment transactions in which goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expense from cash-settled share-based payment transactions in which goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets
標準ラベル（英）: Expense from cash-settled share-based payment transactions in which goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets
標準ラベル（日）: 受け取った財又はサービスが資産としての認識の要件を満たさない現金決済型の株式に基づく報酬取引による費用
定義: The amount of expense arising from cash-settled share-based payment transactions in which the goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets. [Refer: Expense from share-based payment transactions in which goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total expense from share-based payment transactions in which goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets
標準ラベル（英）: Expense from share-based payment transactions in which goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets
標準ラベル（日）: 受け取った財又はサービスが資産としての認識の要件を満たさない株式に基づく報酬取引による費用
定義: The amount of expense arising from share-based payment transactions in which the goods or services received did not qualify for recognition as assets.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expense from share-based payment transactions with employees
標準ラベル（英）: Expense from share-based payment transactions with employees
標準ラベル（日）: 従業員との株式に基づく報酬取引による費用
定義: The amount of expense from share-based payment transactions with employees.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of effect of share-based payments on entity's financial position [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of effect of share-based payments on entity's financial position [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬が企業の財政状態に与える影響の説明 [テキストブロック]
定義: The explanation that enables users of financial statements to understand the effect of share-based payment transactions on the entity's financial position.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities from share-based payment transactions
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities from share-based payment transactions
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬取引から生じた負債
定義: The amount of liabilities arising from share-based payment transactions. Share-based payment transactions are transactions in which the entity: (a) receives goods or services from the supplier of those goods or services (including an employee) in a share-based payment arrangement; or (b) incurs an obligation to settle the transaction with the supplier in a share-based payment arrangement when another group entity receives those goods or services. [Refer: Share-based payment arrangements [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Intrinsic value of liabilities from share-based payment transactions for which counterparty's right to cash or other assets vested
標準ラベル（英）: Intrinsic value of liabilities from share-based payment transactions for which counterparty's right to cash or other assets vested
標準ラベル（日）: 現金又は他の資産に対する相手方の権利が確定している株式に基づく報酬取引から生じた負債の本源的価値
定義: The intrinsic value of liabilities arising from share-based transactions for which the counterparty's right to cash or other assets had vested by the end of the period (for example, vested share appreciation rights). The intrinsic value is the difference between the fair value of the shares to which the counterparty has the (conditional or unconditional) right to subscribe, or which it has the right to receive, and the price (if any) that the counterparty is (or will be) required to pay for those shares. Share-based payment transactions are transactions in which the entity: (a) receives goods or services from the supplier of those goods or services (including an employee) in a share-based payment arrangement; or (b) incurs an obligation to settle the transaction with the supplier in a share-based payment arrangement when another group entity receives those goods or services, for which the counterparty's right to cash or other assets had vested by the end of the period (for example, vested share appreciation rights).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Additional information about share-based payment arrangements [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Additional information about share-based payment arrangements [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬契約に関する追加的情報 [テキストブロック]
定義: Additional information about share-based payment arrangements necessary to satisfy the disclosure requirements of IFRS 2. [Refer: Share-based payment arrangements [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of employee benefits [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of employee benefits [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 従業員給付の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for employee benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of defined benefit plans [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of defined benefit plans [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of defined benefit plans [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of defined benefit plans [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of defined benefit plans [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of defined benefit plans [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to defined benefit plans.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for post-employment benefit plans other than defined contribution plans. Defined contribution plans are post-employment benefit plans under which an entity pays fixed contributions into a separate entity (a fund) and will have no legal or constructive obligation to pay further contributions if the fund does not hold sufficient assets to pay all employee benefits relating to employee service in the current and prior periods. It also represents the standard value for the 'Defined benefit plans' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Foreign defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Foreign defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 外国の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for foreign defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Domestic defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Domestic defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 国内の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for domestic defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 複数事業主の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans (other than state plans) that: (a) pool the assets contributed by various entities that are not under common control; and (b) use those assets to provide benefits to employees of more than one entity, on the basis that contribution and benefit levels are determined without regard to the identity of the entity that employs the employees. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: State defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: State defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公的確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans that are established by legislation to cover all entities (or all entities in a particular category) and are operated by national or local government or by another body that is not subject to control or influence by the reporting entity. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 共通支配下にある企業間でリスクを分担する確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control such as a parent and its subsidiaries. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Parent [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of defined benefit plans [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of defined benefit plans [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of type of plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of type of plan
標準ラベル（日）: 制度の種類の記述
定義: The general description of the type of a defined benefit plan. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of benefits provided by plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of benefits provided by plan
標準ラベル（日）: 制度が支給する給付の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the benefits provided by a defined benefit plan (for example, final salary defined benefit plan or contribution-based plan with guarantee). [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of regulatory framework in which plan operates
標準ラベル（英）: Description of regulatory framework in which plan operates
標準ラベル（日）: 制度が運営されている規制の枠組みの記述
定義: The description of the regulatory framework in which a defined benefit plan operates, for example, the level of any minimum funding requirements. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of effect of regulatory framework on plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of effect of regulatory framework on plan
標準ラベル（日）: 規制の枠組みが制度に与えている影響の記述
定義: The description of the effect of the regulatory framework on a defined benefit plan, such as the asset ceiling. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of any other entity's responsibilities for governance of plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of any other entity's responsibilities for governance of plan
標準ラベル（日）: 制度のガバナンスに対する他の企業の責任の記述
定義: The description of the entity's responsibilities for the governance of a defined benefit plan that the entity does not separately describe, for example, responsibilities of trustees or of board members of the plan. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of risks to which plan exposes entity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of risks to which plan exposes entity
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が制度によって晒されているリスクの記述
定義: The description of the risks to which the defined benefit plan exposes the entity, focused on any unusual, entity-specific or plan-specific risks. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of significant concentrations of risk related to plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of significant concentrations of risk related to plan
標準ラベル（日）: 制度に関するリスクの著しい集中の記述
定義: The description of the significant concentrations of risk in defined benefit plans. For example, if plan assets are invested primarily in one class of investments, such as property, the plan may expose the entity to a concentration of property market risk. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Market risk [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of plan amendments, curtailments and settlements
標準ラベル（英）: Description of plan amendments, curtailments and settlements
標準ラベル（日）: 制度改訂、縮小及び清算の記述
定義: The description of defined benefit plan amendments, curtailments and settlements. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Surplus (deficit) in plan [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Surplus (deficit) in plan [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 制度の積立超過（積立不足） [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit obligation, at present value
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit obligation, at present value
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度債務（現在価値）
定義: The present value, without deducting any plan assets, of expected future payments required to settle the obligation resulting from employee service in the current and prior periods. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Plan assets, at fair value
標準ラベル（英）: Plan assets, at fair value
標準ラベル（日）: 制度資産（公正価値）
定義: The fair value of defined benefit plan assets. Plan assets comprise assets held by a long-term employee benefit fund and qualifying insurance policies. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net surplus (deficit) in plan
標準ラベル（英）: Surplus (deficit) in plan
標準ラベル（日）: 制度の積立超過（積立不足）
定義: The present value of the defined benefit obligation, less the fair value of the plan assets (if any). [Refer: Plan assets [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of link between reimbursement right and related obligation
標準ラベル（英）: Description of link between reimbursement right and related obligation
標準ラベル（日）: 補填の権利とそれに関連する債務との間の関連性の記述
定義: The description of the link between a reimbursement right and the related obligation. [Refer: Reimbursement rights, at fair value]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of how entity determined maximum economic benefit available
標準ラベル（英）: Description of how entity determined maximum economic benefit available
標準ラベル（日）: 利用可能な最大の経済的便益を企業がどのように算定したのかの記述
定義: The description of how the entity determined the maximum economic benefit available in relation to a defined benefit plan, ie whether those benefits would be in the form of refunds, reductions in future contributions or a combination of both. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Entity's own financial instruments included in fair value of plan assets
標準ラベル（英）: Entity's own financial instruments included in fair value of plan assets
標準ラベル（日）: 制度資産の公正価値に含まれている企業自身の金融商品
定義: The fair value of the entity's own transferable financial instruments that are included in the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Financial instruments, class [member]; Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Property occupied by entity included in fair value of plan assets
標準ラベル（英）: Property occupied by entity included in fair value of plan assets
標準ラベル（日）: 制度資産の公正価値に含まれている企業が占有している不動産
定義: The fair value of property occupied by the entity that are included in the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other assets used by entity included in fair value of plan assets
標準ラベル（英）: Other assets used by entity included in fair value of plan assets
標準ラベル（日）: 制度資産の公正価値に含まれている企業が使用しているその他の資産
定義: The fair value of other assets used by the entity that are included in the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial assumption of discount rates
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial assumption of discount rates
標準ラベル（日）: 割引率に関する数理計算上の仮定
定義: The discount rate used as the significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial assumption of expected rates of salary increases
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial assumption of expected rates of salary increases
標準ラベル（日）: 予想昇給率に関する数理計算上の仮定
定義: The expected rate of salary increases used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial assumption of medical cost trend rates
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial assumption of medical cost trend rates
標準ラベル（日）: 医療費の趨勢率に関する数理計算上の仮定
定義: Medical cost trend rate used as significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial assumption of expected rates of pension increases
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial assumption of expected rates of pension increases
標準ラベル（日）: 年金の予想増加率に関する数理計算上の仮定
定義: The expected rate of increases in pension that is used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial assumption of expected rates of inflation
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial assumption of expected rates of inflation
標準ラベル（日）: 予想インフレ率に関する数理計算上の仮定
定義: The expected rate of inflation that is used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial assumption of mortality rates
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial assumption of mortality rates
標準ラベル（日）: 死亡率に関する数理計算上の仮定
定義: The mortality rate used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial assumption of retirement age
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial assumption of retirement age
標準ラベル（日）: 退職年齢に関する数理計算上の仮定
定義: The retirement age used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial assumption of life expectancy after retirement
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial assumption of life expectancy after retirement
標準ラベル（日）: 退職後の余命の予想に関する数理計算上の仮定
定義: The life expectancy after retirement used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Defined benefit obligation, at present value; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other material actuarial assumptions
標準ラベル（英）: Other material actuarial assumptions
標準ラベル（日）: その他の重要性がある数理計算上の仮定
定義: Any other material assumption used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Actuarial assumptions [member]; Defined benefit obligation, at present value]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of asset-liability matching strategies used by plan or entity to manage risk
標準ラベル（英）: Description of asset-liability matching strategies used by plan or entity to manage risk
標準ラベル（日）: 制度又は企業がリスク管理のために用いている資産負債マッチング戦略の記述
定義: The description of asset-liability matching strategies used by the defined benefit plan or the entity, including the use of annuities and other techniques, such as longevity swaps, to manage risk. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of funding arrangements and funding policy that affect future contributions
標準ラベル（英）: Description of funding arrangements and funding policy that affect future contributions
標準ラベル（日）: 将来の拠出に影響を与える積立ての取決め及び積立方針の記述
定義: The description of funding arrangements and the funding policy that affect future contributions to defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Estimate of contributions expected to be paid to plan for next annual reporting period
標準ラベル（英）: Estimate of contributions expected to be paid to plan for next annual reporting period
標準ラベル（日）: 翌事業年度に制度に支払われると見込まれる拠出の見積り
定義: The estimate of the expected contributions to be made to a defined benefit plan for the next annual reporting period. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information about maturity profile of defined benefit obligation [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information about maturity profile of defined benefit obligation [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度債務の満期プロフィールに関する情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information about the maturity profile of a defined benefit obligation. This will include the weighted average duration of the defined benefit obligation and may include other information about the distribution of the timing of benefit payments, such as a maturity analysis of the benefit payments. [Refer: Defined benefit obligation, at present value]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Weighted average duration of defined benefit obligation
標準ラベル（英）: Weighted average duration of defined benefit obligation
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付債務の加重平均デュレーション
定義: The weighted average duration of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Weighted average [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of extent to which entity can be liable to multi-employer or state plan for other entities' obligations
標準ラベル（英）: Description of extent to which entity can be liable to multi-employer or state plan for other entities' obligations
標準ラベル（日）: 他の企業の債務について企業が複数事業主制度又は公的制度に対してどの程度負担する可能性があるのかの記述
定義: The description of the extent to which the entity can be liable for other entities' obligations under the terms and conditions of a multi-employer or state defined benefit plan. [Refer: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]; State defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of agreed allocation of deficit or surplus of multi-employer or state plan on wind-up of plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of agreed allocation of deficit or surplus of multi-employer or state plan on wind-up of plan
標準ラベル（日）: 制度の解散による複数事業主制度又は公的制度の積立不足又は積立超過の合意された配分の記述
定義: The description of any agreed allocation of a deficit or surplus on the wind-up of a multi-employer or state defined benefit plan. [Refer: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]; State defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of agreed allocation of deficit or surplus of multi-employer or state plan on entity's withdrawal from plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of agreed allocation of deficit or surplus of multi-employer or state plan on entity's withdrawal from plan
標準ラベル（日）: 企業の制度からの脱退による複数事業主制度又は公的制度の積立不足又は積立超過の合意された配分の記述
定義: The description of any agreed allocation of a deficit or surplus on the entity's withdrawal from a multi-employer or state defined benefit plan. [Refer: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]; State defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of fact that multi-employer or state plan is defined benefit plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of fact that multi-employer or state plan is defined benefit plan
標準ラベル（日）: 複数事業主制度又は公的制度が確定給付制度である旨の記述
定義: The description of the fact that a multi-employer or state plan is a defined benefit plan. [Refer: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]; State defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason why sufficient information is not available to account for multi-employer or state plan as defined benefit plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason why sufficient information is not available to account for multi-employer or state plan as defined benefit plan
標準ラベル（日）: 複数事業主制度又は公的制度を確定給付制度として会計処理するのに十分な情報を入手できない理由の記述
定義: The description of the reason why sufficient information is not available to enable the entity to account for a multi-employer or state plan as a defined benefit plan. [Refer: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]; State defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of information about surplus or deficit of multi-employer or state plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of information about surplus or deficit of multi-employer or state plan
標準ラベル（日）: 複数事業主制度又は公的制度の積立超過又は積立不足に関する情報の記述
定義: The description of available information about a surplus or deficit in a multi-employer or state plan that may affect the amount of future contributions. [Refer: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]; State defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of basis used to determine surplus or deficit of multi-employer or state plan
標準ラベル（英）: Description of basis used to determine surplus or deficit of multi-employer or state plan
標準ラベル（日）: 複数事業主制度又は公的制度の積立超過又は積立不足の算定に用いた基礎の記述
定義: The description of the basis used to determine a surplus or deficit in a multi-employer or state plan that may affect the amount of future contributions. [Refer: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]; State defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of implications of surplus or deficit on multi-employer or state plan for entity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of implications of surplus or deficit on multi-employer or state plan for entity
標準ラベル（日）: 複数事業主制度又は公的制度の積立超過又は積立不足の企業に対する影響の記述
定義: The description of the implications for the entity of a surplus or deficit in a multi-employer or state plan that may affect the amount of future contributions. [Refer: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]; State defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Level of participation of entity compared with other participating entities
標準ラベル（英）: Level of participation of entity compared with other participating entities
標準ラベル（日）: 他の加入企業との比較での企業の加入水準
定義: The description of an indication of the level of participation of the entity in a defined benefit plan compared with other participating entities. Examples of measures that might provide such an indication include the entity's proportion of the total contributions to the plan or the entity's proportion of the total number of active members, retired members, and former members entitled to benefits, if that information is available. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of contractual agreement or stated policy for charging net defined benefit cost
標準ラベル（英）: Description of contractual agreement or stated policy for charging net defined benefit cost
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度費用の純額の負担に関する契約上の合意又は明示された方針の記述
定義: The description of the contractual agreement or stated policy for charging the net defined benefit cost, or the fact that there is no such policy, for an entity participating in defined benefit plans that share risks between various entities under common control. [Refer: Defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of policy for determining contribution of defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Description of policy for determining contribution of defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 共通支配下にある企業間でリスクを分担する確定給付制度の拠出の決定に関する方針の記述 [テキストブロック]
定義: The description of the policy for determining the contribution to be paid by the entity for defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of cross-reference to disclosures about plans that share risks between entities under common control in another group entity's financial statements
標準ラベル（英）: Description of cross-reference to disclosures about plans that share risks between entities under common control in another group entity's financial statements
標準ラベル（日）: 共通支配下にある企業間でリスクを分担する制度に関する他のグループ企業の財務諸表における開示への参照の記述
定義: The description of cross-references to disclosures about defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control in another group entity's financial statements. [Refer: Defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of net defined benefit liability (asset) [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of net defined benefit liability (asset) [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付負債（資産）の純額の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of a net defined benefit liability (asset). [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付負債（資産）の純額の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of net defined benefit liability (asset) [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of net defined benefit liability (asset) [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付負債（資産）の純額の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the net defined benefit liability (asset).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for post-employment benefit plans other than defined contribution plans. Defined contribution plans are post-employment benefit plans under which an entity pays fixed contributions into a separate entity (a fund) and will have no legal or constructive obligation to pay further contributions if the fund does not hold sufficient assets to pay all employee benefits relating to employee service in the current and prior periods. It also represents the standard value for the 'Defined benefit plans' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Foreign defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Foreign defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 外国の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for foreign defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Domestic defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Domestic defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 国内の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for domestic defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 複数事業主の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans (other than state plans) that: (a) pool the assets contributed by various entities that are not under common control; and (b) use those assets to provide benefits to employees of more than one entity, on the basis that contribution and benefit levels are determined without regard to the identity of the entity that employs the employees. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: State defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: State defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公的確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans that are established by legislation to cover all entities (or all entities in a particular category) and are operated by national or local government or by another body that is not subject to control or influence by the reporting entity. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 共通支配下にある企業間でリスクを分担する確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control such as a parent and its subsidiaries. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Parent [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net defined benefit liability (asset) [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Net defined benefit liability (asset) [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付負債（資産）の純額 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net defined benefit liability (asset) [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Net defined benefit liability (asset) [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付負債（資産）の純額 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the net defined benefit liability (asset). It also represents the standard value for the 'Net defined benefit liability (asset)' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Present value of defined benefit obligation [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Present value of defined benefit obligation [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度債務の現在価値 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the present value of a defined benefit obligation. The present value of a defined benefit obligation is the present value, without deducting any plan assets, of expected future payments required to settle the obligation resulting from employee service in the current and prior periods.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Plan assets [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Plan assets [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 制度資産 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plan assets. Plan assets comprise: (a) assets held by a long-term employee benefit fund; and (b) qualifying insurance policies.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Effect of asset ceiling [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Effect of asset ceiling [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資産上限額の影響 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the effect of asset ceiling in a defined benefit plan. Asset ceiling is the present value of any economic benefits available in the form of refunds from the defined benefit plan or reductions in future contributions to the defined benefit plan. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of net defined benefit liability (asset) [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of net defined benefit liability (asset) [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付負債（資産）の純額の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net defined benefit liability (asset) at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The amount of deficit or surplus in a defined benefit plan, adjusted for any effect of limiting a net defined benefit asset to the asset ceiling. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Changes in net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Changes in net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付負債（資産）の純額の増減 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Current service cost, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Current service cost, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 当期勤務費用：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from employee service in the current period. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest expense (income), net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Interest expense (income), net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 利息費用（収益）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from the passage of time. [Refer: Interest expense; Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gain (loss) on remeasurement, net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) on remeasurement, net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 再測定による利得（損失）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Return on plan assets, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Return on plan assets, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 制度資産に係る収益：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from the return on plan assets. The return on plans assets is interest, dividends and other revenue derived from the plan assets, together with realised and unrealised gains or losses on the plan assets, less any costs of managing plan assets and less any tax payable by the plan itself, other than tax included in the actuarial assumptions used to measure the present value of the defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Plan assets [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset); Actuarial assumptions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial losses (gains) arising from changes in demographic assumptions, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial gains (losses) arising from changes in demographic assumptions, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 人口統計上の仮定の変更により生じた数理計算上の差益（損）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in a net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from actuarial gains (losses) arising from changes in demographic assumptions that result in remeasurements of the net defined benefit liability (asset). Demographic assumptions deal with matters such as: (a) mortality; (b) rates of employee turnover, disability and early retirement; (c) the proportion of plan members with dependants who will be eligible for benefits; (d) the proportion of plan members who will select each form of payment option available under the plan terms; and (e) claim rates under medical plans. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial losses (gains) arising from changes in financial assumptions, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial gains (losses) arising from changes in financial assumptions, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 財務上の仮定の変更により生じた数理計算上の差益（損）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in a net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from actuarial gains (losses) arising from changes in financial assumptions that result in remeasurements of the net defined benefit liability (asset). Financial assumptions deal with items such as: (a) the discount rate; (b) benefit levels, excluding any cost of the benefits to be met by employees, and future salary; (c) in the case of medical benefits, future medical costs, including claim handling costs (ie the costs that will be incurred in processing and resolving claims, including legal and adjuster's fees); and (d) taxes payable by the plan on contributions relating to service before the reporting date or on benefits resulting from that service. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Actuarial losses (gains) arising from experience adjustments, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Actuarial gains (losses) arising from experience adjustments, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 実績調整から生じた数理計算上の差益（損）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in a net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from actuarial gains (losses) arising from experience adjustments that result in remeasurements of the net defined benefit liability (asset). Experience adjustments deal with the effects of differences between the previous actuarial assumptions and what has actually occurred. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Loss (gain) on changes in effect of limiting net defined benefit asset to asset ceiling, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) on changes in effect of limiting net defined benefit asset to asset ceiling, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付資産の純額を資産上限額までに制限していることの影響額の変動による利得（損失）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from the gain (loss) on changes in the effect of limiting a net defined benefit asset to the asset ceiling, excluding amounts included in interest income or expense. [Refer: Interest income; Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total loss (gain) on remeasurement, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) on remeasurement, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 再測定による利得（損失）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in a net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from the remeasurement of that net defined benefit liability (asset). [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Past service cost and gains (losses) arising from settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Past service cost and gains (losses) arising from settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 過去勤務費用及び清算により生じた利得（損失）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Past service cost, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Past service cost, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 過去勤務費用：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from past service cost. Past service cost is the change in the present value of the defined benefit obligation for employee service in prior periods, resulting from a plan amendment (the introduction or withdrawal of, or changes to, a defined benefit plan) or a curtailment (a significant reduction by the entity in the number of employees covered by a plan). [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Losses (gains) arising from settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) arising from settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 清算により生じた利得（損失）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from settlements. Settlements are transactions that eliminate all further legal or constructive obligations for part or all of the benefits provided under a defined benefit plan, other than a payment of benefits to, or on behalf of, employees that is set out in the terms of the plan and included in the actuarial assumptions. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]; Actuarial assumptions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net past service cost and gains (losses) arising from settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Past service cost and gains (losses) arising from settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 過去勤務費用及び清算により生じた利得（損失）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from past service cost and gains (losses) arising from settlements. [Refer: Gains (losses) arising from settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset); Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through changes in foreign exchange rates, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through changes in foreign exchange rates, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 外国為替レートの変動による増加（減少）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from changes in foreign exchange rates. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Contributions to plan, net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Contributions to plan, net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 制度への拠出：確定給付負債（資産）の純額 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Contributions to plan by employer, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Contributions to plan by employer, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 事業主からの制度への拠出：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from contributions to a defined benefit plan by the employer. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Contributions to plan by plan participants, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Contributions to plan by plan participants, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 制度加入者からの制度への拠出：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from contributions to a defined benefit plan by plan participants. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total contributions to plan, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Contributions to plan, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 制度への拠出：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from contributions to a defined benefit plan. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Payments from plan, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Payments from plan, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 制度からの支払：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from payments from the plan. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Payments in respect of settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Payments in respect of settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 清算に関する支払：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The decrease (increase) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from payments from the plan in respect of settlements. [Refer: Gains (losses) arising from settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset); Net defined benefit liability (asset); Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through business combinations and disposals, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through business combinations and disposals, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合及び処分による増加（減少）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from business combinations and disposals. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through other changes, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through other changes, net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: その他の変動による増加（減少）：確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total increase (decrease) in net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付負債（資産）の純額の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in the net defined benefit liability (asset). [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net defined benefit liability (asset) at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Net defined benefit liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付負債（資産）の純額
定義: The amount of deficit or surplus in a defined benefit plan, adjusted for any effect of limiting a net defined benefit asset to the asset ceiling. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reimbursement rights [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 補填の権利の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of reimbursement rights. [Refer: Reimbursement rights, at fair value]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reimbursement rights [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 補填の権利の開示 [タイトル項目]

定義: Schedule disclosing information related to reimbursement rights.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for post-employment benefit plans other than defined contribution plans. Defined contribution plans are post-employment benefit plans under which an entity pays fixed contributions into a separate entity (a fund) and will have no legal or constructive obligation to pay further contributions if the fund does not hold sufficient assets to pay all employee benefits relating to employee service in the current and prior periods. It also represents the standard value for the 'Defined benefit plans' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Foreign defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Foreign defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 外国の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for foreign defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Domestic defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Domestic defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 国内の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for domestic defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 複数事業主の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans (other than state plans) that: (a) pool the assets contributed by various entities that are not under common control; and (b) use those assets to provide benefits to employees of more than one entity, on the basis that contribution and benefit levels are determined without regard to the identity of the entity that employs the employees. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: State defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: State defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公的確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans that are established by legislation to cover all entities (or all entities in a particular category) and are operated by national or local government or by another body that is not subject to control or influence by the reporting entity. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 共通支配下にある企業間でリスクを分担する確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control such as a parent and its subsidiaries. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Parent [member]]

定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

標準ラベル（日）: 補填の権利（公正価値）
定義: The amount of the entity's rights to the reimbursement by another party of some or all of the expenditure required to settle a defined benefit obligation recognised as a separate asset and measured at fair value. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

定義: The increase (decrease) in reimbursement rights resulting from the gain (loss) on changes in the effect of limiting a reimbursement right to the asset ceiling, excluding amounts included in interest income or expense. [Refer: Interest income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total gain (loss) on remeasurement, reimbursement rights
標準ラベル（英）: Gain (loss) on remeasurement, reimbursement rights

標準ラベル（英）: Decrease through benefits paid, reimbursement rights, at fair value

標準ラベル（日）: 補填の権利（公正価値）の増加（減少）

定義: The amount of the entity's rights to the reimbursement by another party of some or all of the expenditure required to settle a defined benefit obligation recognised as a separate asset and measured at fair value. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for post-employment benefit plans other than defined contribution plans. Defined contribution plans are post-employment benefit plans under which an entity pays fixed contributions into a separate entity (a fund) and will have no legal or constructive obligation to pay further contributions if the fund does not hold sufficient assets to pay all employee benefits relating to employee service in the current and prior periods. It also represents the standard value for the 'Defined benefit plans' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Foreign defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Foreign defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 外国の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for foreign defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Domestic defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Domestic defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 国内の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for domestic defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 複数事業主の確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans (other than state plans) that: (a) pool the assets contributed by various entities that are not under common control; and (b) use those assets to provide benefits to employees of more than one entity, on the basis that contribution and benefit levels are determined without regard to the identity of the entity that employs the employees. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: State defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: State defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 公的確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans that are established by legislation to cover all entities (or all entities in a particular category) and are operated by national or local government or by another body that is not subject to control or influence by the reporting entity. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 共通支配下にある企業間でリスクを分担する確定給付制度 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for defined benefit plans that share risks between entities under common control such as a parent and its subsidiaries. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Parent [member]]

定義: This member stands for all actuarial assumptions. 表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of analysis of present value of defined benefit obligation that distinguishes nature, characteristics and risks [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of analysis of present value of defined benefit obligation that distinguishes nature, characteristics and risks [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度債務の現在価値の分析の開示（内容、特徴及びリスクを区別） [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of an analysis of the present value of a defined benefit obligation that distinguishes the nature, characteristics and risks of the obligation. Such a disclosure could distinguish: (a) between amounts owing to active members, deferred members, and pensioners; (b) between vested benefits and accrued but not vested benefits; and (c) between conditional benefits, amounts attributable to future salary increases and other benefits. [Refer: Defined benefit obligation, at present value]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Termination benefits expense
標準ラベル（英）: Termination benefits expense
標準ラベル（日）: 解雇給付費用
定義: The amount of expense in relation to termination benefits. Termination benefits are employee benefits provided in exchange for the termination of an employee's employment as a result of either: (a) an entity's decision to terminate an employee's employment before the normal retirement date; or (b) an employee's decision to accept an offer of benefits in exchange for the termination of employment. [Refer: Employee benefits expense]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of income tax [text block]

定義: The entire disclosure for income taxes.

標準ラベル（英）: Major components of tax expense (income) [abstract]

標準ラベル（英）: Current tax expense (income)

定義: The amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

標準ラベル（英）: Adjustments for current tax of prior periods

定義: Adjustments of tax expense (income) recognised in the period for current tax of prior periods.

定義: The amount of current tax expense (income) and adjustments for the current tax of prior periods. [Refer: Current tax expense (income); Adjustments for current tax of prior periods]

標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax expense (income) relating to origination and reversal of temporary differences

標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax expense (income) relating to tax rate changes or imposition of new taxes

標準ラベル（英）: Tax benefit arising from previously unrecognised tax loss, tax credit or temporary difference of prior period used to reduce current tax expense

定義: The amount of benefit arising from a previously unrecognised tax loss, tax credit or temporary difference of a prior period that is used to reduce current tax expense. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax losses [member]; Unused tax credits [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Tax benefit arising from previously unrecognised tax loss, tax credit or temporary difference of prior period used to reduce deferred tax expense
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金費用の減額に使用した、従前は未認識であった税務上の欠損金、税額控除又は過去の期間の一時差異により生じた税務上の便益
定義: The amount of benefit arising from a previously unrecognised tax loss, tax credit or temporary difference of a prior period that is used to reduce deferred tax expense. [Refer: Deferred tax expense (income); Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax losses [member]; Unused tax credits [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax expense arising from write-down or reversal of write-down of deferred tax asset

標準ラベル（英）: Tax expense (income) relating to changes in accounting policies and errors included in profit or loss

定義: The amount of tax expense or income relating to changes in accounting policies and errors that are included in profit or loss in accordance with IAS 8, because they cannot be accounted for retrospectively.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Adjustments for deferred tax of prior periods
標準ラベル（英）: Adjustments for deferred tax of prior periods

標準ラベル（英）: Current tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity

定義: The amount of current tax relating to particular items that are charged or credited directly to equity, for example: (a) an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings resulting from either a change in accounting policy that is applied retrospectively or the correction of an error; and (b) amounts arising on initial recognition of the equity component of a compound financial instrument. [Refer: Retained earnings; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity

標準ラベル（英）: Current and deferred tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity

定義: The aggregate current and deferred tax relating to particular items that are charged or credited directly to equity, for example: (a) an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings resulting from either a change in accounting policy that is applied retrospectively or the correction of an error; and (b) amounts arising on initial recognition of the equity component of a compound financial instrument. [Refer: Deferred tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity; Retained earnings; Financial instruments, class [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Income tax relating to components of other comprehensive income

[Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax credits [member]; Unused tax losses [member]]

標準ラベル（英）: Temporary differences associated with investments in subsidiaries, branches and associates and interests in joint arrangements for which deferred tax liabilities have not been recognised
