標準ラベル（日）: 貸倒引当金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for an allowance account used to record impairments to financial assets due to credit losses.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unrealised foreign exchange gains (losses) [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Unrealised foreign exchange gains (losses) [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 未実現の為替差益（損） [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for gains (losses) resulting from changes in foreign exchange rates which have not yet been realised.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other temporary differences [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Other temporary differences [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の一時差異 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for temporary differences that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unused tax losses [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Unused tax losses [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 税務上の繰越欠損金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for tax losses that have been incurred and are carried forward for use against future taxable profit.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unused tax credits [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Unused tax credits [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 繰越税額控除 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for tax credits that have been received and are carried forward for use against future taxable profit.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of temporary difference, unused tax losses and unused tax credits [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of temporary difference, unused tax losses and unused tax credits [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 一時差異、税務上の繰越欠損金及び繰越税額控除の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax assets and liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax assets and liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金資産及び繰延税金負債 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax assets
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax assets
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金資産
定義: The amounts of income taxes recoverable in future periods in respect of: (a) deductible temporary differences; (b) the carryforward of unused tax losses; and (c) the carryforward of unused tax credits. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax credits [member]; Unused tax losses [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金負債
定義: The amounts of income taxes payable in future periods in respect of taxable temporary differences. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金負債（資産）
定義: The amount of deferred tax liabilities or assets. [Refer: Deferred tax liabilities; Deferred tax assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net deferred tax assets and liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Net deferred tax assets and liabilities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金資産及び負債の純額 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net deferred tax assets
標準ラベル（英）: Net deferred tax assets
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金資産の純額
定義: The amount of deferred tax assets net of deferred tax liabilities, when the absolute amount of deferred tax assets is greater than the absolute amount of deferred tax liabilities. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net deferred tax liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Net deferred tax liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金負債の純額
定義: The amount of deferred tax liabilities net of deferred tax assets, when the absolute amount of deferred tax liabilities is greater than the absolute amount of deferred tax assets. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax expense (income) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax expense (income) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金費用（収益） [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax expense (income)
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax expense (income)
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金費用（収益）
定義: The amount of tax expense (income) relating to changes in deferred tax liabilities and deferred tax assets. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax expense (income) recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax expense (income) recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識した繰延税金費用（収益）
定義: The amount of tax expense or income relating to changes in deferred tax liabilities and deferred tax assets, recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax expense (income); Deferred tax liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reconciliation of changes in deferred tax liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Reconciliation of changes in deferred tax liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金負債（資産）の増減の調整表 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax liability (asset) at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金負債（資産）
定義: The amount of deferred tax liabilities or assets. [Refer: Deferred tax liabilities; Deferred tax assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Changes in deferred tax liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Changes in deferred tax liability (asset) [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金負債（資産）の増減 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax expense (income) recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax expense (income) recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識した繰延税金費用（収益）
定義: The amount of tax expense or income relating to changes in deferred tax liabilities and deferred tax assets, recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax expense (income); Deferred tax liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity
標準ラベル（日）: 資本に直接貸方計上（借方計上）した項目に係る繰延税金
定義: The amount of deferred tax related to items credited (charged) directly to equity. [Refer: Deferred tax expense (income)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income tax relating to components of other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Income tax relating to components of other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益の内訳項目に係る法人所得税
定義: The amount of income tax relating to amounts recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through business combinations, deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through business combinations, deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合による増加（減少）：繰延税金負債（資産）
定義: The increase (decrease) in deferred tax liability (asset) resulting from business combinations. [Refer: Deferred tax liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through loss of control of subsidiary, deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through loss of control of subsidiary, deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社に対する支配の喪失による増加（減少）：繰延税金負債（資産）
定義: The decrease in deferred tax liability (asset) resulting from the loss of control of a subsidiary. [Refer: Deferred tax liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through net exchange differences, deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through net exchange differences, deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 正味の為替換算差額による増加（減少）：繰延税金負債（資産）
定義: The increase (decrease) in deferred tax liability (asset) resulting from the net exchange differences arising when the financial statements are translated from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Deferred tax liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total increase (decrease) in deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金負債（資産）の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in a deferred tax liability (asset). [Refer: Deferred tax liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax liability (asset) at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax liability (asset)
標準ラベル（日）: 繰延税金負債（資産）
定義: The amount of deferred tax liabilities or assets. [Refer: Deferred tax liabilities; Deferred tax assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Income tax consequences of dividends proposed or declared before financial statements authorised for issue not recognised as liability
標準ラベル（英）: Income tax consequences of dividends proposed or declared before financial statements authorised for issue not recognised as liability
標準ラベル（日）: 財務諸表発行の承認前に提案又は宣言されたが負債として認識していない配当の法人所得税への影響
定義: The amount of income tax consequences of dividends to shareholders of the entity that were proposed or declared after the reporting period but before the financial statements were authorised for issue, and are not recognised as a liability in the financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) in amount recognised for pre-acquisition deferred tax asset
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in amount recognised for pre-acquisition deferred tax asset
標準ラベル（日）: 取得前の繰延税金資産について認識した金額の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in a pre-acquisition deferred tax asset of the acquirer as a result of a business combination that changes the probability of realising the asset by the acquirer. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of event or change in circumstances that caused recognition of deferred tax benefits acquired in business combination after acquisition date
標準ラベル（英）: Description of event or change in circumstances that caused recognition of deferred tax benefits acquired in business combination after acquisition date
標準ラベル（日）: 企業結合で取得した繰延税金便益を取得日後に認識する原因となった事象又は状況変化の記述
定義: The description of the event or change in circumstances that caused the recognition of deferred tax benefits that were acquired in a business combination but not recognised until after the acquisition date. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of evidence supporting recognition of deferred tax asset when utilisation is dependent on future taxable profits in excess of profits from reversal of taxable temporary differences and entity has suffered loss in jurisdiction to which deferred tax asset relates
標準ラベル（英）: Description of evidence supporting recognition of deferred tax asset when utilisation is dependent on future taxable profits in excess of profits from reversal of taxable temporary differences and entity has suffered loss in jurisdiction to which deferred tax asset relates
標準ラベル（日）: 活用できるかどうかが将来加算一時差異の解消により生じる所得を上回る将来の課税所得の有無に依存しており、当該繰延税金資産に関係する課税法域において企業に損失が生じている場合の繰延税金資産の認識の根拠となる証拠の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the evidence supporting the recognition of a deferred tax asset when: (a) the utilisation of the deferred tax asset is dependent on future taxable profits in excess of the profits arising from the reversal of existing taxable temporary differences; and (b) the entity has suffered a loss in either the current or preceding period in the tax jurisdiction to which the deferred tax asset relates. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Deferred tax asset when utilisation is dependent on future taxable profits in excess of profits from reversal of taxable temporary differences and entity has suffered loss in jurisdiction to which deferred tax asset relates]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred tax asset when utilisation is dependent on future taxable profits in excess of profits from reversal of taxable temporary differences and entity has suffered loss in jurisdiction to which deferred tax asset relates
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred tax asset when utilisation is dependent on future taxable profits in excess of profits from reversal of taxable temporary differences and entity has suffered loss in jurisdiction to which deferred tax asset relates
標準ラベル（日）: 活用できるかどうかが将来加算一時差異の解消により生じる所得を上回る将来の課税所得の有無に依存しており、当該繰延税金資産に関係する課税法域において企業に損失が生じている場合の繰延税金資産
定義: The amount of deferred tax asset when: (a) the utilisation of the deferred tax asset is dependent on future taxable profits in excess of the profits arising from the reversal of existing taxable temporary differences; and (b) the entity has suffered a loss in either the current or preceding period in the tax jurisdiction to which the deferred tax asset relates. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of potential income tax consequences that would result from payment of dividend
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of potential income tax consequences that would result from payment of dividend
標準ラベル（日）: 配当の支払により生じる法人所得税への潜在的な影響の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the potential income tax consequences that would result from the payment of dividends to the entity's shareholders in jurisdictions such as those where income taxes are payable at a higher or lower rate if part or all of the net profit or retained earnings is paid out as a dividend to shareholders of the entity, or where income taxes may be refundable or payable if part or all of the net profit or retained earnings is paid out as a dividend to shareholders of the entity. [Refer: Retained earnings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of amounts of potential income tax consequences practicably determinable
標準ラベル（英）: Description of amounts of potential income tax consequences practicably determinable
標準ラベル（日）: 算定が実務上可能な法人所得税への潜在的な影響の金額の記述
定義: The description of the amounts of the practically determinable potential income tax consequences that would result from the payment of dividends to the entity's shareholders in jurisdictions where income taxes are payable at a higher or lower rate if part or all of the net profit or retained earnings is paid out as a dividend to shareholders of the entity, or where income taxes may be refundable or payable if part or all of the net profit or retained earnings is paid out as a dividend to shareholders of the entity. [Refer: Retained earnings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of whether there are potential income tax consequences not practicably determinable
標準ラベル（英）: Description of whether there are potential income tax consequences not practicably determinable
標準ラベル（日）: 法人所得税への潜在的な影響の算定が実務上不可能なものがあるかどうかの記述
定義: The description of whether there are potential income tax consequences not practically determinable that would result from the payment of dividends to the entity's shareholders in jurisdictions where income taxes are payable at a higher or lower rate if part or all of the net profit or retained earnings is paid out as a dividend to shareholders of the entity, or where income taxes may be refundable or payable if part or all of the net profit or retained earnings is paid out as a dividend to shareholders of the entity. [Refer: Retained earnings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reconciliation of accounting profit multiplied by applicable tax rates [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Reconciliation of accounting profit multiplied by applicable tax rates [abstract]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accounting profit
標準ラベル（英）: Accounting profit
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の利益
定義: The amount of profit (loss) for a period before deducting tax expense. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax expense (income) at applicable tax rate
標準ラベル（英）: Tax expense (income) at applicable tax rate
標準ラベル（日）: 適用税率による税金費用（収益）
定義: The product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s). [Refer: Accounting profit; Applicable tax rate]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax effect of revenues exempt from taxation

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax effect of expense not deductible in determining taxable profit (tax loss)
標準ラベル（英）: Tax effect of expense not deductible in determining taxable profit (tax loss)

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax effect of impairment of goodwill
標準ラベル（英）: Tax effect of impairment of goodwill

定義: The amount representing the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to impairment of goodwill. [Refer: Accounting profit; Goodwill]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax effect of tax losses
標準ラベル（英）: Tax effect of tax losses
標準ラベル（日）: 税務上の欠損金の税金への影響
定義: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to tax losses. [Refer: Accounting profit]

標準ラベル（英）: Tax effect of foreign tax rates

定義: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to foreign tax rates. [Refer: Accounting profit]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax effect from change in tax rate
標準ラベル（英）: Tax effect from change in tax rate
標準ラベル（日）: 税率の変更による税金への影響

標準ラベル（英）: Other tax effects for reconciliation between accounting profit and tax expense (income)

標準ラベル（日）: 税金費用（収益）：継続事業

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reconciliation of average effective tax rate and applicable tax rate [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Reconciliation of average effective tax rate and applicable tax rate [abstract]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Accounting profit
標準ラベル（英）: Accounting profit
標準ラベル（日）: 会計上の利益
定義: The amount of profit (loss) for a period before deducting tax expense. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Applicable tax rate
標準ラベル（英）: Applicable tax rate
標準ラベル（日）: 適用税率
定義: The applicable income tax rate.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax rate effect of revenues exempt from taxation
標準ラベル（英）: Tax rate effect of revenues exempt from taxation

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax rate effect of expense not deductible in determining taxable profit (tax loss)
標準ラベル（英）: Tax rate effect of expense not deductible in determining taxable profit (tax loss)
標準ラベル（日）: 課税所得（税務上の欠損金）の算定に際して損金算入されない費用の税率への影響

標準ラベル（英）: Tax rate effect of impairment of goodwill

標準ラベル（英）: Tax rate effect of tax losses

定義: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from tax losses. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax rate effect of foreign tax rates
標準ラベル（英）: Tax rate effect of foreign tax rates

定義: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from the application of foreign tax rates. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax rate effect from change in tax rate
標準ラベル（英）: Tax rate effect from change in tax rate

標準ラベル（英）: Capitalisation rate of borrowing costs eligible for capitalisation

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities or components of equity relating to discretionary participation features
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities or components of equity relating to discretionary participation features
標準ラベル（日）: 裁量権のある有配当性に関係する負債又は資本の内訳項目
定義: The amount of liabilities or components of equity relating to discretionary participation features. Discretionary participation features are contractual rights to receive, as a supplement to guaranteed benefits, additional benefits: (a) that are likely to be a significant portion of the total contractual benefits; (b) whose amount or timing is contractually at the discretion of the issuer; and (c) that are contractually based on: (i) the performance of a specified pool of contracts or a specified type of contract; (ii) realised and/or unrealised investment returns on a specified pool of assets held by the issuer; or (iii) the profit or loss of the company, fund or other entity that issues the contract.

標準ラベル（日）: 償却額：保険契約により生じた繰延新契約費
定義: The amount of amortisation of deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts. [Refer: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts; Depreciation and amortisation expense; Types of insurance contracts [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss, deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（英）: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss, deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識した減損損失：保険契約から生じた繰延契約獲得費
定義: The decrease in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts resulting from an impairment loss recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts; Types of insurance contracts [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through net exchange differences, deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through net exchange differences, deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（日）: 正味の為替換算差額による増加（減少）：保険契約により生じた繰延契約獲得費
定義: The increase (decrease) in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts resulting from the net exchange differences arising when the financial statements are translated from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through shadow accounting, deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through shadow accounting, deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（日）: シャドウ・アカウンティングによる増加（減少）：保険契約から生じた繰延契約獲得費
定義: The increase (decrease) in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts that result from shadow accounting. Shadow accounting is a practice with the following two features: (a) a recognised but unrealised gain or loss on an asset affects the measurement of the insurance liability in the same way that a realised gain or loss does; and (b) if unrealised gains or losses on an asset are recognised directly in equity, the resulting change in the carrying amount of the insurance liability is also recognised in equity. [Refer: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through other changes, deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through other changes, deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（日）: その他の変動による増加（減少）：保険契約から生じた繰延契約獲得費
定義: The increase (decrease) in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total increase (decrease) in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（日）: 保険契約から生じた繰延契約獲得費の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts. [Refer: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Deferred acquisition costs arising from insurance contracts
標準ラベル（日）: 保険契約から生じた繰延契約獲得費
定義: The amount of costs that an insurer incurs to sell, underwrite and initiate a new insurance contract whose recognition as an expense has been deferred. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

定義: The disclosure of information to evaluate the nature and extent of risks arising from insurance contracts. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of objectives, policies and processes for managing risks arising from insurance contracts and methods used to manage those risks
標準ラベル（英）: Description of objectives, policies and processes for managing risks arising from insurance contracts and methods used to manage those risks
標準ラベル（日）: 保険契約から生じるリスクの管理の目的、方針及びプロセス並びに当該リスクの管理に用いている方法の記述

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of insurance risk [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of insurance risk [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 保険リスクの開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of risk, other than financial risk, transferred from the holder of an insurance contract to the issuer.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of sensitivity to insurance risk [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of sensitivity to insurance risk [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 保険リスクに対する感応度の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the entity's sensitivity to insurance risk.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Sensitivity analysis to insurance risk
標準ラベル（英）: Sensitivity analysis to insurance risk
標準ラベル（日）: 保険リスクに対する感応度分析
定義: The description of a sensitivity analysis that shows how profit (loss) and equity would have been affected if changes in the relevant insurance risk variable that were reasonably possible at the end of the reporting period had occurred, the methods and assumptions used in preparing the sensitivity analysis and any changes from the previous period in the methods and assumptions used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Qualitative information about sensitivity and information about those terms and conditions of insurance contracts that have material effect
標準ラベル（英）: Qualitative information about sensitivity and information about those terms and conditions of insurance contracts that have material effect
標準ラベル（日）: 感応度に関する定性的情報及び重要な影響のある保険契約の契約条件に関する情報
定義: Qualitative information about sensitivity to insurance risk, and information about those terms and conditions of insurance contracts that have a material effect on the amount, timing and uncertainty of the insurer's future cash flows. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of concentrations of insurance risk
標準ラベル（英）: Description of concentrations of insurance risk
標準ラベル（日）: 保険リスクの集中の記述
定義: The description of concentrations of insurance risk, including a description of how management determined concentrations and a description of the shared characteristic that identifies each concentration (for example, type of insured event, geographical area or currency).

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of actual claims compared with previous estimates [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of actual claims compared with previous estimates [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 実際の保険金額とそれまでの見積り額との比較の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of actual claims compared with previous estimates (ie claims development). The disclosure about claims development shall go back to the period when the earliest material claim arose for which there is still uncertainty about the amount and timing of the claims payments, but need not go back more than ten years. An insurer need not disclose this information for claims for which uncertainty about the amount and timing of claims payments is typically resolved within one year.

定義: The profit (loss) attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent equity. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss), attributable to ordinary equity holders of parent entity including dilutive effects

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Weighted average number of ordinary shares outstanding

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Adjusted weighted average number of ordinary shares outstanding

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of adjustments of numerator to calculate diluted earnings per share
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of adjustments of numerator to calculate diluted earnings per share
標準ラベル（日）: 希薄化後１株当たり利益を計算するための分子の調整の説明

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of adjustments between denominators used to calculate basic and diluted earnings per share
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of adjustments between denominators used to calculate basic and diluted earnings per share

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Dilutive effect of share options on number of ordinary shares
標準ラベル（英）: Dilutive effect of share options on number of ordinary shares
標準ラベル（日）: ストック・オプションが普通株式数に与える希薄化効果
定義: The number of dilutive potential ordinary shares that relate to the assumed exercise of the entity's share options.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of instruments with potential future dilutive effect not included in calculation of diluted earnings per share
標準ラベル（英）: Description of instruments with potential future dilutive effect not included in calculation of diluted earnings per share
標準ラベル（日）: 潜在的な将来の希薄化効果があるが希薄化後1株当たり利益の計算に含めなかった金融商品の記述

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of transactions after reporting period that significantly change number of ordinary shares outstanding
標準ラベル（英）: Description of transactions after reporting period that significantly change number of ordinary shares outstanding
標準ラベル（日）: 報告期間後に発行済普通株式数を大きく変動させた取引の記述
定義: The description of transactions after the reporting period, other than those accounted for in accordance with paragraph 64 of IAS 33, that would have significantly changed the number of ordinary shares outstanding at the end of the period if those transactions had occurred before the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of transactions after reporting period that significantly change number of potential ordinary shares outstanding
標準ラベル（英）: Description of transactions after reporting period that significantly change number of potential ordinary shares outstanding
標準ラベル（日）: 報告期間後に潜在的普通株式数を大きく変動させた取引の記述
定義: The description of transactions after the reporting period, other than those accounted for in accordance with paragraph 64 of IAS 33, that would have significantly changed the number of potential ordinary shares outstanding at the end of the period if those transactions had occurred before the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]; Potential ordinary share transactions [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of presentation currency
標準ラベル（英）: Description of presentation currency
標準ラベル（日）: 表示通貨の記述

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason why presentation currency is different from functional currency
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason why presentation currency is different from functional currency
標準ラベル（日）: 表示通貨が機能通貨と異なる理由の記述

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of reason for change in functional currency
標準ラベル（英）: Description of reason for change in functional currency
標準ラベル（日）: 機能通貨の変更の理由の記述

標準ラベル（英）: Description of currency in which supplementary information is displayed
標準ラベル（日）: 補足情報を表示している通貨の記述

標準ラベル（日）: 補足情報の算定に用いた換算方法の記述

標準ラベル（英）: Net foreign exchange gain

標準ラベル（英）: Net foreign exchange loss
標準ラベル（日）: 為替差損の純額
定義: The net loss arising from foreign exchange differences. [Refer: Foreign exchange gain (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of exchange differences on translation
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of exchange differences on translation
標準ラベル（日）: 為替換算差額に係る剰余金

標準ラベル（英）: Average foreign exchange rate
標準ラベル（日）: 平均外国為替レート

定義: The entire disclosure for a statement of cash flows.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Consideration paid (received)
標準ラベル（英）: Consideration paid (received)
標準ラベル（日）: 支払（受取）対価
定義: The amount of consideration paid or received in respect of both obtaining and losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Portion of consideration paid (received) consisting of cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（英）: Portion of consideration paid (received) consisting of cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（日）: 支払（受取）対価のうち現金及び現金同等物で構成される部分
定義: The portion of consideration paid or received, consisting of cash and cash equivalents, in respect of both obtaining and losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Cash and cash equivalents; Consideration paid (received)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash and cash equivalents in subsidiary or businesses acquired or disposed
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents in subsidiary or businesses acquired or disposed
標準ラベル（日）: 取得又は処分した子会社又は事業の中の現金及び現金同等物
定義: The amount of cash and cash equivalents in subsidiaries or other businesses over which control is obtained or lost. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Cash and cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets other than cash or cash equivalents in subsidiary or businesses acquired or disposed
標準ラベル（英）: Assets other than cash or cash equivalents in subsidiary or businesses acquired or disposed
標準ラベル（日）: 取得又は処分した子会社又は事業の中の現金及び現金同等物以外の資産
定義: The amount of assets, other than cash or cash equivalents, in subsidiaries or other businesses over which control is obtained or lost. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities in subsidiary or businesses acquired or disposed
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities in subsidiary or businesses acquired or disposed
標準ラベル（日）: 取得又は処分した子会社又は事業の中の負債
定義: The amount of liabilities in subsidiaries or other businesses over which control is obtained or lost. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of accounting policy for determining components of cash and cash equivalents [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Description of accounting policy for determining components of cash and cash equivalents [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物の内訳項目の決定についての会計方針の記述 [テキストブロック]
定義: The description of the entity's accounting policy used to determine the components of cash and cash equivalents. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash and cash equivalents if different from statement of financial position [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents if different from statement of financial position [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物（財政状態計算書と異なる場合） [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物
定義: The amount of cash on hand and demand deposits, along with short-term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and that are subject to an insignificant risk of changes in value. [Refer: Cash; Cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Bank overdrafts
標準ラベル（英）: Bank overdrafts
標準ラベル（日）: 銀行借越
定義: The amount that has been withdrawn from an account in excess of existing cash balances. This is considered a short-term extension of credit by the bank. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash and cash equivalents classified as part of disposal group held for sale
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents classified as part of disposal group held for sale
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有の処分グループの一部として分類された現金及び現金同等物
定義: The amount of cash and cash equivalents that are classified as a part of a disposal group held for sale. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other differences to cash and cash equivalents in statement of cash flows
標準ラベル（英）: Other differences to cash and cash equivalents in statement of cash flows
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フロー計算書における現金及び現金同等物とのその他の差異
定義: The amount of differences between cash and cash equivalents in the statement of cash flows and the statement of financial position that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total cash and cash equivalents if different from statement of financial position
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents if different from statement of financial position
標準ラベル（日）: 現金及び現金同等物（財政状態計算書と異なる場合）
定義: The amount of cash and cash equivalents in the statement of cash flows when different from the amount of cash and cash equivalents in the statement of financial position. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of investing and financing transactions not requiring use of cash or cash equivalents
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of investing and financing transactions not requiring use of cash or cash equivalents
標準ラベル（日）: 現金又は現金同等物の使用を必要としない投資及び財務取引の説明
定義: The explanation of the relevant information about investing and financing transactions that do not require the use of cash or cash equivalents.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of acquisition of assets by assuming directly related liabilities or means of finance lease
標準ラベル（英）: Description of acquisition of assets by assuming directly related liabilities or means of finance lease
標準ラベル（日）: 直接関連する負債の引受け又はファイナンス・リースによる資産の取得の記述
定義: The description of the non-cash acquisition of assets either by assuming directly related liabilities or by means of a finance lease.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of acquisition of assets by assuming directly related liabilities or by means of lease
標準ラベル（英）: Description of acquisition of assets by assuming directly related liabilities or by means of lease
標準ラベル（日）: 直接関連する負債の引受け又はリースによる資産の取得の記述
定義: The description of the non-cash acquisition of assets either by assuming directly related liabilities or by means of a lease.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of acquisition of entity by means of equity issue
標準ラベル（英）: Description of acquisition of entity by means of equity issue
標準ラベル（日）: 持分の発行による企業の取得の記述
定義: The description of the non-cash acquisition of an entity by means of an equity issue.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of conversion of debt to equity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of conversion of debt to equity
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の資本への転換の記述
定義: The description of the non-cash conversion of debt to equity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of information that enables users of financial statements to evaluate changes in liabilities arising from financing activities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of information that enables users of financial statements to evaluate changes in liabilities arising from financing activities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債の変動を財務諸表利用者が評価できるようにする情報の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of information that enables users of financial statements to evaluate changes in liabilities arising from financing activities, including both changes arising from cash flows and non-cash changes. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債の調整表の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of the reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債の調整表の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債の調整表の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities arising from financing activities [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities arising from financing activities [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities arising from financing activities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities arising from financing activities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for liabilities arising from financing activities. It also represents the standard value for the 'Liabilities arising from financing activities' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Long-term borrowings [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Long-term borrowings [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 長期借入金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for long-term borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Short-term borrowings [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Short-term borrowings [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 短期借入金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for short-term borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Lease liabilities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Lease liabilities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: リース負債 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for lease liabilities. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets held to hedge liabilities arising from financing activities [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Assets held to hedge liabilities arising from financing activities [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債をヘッジするために保有している資産 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for assets held to hedge liabilities arising from financing activities. [Refer: Assets; Liabilities arising from financing activities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reconciliation of liabilities arising from financing activities [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債の調整表の開示 [表示項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities arising from financing activities at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities arising from financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Changes in liabilities arising from financing activities [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Changes in liabilities arising from financing activities [abstract]

標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through obtaining or losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses, liabilities arising from financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 子会社又は他の事業に対する支配の獲得又は喪失による増加（減少）：財務活動から生じた負債

標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through effect of changes in foreign exchange rates, liabilities arising from financing activities

定義: The increase (decrease) in liabilities arising from financing activities resulting from the effect of changes in foreign exchange rates. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase (decrease) through changes in fair values, liabilities arising from financing activities
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through changes in fair values, liabilities arising from financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 公正価値の変動による増加（減少）：財務活動から生じた負債
定義: The increase (decrease) in liabilities arising from financing activities resulting from changes in fair values. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Increase through new leases, liabilities arising from financing activities
標準ラベル（英）: Increase through new leases, liabilities arising from financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 新規リースによる増加：財務活動から生じた負債

標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) through other changes, liabilities arising from financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: その他の変動による増加（減少）：財務活動から生じた負債

標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in liabilities arising from financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in liabilities arising from financing activities. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities arising from financing activities at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities arising from financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動から生じた負債
定義: The amount of liabilities for which cash flows were, or future cash flows will be, classified in the statement of cash flows as cash flows from financing activities. [Refer: Cash flows from (used in) financing activities; Liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash and cash equivalents held by entity unavailable for use by group
標準ラベル（英）: Cash and cash equivalents held by entity unavailable for use by group
標準ラベル（日）: 企業が保有する現金及び現金同等物のうち企業集団が利用できないもの

標準ラベル（英）: Commentary by management on significant cash and cash equivalent balances held by entity that are not available for use by group

定義: The commentary by management on significant cash and cash equivalent balances held by the entity that are not available for use by the group. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of additional information about understanding financial position and liquidity of entity [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of additional information about understanding financial position and liquidity of entity [text block]

定義: The disclosure of additional information that may be relevant to users of financial statements in understanding the financial position and liquidity of an entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Undrawn borrowing facilities
標準ラベル（英）: Undrawn borrowing facilities
標準ラベル（日）: 未使用の借入限度枠
定義: The amount of undrawn borrowing facilities that may be available for future operating activities and to settle capital commitments. [Refer: Capital commitments]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Cash flows from (used in) maintaining operating capacity
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flows from (used in) maintaining operating capacity
標準ラベル（日）: 事業規模の維持による（に使用された）キャッシュ・フロー
定義: The aggregate amount of cash flows that are required to maintain the entity's current ability to execute operating activities (for example, measured by units of output per day).

標準ラベル（英）: Income taxes paid (refund) [abstract]

標準ラベル（日）: 法人所得税支払額（還付額）

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of analysis of other comprehensive income by item [text block]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of analysis of other comprehensive income by item [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of analysis of other comprehensive income by item [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益の項目別の分析の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of analysis of other comprehensive income by item [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of analysis of other comprehensive income by item [table]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益の項目別の分析の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the analysis of other comprehensive income by item.

標準ラベル（日）: 資本の内訳項目 [軸]

標準ラベル（英）: Equity [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本 [メンバー]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity attributable to owners of parent [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity attributable to owners of parent [member]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share premium [member]
