表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本性金融商品に対する投資をヘッジするヘッジ手段に係る利得及び損益に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of time value of options [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of time value of options [member]
標準ラベル（日）: オプションの時間的価値の価値変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the time value of options when separating the intrinsic value and time value of an option contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the intrinsic value.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 先渡契約の先渡要素の価値変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the forward elements of forward contracts when separating the forward element and spot element of a forward contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the spot element.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 外貨ベーシス・スプレッドの価値変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of foreign currency basis spreads of financial instruments when excluding them from the designation of these financial instruments as hedging instruments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産に係る利得及び損失に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却可能金融資産の再測定による利得及び損失に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of share-based payments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of share-based payments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from share-based payments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of remeasurements of defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of remeasurements of defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度の再測定に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from remeasurements of defined benefit plans. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有に分類された非流動資産又は処分グループに関してその他の包括利益に認識され資本に累積された金額 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from amounts that are recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity that relate to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses from investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses from investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本性金融商品に対する投資からの利得及び損失に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses from investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の信用リスクの変動に起因する金融負債の公正価値の変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in fair value of financial liabilities attributable to change in the credit risk of the liabilities. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve for catastrophe [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve for catastrophe [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 異常危険準備金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing resources to provide for infrequent but severe catastrophic losses caused by events such as damage to nuclear installations or satellites or earthquake damage.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve for equalisation [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve for equalisation [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 平衡準備金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing resources to cover random fluctuations of claim expenses around the expected value of claims for some types of insurance contract (for example, hail, credit, guarantee and fidelity insurance) using a formula based on experience over a number of years.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of discretionary participation features [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of discretionary participation features [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 裁量権のある有配当性の準備金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from discretionary participation features. Discretionary participation features are contractual rights to receive, as a supplement to guaranteed benefits, additional benefits: (a) that are likely to be a significant portion of the total contractual benefits; (b) whose amount or timing is contractually at the discretion of the issuer; and (c) that are contractually based on: (i) the performance of a specified pool of contracts or a specified type of contract; (ii) realised and/or unrealised investment returns on a specified pool of assets held by the issuer; or (iii) the profit or loss of the company, fund or other entity that issues the contract.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Retained earnings [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Retained earnings [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 利益剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing an entity's cumulative undistributed earnings or deficit.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-controlling interests [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Non-controlling interests [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 非支配持分 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for equity in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to the parent.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Types of risks [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Types of risks [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: リスクの種類 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Risks [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Risks [member]
標準ラベル（日）: リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all types of risks. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of risks' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Credit risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Credit risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 信用リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the risk that one party to a financial instrument will cause a financial loss for the other party by failing to discharge an obligation. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liquidity risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Liquidity risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 流動性リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the risk that an entity will encounter difficulty in meeting obligations associated with financial liabilities that are settled by delivering cash or another financial asset. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Market risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Market risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 市場リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market prices. Market risk comprises three types of risk: currency risk, interest rate risk and other price risk. [Refer: Currency risk [member]; Interest rate risk [member]; Other price risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Currency risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Currency risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 為替リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a type of market risk representing the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in foreign exchange rates. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest rate risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Interest rate risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 金利リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market interest rates. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other price risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Other price risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の価格リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a type of market risk representing the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market prices (other than those arising from interest rate risk or currency risk), whether those changes are caused by factors specific to the individual financial instrument or its issuer, or by factors affecting all similar financial instruments traded in the market. [Refer: Currency risk [member]; Interest rate risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Equity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Equity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 株価リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in equity prices. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Commodity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Commodity price risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: コモディティ価格リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in commodity prices. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Prepayment risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Prepayment risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 期限前償還リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the type of risk that one party to a financial asset will incur a financial loss because the other party repays earlier or later than expected. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Residual value risk [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Residual value risk [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 残存価値リスク [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in residual values. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of analysis of other comprehensive income by item [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of analysis of other comprehensive income by item [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益の項目別の分析の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, exchange differences on translation
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, exchange differences on translation
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：為替換算差額
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to exchange differences when financial statements of foreign operations are translated. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, available-for-sale financial assets
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, available-for-sale financial assets
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：売却可能金融資産
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, cash flow hedges
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, cash flow hedges
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：キャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジ
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) on cash flow hedges, net of tax
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) on cash flow hedges, net of tax
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジに係る利得（損失）（税引後）
定義: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on cash flow hedges, net of tax. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges, net of tax
標準ラベル（英）: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges, net of tax
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジに係る組替調整額（税引後）
定義: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to cash flow hedges, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which hedged future cash flows are no longer expected to occur, net of tax
標準ラベル（英）: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which hedged future cash flows are no longer expected to occur, net of tax
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジしていた将来キャッシュ・フローの発生が見込まれなくなったキャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジに係る組替調整額（税引後）
定義: The amount of reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which the hedged future cash flows are no longer expected to occur, net of tax. [Refer: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges, net of tax]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which hedged item affected profit or loss, net of tax
標準ラベル（英）: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which hedged item affected profit or loss, net of tax
標準ラベル（日）: ヘッジ対象が純損益に影響を与えたキャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジに係る組替調整額（税引後）
定義: The amount of reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which the hedged item affected profit or loss, net of tax. [Refer: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges, net of tax]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which reserve of cash flow hedges will not be recovered in one or more future periods, net of tax
標準ラベル（英）: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which reserve of cash flow hedges will not be recovered in one or more future periods, net of tax
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジ剰余金が将来の期間に回収されないキャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジに係る組替調整額（税引後）
定義: The amount of reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges for which the reserve of cash flow hedges will not be recovered in one or more future periods, net of tax. [Refer: Reclassification adjustments on cash flow hedges, net of tax]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, hedges of net investments in foreign operations
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, hedges of net investments in foreign operations
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：在外営業活動体に対する純投資のヘッジ
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Gains (losses) on hedges of net investments in foreign operations, net of tax
標準ラベル（英）: Gains (losses) on hedges of net investments in foreign operations, net of tax
標準ラベル（日）: 在外営業活動体に対する純投資のヘッジに係る利得（損失）：税引後
定義: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on hedges of net investments in foreign operations, net of tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reclassification adjustments on hedges of net investments in foreign operations, net of tax
標準ラベル（英）: Reclassification adjustments on hedges of net investments in foreign operations, net of tax
標準ラベル（日）: 在外営業活動体に対する純投資のヘッジに係る組替調整額（税引後）
定義: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：資本性金融商品に対する投資をヘッジするヘッジ手段に係る利得（損失）
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of time value of options
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of time value of options
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：オプションの時間的価値の価値変動
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of time value of options. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of time value of options that hedge transaction related hedged items
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of time value of options that hedge transaction related hedged items
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：取引に関連したヘッジ対象をヘッジするオプションの時間的価値の価値変動
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of time value of options that hedge transaction related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of time value of options that hedge time-period related hedged items
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of time value of options that hedge time-period related hedged items
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：期間に関連したヘッジ対象をヘッジするオプションの時間的価値の価値変動
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of time value of options that hedge time-period related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of forward elements of forward contracts
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of forward elements of forward contracts
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：先渡契約の先渡要素の価値変動
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge transaction related hedged items
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge transaction related hedged items
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：取引に関連したヘッジ対象をヘッジする先渡契約の先渡要素の価値変動
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge transaction related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge time-period related hedged items
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge time-period related hedged items
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：期間に関連したヘッジ対象をヘッジする先渡契約の先渡要素の価値変動
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge time-period related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of foreign currency basis spreads
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of foreign currency basis spreads
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：外貨ベーシス・スプレッドの価値変動
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge transaction related hedged items
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge transaction related hedged items
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：取引に関連したヘッジ対象をヘッジする外貨ベーシス・スプレッドの価値変動
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge transaction related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge time-period related hedged items
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge time-period related hedged items
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：期間に関連したヘッジ対象をヘッジする外貨ベーシス・スプレッドの価値変動
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge time-period related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) from investments in equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) from investments in equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：資本性金融商品に対する投資による利得（損失）
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on revaluation
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on revaluation
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：再評価に係る利得（損失）
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) in relation to changes in the revaluation surplus. [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Revaluation surplus]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：確定給付制度の再測定に係る利得（損失）
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans, which comprise actuarial gains and losses; the return on plan assets, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset); and any change in the effect of the asset ceiling, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset). [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Defined benefit plans [member]; Plan assets [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability
標準ラベル（英）: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益（税引後）：負債の信用リスクの変動に起因する金融負債の公正価値の変動
定義: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to changes in the fair value of financial liabilities attributable to the changes in the credit risk of those liabilities. [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Credit risk [member]; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, net of tax
標準ラベル（英）: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, net of tax
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している関連会社及び共同支配企業のその他の包括利益に対する持分（税引後）
定義: The entity's share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, net of tax. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of share capital, reserves and other equity interest [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of share capital, reserves and other equity interest [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式資本、剰余金及びその他の資本持分の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for share capital, reserves and other equity interest.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of classes of share capital [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of classes of share capital [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式資本の各クラスの開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of classes of share capital. [Refer: Share capital [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of classes of share capital [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of classes of share capital [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式資本の各クラスの開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of classes of share capital [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of classes of share capital [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式資本の各クラスの開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to classes of share capital.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Classes of share capital [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Classes of share capital [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式資本のクラス [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share capital [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Share capital [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式資本 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for share capital of the entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of share capital' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Ordinary shares [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Ordinary shares [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 普通株式 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for equity instruments that are subordinate to all other classes of equity instruments. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of ordinary shares' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Preference shares [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Preference shares [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 優先株式 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for equity instruments that are senior in some aspects to ordinary shares, but subordinate to debt instruments in terms of claim. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of classes of share capital [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of classes of share capital [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式資本の各クラスの開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of shares authorised
標準ラベル（英）: Number of shares authorised
標準ラベル（日）: 授権株式数
定義: The number of shares authorised.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of shares issued [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Number of shares issued [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 発行済株式数 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of shares issued and fully paid
標準ラベル（英）: Number of shares issued and fully paid
標準ラベル（日）: 全額払込済みの発行済株式数
定義: The number of shares issued by the entity, for which full payment has been received.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of shares issued but not fully paid
標準ラベル（英）: Number of shares issued but not fully paid
標準ラベル（日）: 未払込額のある発行済株式数
定義: The number of shares issued by the entity, for which full payment has not been received.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total number of shares issued
標準ラベル（英）: Number of shares issued
標準ラベル（日）: 発行済株式数
定義: The number of shares issued by the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Par value per share
標準ラベル（英）: Par value per share
標準ラベル（日）: １株当たりの額面金額
定義: The nominal value per share.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Explanation of fact that shares have no par value
標準ラベル（英）: Explanation of fact that shares have no par value
標準ラベル（日）: 株式が無額面である旨の説明
定義: The explanation of the fact that shares have no par value. [Refer: Par value per share]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reconciliation of number of shares outstanding [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Reconciliation of number of shares outstanding [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 発行済株式数の調整表 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of shares outstanding at beginning of period
標準ラベル（英）: Number of shares outstanding
標準ラベル（日）: 発行済株式総数
定義: The number of shares that have been authorised and issued, reduced by treasury shares held. [Refer: Treasury shares]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Changes in number of shares outstanding [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Changes in number of shares outstanding [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 発行済株式総数の変動 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Total increase (decrease) in number of shares outstanding
標準ラベル（英）: Increase (decrease) in number of shares outstanding
標準ラベル（日）: 発行済株式総数の増加（減少）
定義: The increase (decrease) in the number of shares outstanding. [Refer: Number of shares outstanding]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of shares outstanding at end of period
標準ラベル（英）: Number of shares outstanding
標準ラベル（日）: 発行済株式総数
定義: The number of shares that have been authorised and issued, reduced by treasury shares held. [Refer: Treasury shares]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Rights, preferences and restrictions attaching to class of share capital
標準ラベル（英）: Rights, preferences and restrictions attaching to class of share capital
標準ラベル（日）: そのクラスの株式資本に付されている権利、優先権及び制限
定義: The description of the rights, preferences and restrictions attaching to a class of share capital including restrictions on the distribution of dividends and the repayment of capital. [Refer: Share capital [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of shares in entity held by entity or by its subsidiaries or associates
標準ラベル（英）: Number of shares in entity held by entity or by its subsidiaries or associates
標準ラベル（日）: 自己株式又は子会社若しくは関連会社が保有している自社株式の数
定義: The number of shares in the entity held by the entity or by its subsidiaries or associates. [Refer: Associates [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Number of shares reserved for issue under options and contracts for sale of shares
標準ラベル（英）: Number of shares reserved for issue under options and contracts for sale of shares
標準ラベル（日）: オプションによる発行及び株式売渡契約のための留保株式の数
定義: The number of shares reserved for issue under options and contracts for the sale of shares.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of terms of shares reserved for issue under options and contracts for sale of shares
標準ラベル（英）: Description of terms of shares reserved for issue under options and contracts for sale of shares
標準ラベル（日）: オプションによる発行及び株式売渡契約のための留保株式の契約条件の記述
定義: The description of terms of shares reserved for issue under options and contracts for the sale of shares.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reserves within equity [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reserves within equity [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本に含まれている剰余金の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of reserves within equity. [Refer: Other reserves [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reserves within equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reserves within equity [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本に含まれている剰余金の開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reserves within equity [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reserves within equity [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本に含まれている剰余金の開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to reserves within equity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserves within equity [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserves within equity [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本に含まれている剰余金 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other reserves [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Other reserves [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing reserves within equity, not including retained earnings. It also represents the standard value for the 'Reserves within equity' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Retained earnings]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revaluation surplus [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Revaluation surplus [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 再評価剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing accumulated revaluation surplus on the revaluation of assets recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of exchange differences on translation [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of exchange differences on translation [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 為替換算差額に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing accumulated exchange differences on the translation of financial statements of foreign operations recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of cash flow hedges [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of cash flow hedges [member]
標準ラベル（日）: キャッシュ・フロー・ヘッジに係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated portion of gain (loss) on a hedging instrument that is determined to be an effective hedge for cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本性金融商品に対する投資をヘッジするヘッジ手段に係る利得及び損益に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of time value of options [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of time value of options [member]
標準ラベル（日）: オプションの時間的価値の価値変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the time value of options when separating the intrinsic value and time value of an option contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the intrinsic value.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of forward elements of forward contracts [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 先渡契約の先渡要素の価値変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the forward elements of forward contracts when separating the forward element and spot element of a forward contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the spot element.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in value of foreign currency basis spreads [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 外貨ベーシス・スプレッドの価値変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of foreign currency basis spreads of financial instruments when excluding them from the designation of these financial instruments as hedging instruments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益を通じて公正価値で測定する金融資産に係る利得及び損失に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却可能金融資産の再測定による利得及び損失に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of share-based payments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of share-based payments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 株式に基づく報酬に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from share-based payments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of remeasurements of defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of remeasurements of defined benefit plans [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 確定給付制度の再測定に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from remeasurements of defined benefit plans. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有に分類された非流動資産又は処分グループに関してその他の包括利益に認識され資本に累積された金額 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from amounts that are recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity that relate to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of gains and losses from investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of gains and losses from investments in equity instruments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本性金融商品に対する投資からの利得及び損失に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses from investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 負債の信用リスクの変動に起因する金融負債の公正価値の変動に係る剰余金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing the accumulated change in fair value of financial liabilities attributable to change in the credit risk of the liabilities. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial liabilities]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve for catastrophe [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve for catastrophe [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 異常危険準備金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing resources to provide for infrequent but severe catastrophic losses caused by events such as damage to nuclear installations or satellites or earthquake damage.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve for equalisation [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve for equalisation [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 平衡準備金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity representing resources to cover random fluctuations of claim expenses around the expected value of claims for some types of insurance contract (for example, hail, credit, guarantee and fidelity insurance) using a formula based on experience over a number of years.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reserve of discretionary participation features [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reserve of discretionary participation features [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 裁量権のある有配当性の準備金 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for a component of equity resulting from discretionary participation features. Discretionary participation features are contractual rights to receive, as a supplement to guaranteed benefits, additional benefits: (a) that are likely to be a significant portion of the total contractual benefits; (b) whose amount or timing is contractually at the discretion of the issuer; and (c) that are contractually based on: (i) the performance of a specified pool of contracts or a specified type of contract; (ii) realised and/or unrealised investment returns on a specified pool of assets held by the issuer; or (iii) the profit or loss of the company, fund or other entity that issues the contract.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of reserves within equity [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of reserves within equity [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 資本に含まれている剰余金の開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature and purpose of reserves within equity
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature and purpose of reserves within equity
標準ラベル（日）: 資本に含まれている剰余金の内容及び目的の記述
定義: The description of the nature and purpose of reserves within equity. [Refer: Other reserves]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of rights, preferences and restrictions attaching to category of equity interest by entity without share capital
標準ラベル（英）: Description of rights, preferences and restrictions attaching to category of equity interest by entity without share capital
標準ラベル（日）: 株式資本のない企業による資本持分の区分に付帯する権利、優先権及び制限の記述
定義: The description of the rights, preferences and restrictions that are attached to a category of equity interest by an entity without share capital. [Refer: Share capital [member]; Other equity interest]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Summary quantitative data about puttable financial instruments classified as equity instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Summary quantitative data about puttable financial instruments classified as equity instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 資本性金融商品に分類したプッタブル金融商品に関する定量的データの要約
定義: Summary quantitative data about puttable financial instruments classified as equity instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about objectives, policies and processes for managing entity's obligation to repurchase or redeem puttable financial instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Information about objectives, policies and processes for managing entity's obligation to repurchase or redeem puttable financial instruments
標準ラベル（日）: 企業がプッタブル金融商品の買戻し又は償還を行う義務の管理についての目的、方針及び手続に関する情報
定義: Information about the entity's objectives, policies, and processes for managing its obligation to repurchase or redeem puttable financial instruments classified as equity instruments when required to do so by the instrument holders, including any changes from the previous period. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Expected cash outflow on redemption or repurchase of puttable financial instruments
標準ラベル（英）: Expected cash outflow on redemption or repurchase of puttable financial instruments
標準ラベル（日）: プッタブル金融商品の償還又は買戻しの際の予想キャッシュ・アウトフロー
定義: The expected cash outflow on the redemption or repurchase of puttable financial instruments classified as equity. [Refer: Liquidity risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Information about how expected cash outflow on redemption or repurchase was determined
標準ラベル（英）: Information about how expected cash outflow on redemption or repurchase was determined
標準ラベル（日）: 償還又は買戻しの際の予想キャッシュ・アウトフローの算定方法に関する情報
定義: Information about how the expected cash outflow on redemption or repurchase of puttable financial instruments classified as equity was determined. [Refer: Expected cash outflow on redemption or repurchase of puttable financial instruments]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of interest in funds [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of interest in funds [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: ファンドに対する持分の開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for the entity's interest in decommissioning, restoration and environmental rehabilitation funds.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of interest in funds
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of interest in funds
標準ラベル（日）: ファンドに対する持分の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the entity's interest in decommissioning, restoration and environmental rehabilitation funds.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of restrictions on access to assets in funds
標準ラベル（英）: Description of restrictions on access to assets in funds
標準ラベル（日）: ファンドの資産へのアクセスに対する制限の記述
定義: The description of restrictions on access to the assets in decommissioning, restoration and environmental rehabilitation funds.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of redemption prohibition, transfer between financial liabilities and equity [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of redemption prohibition, transfer between financial liabilities and equity [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 償還禁止の開示：金融負債と資本との間の振替 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for the change in a redemption prohibition that leads to a transfer between financial liabilities and equity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Transfer between financial liabilities and equity attributable to change in redemption prohibition
標準ラベル（英）: Transfer between financial liabilities and equity attributable to change in redemption prohibition
標準ラベル（日）: 償還禁止の変更に起因する金融負債と資本との間の振替
定義: The amount transferred between financial liabilities and the equity attributable to a change in the redemption prohibition.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of timing and reason for transfer between financial liabilities and equity attributable to change in redemption prohibition
標準ラベル（英）: Description of timing and reason for transfer between financial liabilities and equity attributable to change in redemption prohibition
標準ラベル（日）: 償還禁止の変更に起因する金融負債と資本との間の振替の時期及び理由の記述
定義: The description of the timing of, and the reason for, the transfer between financial liabilities and the equity attributable to a change in the redemption prohibition.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of entity's operating segments [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of entity's operating segments [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 企業の事業セグメントの開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The entire disclosure for operating segments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of factors used to identify entity's reportable segments
標準ラベル（英）: Description of factors used to identify entity's reportable segments
標準ラベル（日）: 企業の報告セグメントを識別するために使用した要素の記述
定義: The description of the factors used to identify the entity's reportable segments, including the basis of organisation (for example, whether management has chosen to organise the entity around differences in products and services, geographical areas, regulatory environments or a combination of factors and whether operating segments have been aggregated). [Refer: Geographical areas [member]; Operating segments [member]; Products and services [member]; Reportable segments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of judgements made by management in applying aggregation criteria for operating segments
標準ラベル（英）: Description of judgements made by management in applying aggregation criteria for operating segments
標準ラベル（日）: 経営者が事業セグメントについての集約規準を適用する際に行った判断の記述
定義: The description of judgements made by the management in applying the aggregation criteria for operating segments. [Refer: Operating segments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of types of products and services from which each reportable segment derives its revenues
標準ラベル（英）: Description of types of products and services from which each reportable segment derives its revenues
標準ラベル（日）: 各報告セグメントが収益を得る源泉となる製品及びサービスの類型の記述
定義: The description of the types of products and services from which a reportable segment derives its revenues. [Refer: Products and services [member]; Revenue]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of sources of revenue for all other segments
標準ラベル（英）: Description of sources of revenue for all other segments
標準ラベル（日）: その他のすべてのセグメントの収益の源泉の記述
定義: The description of the sources of the revenue included in the 'all other segments' category, which includes the combined information about other business activities and operating segments that are not reportable. [Refer: All other segments [member]; Revenue]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of basis of accounting for transactions between reportable segments
標準ラベル（英）: Description of basis of accounting for transactions between reportable segments
標準ラベル（日）: 報告セグメント間の取引の会計処理の基礎の記述
定義: The description of the basis of accounting for transactions between the entity's reportable segments. [Refer: Reportable segments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of differences between measurements of reportable segments' profits or losses and entity's profit or loss before income tax expense or income and discontinued operations
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of differences between measurements of reportable segments' profits or losses and entity's profit or loss before income tax expense or income and discontinued operations
標準ラベル（日）: 報告セグメントの純損益の測定値と企業の純損益（税金費用又は税金収益及び非継続事業の考慮前）との差異の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the differences between measurements of the reportable segments' profits or losses and the entity's profit or loss before income tax expense or income and discontinued operations. Those differences could include accounting policies and policies for the allocation of centrally incurred costs that are necessary for an understanding of the reported segment information. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Reportable segments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of differences between measurements of reportable segments' assets and entity's assets
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of differences between measurements of reportable segments' assets and entity's assets
標準ラベル（日）: 報告セグメントの資産の測定値と企業の資産との間の差異の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the differences between measurements of the reportable segments' assets and the entity's assets. Those differences could include accounting policies and policies for allocation of jointly used assets that are necessary for an understanding of the reported segment information. [Refer: Reportable segments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of differences between measurements of reportable segments' liabilities and entity's liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of differences between measurements of reportable segments' liabilities and entity's liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 報告セグメントの負債の測定値と企業の負債との間の差異の内容の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the differences between measurements of the reportable segments' liabilities and the entity's liabilities. Those differences could include accounting policies and policies for the allocation of jointly utilised liabilities that are necessary for an understanding of the reported segment information. [Refer: Reportable segments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature of changes from prior periods in measurement methods used to determine reported segment profit or loss and effect of those changes on measure of segment profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature of changes from prior periods in measurement methods used to determine reported segment profit or loss and effect of those changes on measure of segment profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 報告セグメントの純損益の算定に用いた測定方法の過去の期間からの変更の内容及び当該変更がセグメント純損益の測定値に与えた影響の記述
定義: The description of the nature of the changes from prior periods in the measurement methods used to determine reported segment profit or loss and the effect, if any, of those changes on the measure of segment profit (loss). [Refer: Reportable segments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of nature and effect of any asymmetrical allocations to reportable segments
標準ラベル（英）: Description of nature and effect of any asymmetrical allocations to reportable segments
標準ラベル（日）: 報告セグメントへの非対称的な配分の内容及び影響の記述
定義: The description of the nature and effect of any asymmetrical allocations to reportable segments. For example, an entity might allocate depreciation expense to a segment without allocating the related depreciable assets to that segment. [Refer: Reportable segments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of operating segments [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of operating segments [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 事業セグメントの開示 [テキストブロック]
定義: The disclosure of operating segments. [Refer: Operating segments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of operating segments [abstract]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of operating segments [abstract]
標準ラベル（日）: 事業セグメントの開示 [タイトル項目]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of operating segments [table]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of operating segments [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 事業セグメントの開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to operating segments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Segment consolidation items [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Segment consolidation items [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: セグメント連結項目 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Entity's total for segment consolidation items [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Entity's total for segment consolidation items [member]
標準ラベル（日）: セグメント連結項目についての企業全体の合計 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the standard value for the 'Segment consolidation items' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Operating segments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Operating segments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 事業セグメント [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an entity: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same entity); (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the entity’s chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance; and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. [Refer: Revenue]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Material reconciling items [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Material reconciling items [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 重要性がある調整項目 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for material adjustments used to reconcile items in the entity's financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Elimination of intersegment amounts [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Elimination of intersegment amounts [member]
標準ラベル（日）: セグメント間の金額の相殺消去 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the elimination of intersegment amounts in the reconciliations of total segment amounts to amounts recognised in the entity's financial statements.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Unallocated amounts [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Unallocated amounts [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 配分しなかった金額 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for items that have not been allocated to operating segments.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Segments [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Segments [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: セグメント [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Segments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Segments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: セグメント [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for all segments of an entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Segments' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reportable segments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Reportable segments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 報告セグメント [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for operating segments for which IFRS 8 requires information to be disclosed. The entity shall report separately information about an operating segment that meets any of the following quantitative thresholds: (a) reported revenue, including both sales to external customers and intersegment sales or transfers, is 10 per cent or more of the combined revenue, internal and external, of all operating segments; (b) the absolute amount of its reported profit or loss is 10 per cent or more of the greater, in absolute amount, of (i) the combined reported profit of all operating segments that did not report a loss and (ii) the combined reported loss of all operating segments that reported a loss; or (c) assets are 10 per cent or more of the combined assets of all operating segments. Additionally operating segments that do not meet any of the quantitative thresholds may be considered reportable, and separately disclosed, if management believes that information about the segment would be useful to users of the financial statements. [Refer: Operating segments [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: All other segments [member]
標準ラベル（英）: All other segments [member]
標準ラベル（日）: その他のすべてのセグメント [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for business activities and operating segments that are not reportable.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of operating segments [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of operating segments [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 事業セグメントの開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revenue
標準ラベル（英）: Revenue
標準ラベル（日）: 収益
定義: The income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities. Income is increases in economic benefits during the accounting period in the form of inflows or enhancements of assets or decreases of liabilities that result in an increase in equity, other than those relating to contributions from equity participants.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest income
標準ラベル（英）: Interest income
標準ラベル（日）: 金利収益
定義: The amount of income arising from interest.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest expense
標準ラベル（英）: Interest expense
標準ラベル（日）: 金利費用
定義: The amount of expense arising from interest.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Interest income (expense)
標準ラベル（英）: Interest income (expense)
標準ラベル（日）: 金利収益（費用）
定義: The amount of income or expense arising from interest. [Refer: Interest expense; Interest income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Depreciation and amortisation expense
標準ラベル（英）: Depreciation and amortisation expense
標準ラベル（日）: 減価償却費及び償却費
定義: The amount of depreciation and amortisation expense. Depreciation and amortisation are the systematic allocations of depreciable amounts of assets over their useful lives.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Share of profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Share of profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している関連会社及び共同支配企業の純利益（純損失）に対する持分
定義: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Tax expense (income), continuing operations
標準ラベル（英）: Tax expense (income), continuing operations
標準ラベル（日）: 税金費用（収益）：継続事業
定義: The aggregate amount included in the determination of profit (loss) for the period in respect of current tax and deferred tax that relate to continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Current tax expense (income); Deferred tax expense (income)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Other material non-cash items
標準ラベル（英）: Other material non-cash items
標準ラベル（日）: その他の重要性がある非資金項目
定義: The amount of material non-cash items other than depreciation and amortisation.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) before tax
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) before tax
標準ラベル（日）: 税引前利益（損失）
定義: The profit (loss) from continuing operations before tax expense or income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss) from continuing operations
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss) from continuing operations
標準ラベル（日）: 継続事業からの純利益（純損失）
定義: The profit (loss) from continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Profit (loss)
標準ラベル（英）: Profit (loss)
標準ラベル（日）: 純利益（純損失）
定義: The total of income less expenses, excluding the components of other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets
標準ラベル（英）: Assets
標準ラベル（日）: 資産
定義: The amount of resources: (a) controlled by the entity as a result of past events; and (b) from which future economic benefits are expected to flow to the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Investments accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（英）: Investments accounted for using equity method
標準ラベル（日）: 持分法で会計処理している投資
定義: The amount of investments accounted for using the equity method. The equity method is a method of accounting whereby the investment is initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter for the post-acquisition change in the investor's share of net assets of the investee. The investor's profit or loss includes its share of the profit or loss of the investee. The investor's other comprehensive income includes its share of the other comprehensive income of the investee. [Refer: At cost [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Additions to non-current assets other than financial instruments, deferred tax assets, net defined benefit assets, and rights arising under insurance contracts
標準ラベル（英）: Additions to non-current assets other than financial instruments, deferred tax assets, net defined benefit assets, and rights arising under insurance contracts
標準ラベル（日）: 非流動資産の増加（金融商品、繰延税金資産、確定給付資産の純額、保険契約から生じる権利を除く）
定義: The amount of additions to non-current assets other than financial instruments, deferred tax assets, net defined benefit assets and rights arising under insurance contracts. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Financial instruments, class [member]; Non-current assets; Types of insurance contracts [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Liabilities
標準ラベル（英）: Liabilities
標準ラベル（日）: 負債
定義: The amount of present obligations of the entity arising from past events, the settlement of which is expected to result in an outflow from the entity of resources embodying economic benefits.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識した減損損失
定義: The amount of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss; Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（英）: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss
標準ラベル（日）: 純損益に認識した減損損失の戻入れ
定義: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss; Profit (loss)]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益に認識した減損損失
定義: The amount of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income. Impairment loss on a revalued asset is recognised in other comprehensive income to the extent that the impairment loss does not exceed the amount in the revaluation surplus for that same asset. [Refer: Impairment loss; Revaluation surplus; Other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（英）: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income
標準ラベル（日）: その他の包括利益に認識した減損損失の戻入れ
定義: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss; Impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net cash flows from (used in) operating activities
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flows from (used in) operating activities
標準ラベル（日）: 営業活動による（に使用された）キャッシュ・フロー
定義: The cash flows from (used in) operating activities, which are the principal revenue-producing activities of the entity and other activities that are not investing or financing activities. [Refer: Revenue]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net cash flows from (used in) investing activities
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flows from (used in) investing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 投資活動による（に使用された）キャッシュ・フロー
定義: The cash flows from (used in) investing activities, which are the acquisition and disposal of long-term assets and other investments not included in cash equivalents.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Net cash flows from (used in) financing activities
標準ラベル（英）: Cash flows from (used in) financing activities
標準ラベル（日）: 財務活動による（に使用された）キャッシュ・フロー
定義: The cash flows from (used in) financing activities, which are activities that result in changes in the size and composition of the contributed equity and borrowings of the entity.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Description of material reconciling items
標準ラベル（英）: Description of material reconciling items
標準ラベル（日）: 重要性がある調整項目の記述
定義: The description of all material reconciling items. [Refer: Material reconciling items [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of products and services [text block]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of products and services [text block]
標準ラベル（日）: 製品及びサービスの開示 [テキストブロック]

標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of products and services [table]
標準ラベル（日）: 製品及びサービスの開示 [表]
定義: Schedule disclosing information related to the entity's products and services.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Products and services [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Products and services [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 製品及びサービス [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Products and services [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Products and services [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 製品及びサービス [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the entity's products and services. It also represents the standard value for the 'Products and services' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disclosure of products and services [line items]
標準ラベル（英）: Disclosure of products and services [line items]
標準ラベル（日）: 製品及びサービスの開示 [表示項目]
定義: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes of the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Revenue
標準ラベル（英）: Revenue
標準ラベル（日）: 収益
定義: The income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities. 標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有に分類された処分グループ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for groups of assets, which are to be disposed of together as a group in a single transaction, and the liabilities directly associated with those assets that will be transferred in the transaction.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets and liabilities classified as held for sale [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Assets and liabilities classified as held for sale [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有に分類された資産及び負債 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets and liabilities not classified as held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Assets and liabilities not classified as held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有に分類されていない資産及び負債 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for assets and liabilities that are not classified as held for sale. It also represents the standard value for the 'Assets and liabilities classified as held for sale' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Non-current assets held for sale [member]; Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Assets and liabilities classified as held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Assets and liabilities classified as held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有に分類された資産及び負債 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for assets and liabilities that are classified as held for sale. [Refer: Non-current assets held for sale [member]; Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Non-current assets held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Non-current assets held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的で保有する非流動資産 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for non-current assets that are available for immediate sale in their present condition, subject only to terms that are usual and customary for sales of such assets, and for which sale is highly probable. [Refer: Non-current assets]

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 売却目的保有に分類された処分グループ [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for groups of assets, which are to be disposed of together as a group in a single transaction, and the liabilities directly associated with those assets that will be transferred in the transaction.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Consolidated and separate financial statements [axis]
標準ラベル（英）: Consolidated and separate financial statements [axis]
標準ラベル（日）: 連結及び個別財務諸表 [軸]
定義: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the domain members or categories in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Consolidated [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Consolidated [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 連結 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for the financial statements of a group in which the assets, liabilities, equity, income, expenses and cash flows of the parent and its subsidiaries are presented as those of a single economic entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Consolidated and separate financial statements' axis if no other member is used.

表示リンク（優先ラベル）: Separate [member]
標準ラベル（英）: Separate [member]
標準ラベル（日）: 個別 [メンバー]
定義: This member stands for separate financial statements. Separate financial statements are those presented by an entity in which the entity could elect, subject to the requirements in IAS 27, to account for its investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates either at cost, in accordance with IFRS 9, or using the equity method as described in IAS 28.
